Entries.Introduction: Ahoy there! It's nice to see young folk movin' in to the valley. It's not very common these days.
Entries.accept_869: Ah... That's the perfect bait for a catfish I've been tryin' to catch!#$b#Here, let me trade you this for it. I'm not sure what it is, but it washed up on the beach not too long ago.#$b#Somethin' tells me you could use it, lad.^Somethin' tells me you could use it, miss.
Entries.FullCrabPond: *sniff*... Ah... That old familiar scent. You've been raisin' crabs, haven't ya?#$b#Yer a man after me own heart, @. Hah!$h^Yer a lady after me own heart, @. Hah!$h#$b#Here, take this. I found it on the beach... Been savin' it fer a special occasion. It's not every day I discover a fellow crab enthusiast! [797]
Entries.MovieInvitation: Ah... a movie. That's kind of ye, lad.^Ah... a movie. That's kind of ye, miss.#$b#I'll just finish me pipe, and head over.
Entries.Mon: Ahoy there, son.^Ahoy there, lass.#$b#Looks like decent weather for fishing, eh?
Entries.Mon4: Have you had much luck in the local waters? You look like you could be a strong angler if you set your mind to it.
Entries.Tue: A true angler has respect for the water... don't you forget that.
Entries.Tue6: The ol' Man was a fisherman, you know. I grew up sailing between the fern islands, living from catch to catch.#$e#The fishing life is tough, but there's something about it that keeps you goin'.
Entries.Wed: Some fish come and go with the seasons. Others only come out at night or in the rain.
Entries.Thu: *mumble* *mumble* ...Eh? I would tell you about my thoughts, but it's a fisherman's secret.
Entries.Thu2: There's rumors of some very rare fish in these parts... but only an experienced angler could stand a chance against them.#$e#You'll need the finest bait you can get if you want a rare fish to bite.
Entries.Fri: If you really want to get the fish biting, make sure you put some bait on your hook.
Entries.Sat: If the local fishing scene got a bit more lively, I might expand the shop's stock.
Entries.Sat8: How's the fishing life going for ya?#$e#I try to fish as often as possible, but it's not easy when you've got a shop to run.
Entries.Sun: If you purchase a high quality fishing rod, you'll be able to attach bait and tackle to the line.#$b#Bait causes fish to bite faster. Tackle can make your job a lot easier when reeling fish in.#$e#There's all kinds of tackle, with different perks. They're usually a little flimsy, so don't be surprised if your tackle breaks after a while.
Entries.Sun10: Hey, it's my skipper, @!$h#$e#I'd give you a discount on bait if I could afford it.$s

Introduction.0: Ahoy! Senang bertemu anak muda sepertimu. Jarang sekali aku bertemu anak muda.

accept_869.0: Ah... Ini adalah umpan yang sempurna untuk catfish yang selama ini sulit kutangkap!#$b#Ini, aku akan menukarnya dengan ini. Aku tidak yakin apa ini, tapi aku menemukannya di pantai beberapa waktu lalu.#$b#Aku merasa kau bisa menggunakannya, lad.^Aku merasa kau bisa menggunakannya, miss.

FullCrabPond.0: *sniff*... Ah... Aroma yang familiar. Kau memelihara kepiting kan?#$b#Kau adalah pria nomor 1, @. Hah!$h^Kau adalah wanita nomor 1, @. Hah!$h#$b#Ini, Ambil ini. Aku menemukannya di pantai... Aku menyimpannya untuk waktu yang spesial. Ini waktu yang spesial, karena tidak setiap hari aku bertemu pecinta kepiting! [797]

MovieInvitation.0: Ah... Film. Kau sungguh baik, lad.^Ah... Film. Kau sungguh baik, miss.#$b#Aku akan menghabiskan cerutuku, dan akan segera kesana.

Mon.0: Ahoy, nak.^Ahoy.#$b#Cuaca yang bagus untuk memancing, kan?

Mon4.0: Kau tau air disini? Kau butuh kesabran jika ingin mancing disini.

Tue.0: Pemancing sejati tidak merusak ekosistem... jangan lupakan itu.

Tue6.0: Kau tau, aku nelayan tua. Aku telah berlayar ke berbagai pulau, hidup dengan menangkap ikan.#$e#Kehidupan nelayan memang baik, tapi ada suatu hal yang mendorongmu untuk pergi'.

Wed.0: Beberapa ikan kadang berbeda di setiap musim. Yang lain kadang muncul di malam hari atau bahkan saaat hujan turun.

Thu.0: *mumble* *mumble* ...Eh? Aku akan mencritaan rahasia para nelayan.

Thu2.0: ADa rumor bahwa adaa ikan misterius di tempat ini... tapi hanya pemancing berpengalam saja yang bisa menangkapnya.#$e#Kau butuh pancing yterbaik jika ingin menangkap ikan langka.

Fri.0: Jika kau ingin menangkap ikan, Jangan lupa beri umpan untuk pancingmu.

Sat.0: Jika aku bisa menangkap lebih banyak ikan, Aku akan memperbesar stok ikanku.

Sat8.0: Bagaimana mancingmu?#$e#Aku ingin memancing, tapi itu tidak mudah ketika aku harus menjaga toko.

Sun.0: Jika kau membeli pancing kualitas terbaik, kau akan bisa menaruh umpan di pancing.#$b#Umpan akan membuat ikan menyambarnya dengan cepat. Jaring mempermudah menangkapnya.#$e#Ada banyak jenis jaring. Tapi kebanyakan banyak yang tipis, jadi jangat kaget jika jaringmu banyak yang robek.

Sun10.0: Hei itu kesukaanku, @!$h#$e#Aku akan memberimu diskon jika aku boleh membelinya.$s

Entries.Introduction: Ah, yes. I have predicted your arrival a long time ago, young @.#$e#However, your fate is ultimately in your own hands.
Entries.accept_868: Ah... an arctic shard.#$b#A most powerful substance, indeed, and potently infused with the element of ice.#$b#I'll take it, if you don't mind.#$b#...#$b#...Erm...You're still here. Oh. You want something?#$b#...Take this.
Entries.MovieInvitation: Hmm... I suppose I could accompany you... yes. Once you've arrived, I shall appear. Farewell.
Entries.Mon: Ah, yes. I have seen many things about your future, young @.#$e#If I were to tell you, there could be grave consequences.
Entries.Tue: If you have nothing important to tell me, leave me be. I have much work to do.
Entries.Tue4: I trust you enough to allow you in my basement. Treat what you find there with respect.
Entries.Wed: It takes years of study to understand the language of the elementals.#$e#To actually speak their language requires a lifetime of devoted effort.#$e#Now, if you'll excuse me...
Entries.Thu: There are many mysteries around us. You must be patient if you wish to discover them.
Entries.Thu10: You musn't tell anyone... but I have reason to believe that one of the locals is actually my daughter...#$e#I could be mistaken... It's rare, but it does happen.
Entries.Fri: I believe the townsfolk are afraid of me.#$e#It is unfortunate, but I suppose it is human to be afraid of the unknown.
Entries.Fri6: I was married, long ago. After my wife and I split, she began flying around the countryside, cursing everything she saw.#$e#It's not a very mature way to express one's anger.
Entries.Sat: Beware, you are standing above a potent magical field.#$e#I built my hut right here on purpose, you know.
Entries.Sat2: Have you made any headway with the forest spirits?
Entries.Sun: I sometimes observe the local villagers in secret.#$e#I am hoping to find an apprentice. Some day I will leave this mortal plane, but my arcane pursuits must continue.

Introduction.0: Ah, yes. Aku sudah memprediksi kau akan datang dulu sekali @.#$e#Bagaimanapun, takdirmu ada di tanganmu.

accept_868.0: Ah... sebuah pecahan arctic.#$b#Sebuah substance yang sangat powerful, dan terdapat element es yang kuat di dalamnya.#$b#KKalau tidak keberatan, aku ambil ini.#$b#...#$b#...Erm... Kau masih disini. Oh. Kau ingin sesuatu penggantinya?#$b#...Ambil ini.

MovieInvitation.0: Hmm... Mungkin aku bisa menemanimu... Ya. Saat kau sampai, aku juga akan muncul. Selamat tinggal.

Mon.0: Aku punya penglihatan tentang masa depanmu @.#$e#Jika aku memberitahukannya, kau akan tau konsekuensinya

Tue.0: Jika kau tidak punya kepentingan, tinggalkan aku saja. Aku punya banyak pekerjaan.

Tue4.0: Aku memperbolehkanmu ke ruang bawah tanahku. Kau akan menemukan sesuatu yang menyenangkan disana.

Wed.0: Butuh bertahun tahun untuk mengerti bahasa para elemental.#$e#Dan untuk bisa berbicara bahasa mereka butuh usaha seumur hidup.#$e#Nah sekarang, biarkan aku bekerja...

Thu.0: Banyak sekali misteri di sekitar kita.Kau harus sabar mencarinya.

Thu10.0: Kau tidak boleh bilang pada siapapun... Sebenarnya aku mulai curiga kalau salah satu warga adalah putriku...#$e#Bisa saja aku salah... Tapi tidak menutup kemungkinan.

Fri.0: Warga desa takut kepadaku.#$e#Sayangnya, aku tidak tau kenapa bisa mereka takut kepadaku.

Fri6.0: Aku sudah lama sekali menikah. Setelah kami berpisah, dia terbang ke warga desa dan mengutuk orang-orang.#$e#Dia tidak dewasa sekali saat marah.

Sat.0: Kau punya potensi magis di kebunmu.#$e#Aku membangun tempat ini karena ada maksud.

Sat2.0: Apakah kau pernah ke hutan mahluk halus?

Sun.0: Aku kadang ke desa dengan sembunyi-sembunyi.#$e#Aku harap aku menemukan sesuatu. Suatu hari aku ingin meninggalkan tempat ini, tapi aku harus menyiapkan batinku.

Entries.Mon: Hi... Everything okay?
Entries.Mon4: I've learned a lot from my parrot family...#$b#But I'm sure there's a lot more out there I don't know.$s
Entries.Tue: When Sun is angry, it feels good in the jungle.#$e#Sun can't find us beneath the leaves. We trick him! Haha...$h
Entries.Wed: ...Sorry... I'm shy today.$3
Entries.Wed2: Be careful in the volcano... the spirits don't like outsiders.
Entries.Thu: Have you met the others like you?#$b#I don't talk to them much. I feel safer with my own kind...$3
Entries.Fri: One time... I was at the top of the volcano at night, and I saw lights far, far away.#$b#I wonder if there are other bird families out there?$3
Entries.Fri3: I wonder if I could see your home from the top of the volcano?
Entries.Sat: ...I'm sad today.$s#$e#You go on... have fun. Let me be sad.$s
Entries.Sun: When it rains, strange birds visit.#$b#I try to speak to them... but they fly away.$s#$b#I guess they don't want to be friends...$s

Mon.0: Hai... Semua baik-baik saja?

Mon4.0: Aku sudah dengar banyak dari keluarga burung betetku...#$b#Tapi ada banyak hal di luar sana yang belum aku ketahui.$s

Tue.0: Saat Matahari sedang marah, di hutan rasanya malah nyaman.#$e#Matahari tidak bisa menemukan kita di bawah dedaunan pohon. Jadi dia tertipu! Haha...$h

Wed.0: ...Maaf... Aku agak malu hari ini.$3

Wed2.0: Berhati-hatilah di gunung berapi... roh-roh di sana tidak ramah pada pendatang

Thu.0: Apa kau sudah bertemu dengan kaummu?#$b#Aku jarang bicara sama mereka. Karena aku lebih nyaman dengan kaumku sendiri...$3

Fri.0: Dulu... Aku pernah ke puncak gunung berapi pas malam hari, dan aku lihat ada cahaya dari jarak yang sangat jauh.#$b#Aku penasaran apa ada keluarga burung lain di luar sana?$3

Fri3.0: Apa rumahmu kelihatan dari puncak gunung berapi?

Sat.0: ...Aku lagi sedih.$s#$e#Silakan... bersenang-senanglah. Biarkan aku bersedih.$s

Sun.0: Saat hujan, ada burung aneh yang ke sini.#$b#Dan saat kudekati... mereka malah pergi.$s#$b#Kurasa mereka tidak mau berteman...$s

Entries.4: I saw a big mango floating in the sky. Linus told me it was a hot-air balloon!$u#$b#I thought only birds could fly...
Entries.18: When I first arrived, Linus made me a suit out of leaves, like his...#$b#But I looked funny... like a fuzzy mango!$h#$e#I think I'll stick to my feathers.
Entries.LeoDeparture: I need to find some place to live...$s#$b#But I have a plan... I'm going to rely on my friends.
Entries.Thu8: It felt bad at first... to leave the island and set foot in a strange land.$s#$e#But, I got used to it after a while.#$b#I'm a very flexible person!$h
Entries.Thu10: I felt like a stranger here, at first. But I've made a lot of friends!$h#$b#For once, I feel like I belong...
Entries.Tue: Miss Penny is doing her best to get me up to speed in my schooling. She's really nice...#$e#...Luckily, I remember some things from my old, old life... before washing up on the island... so it's not as difficult as it could be.#$e#Miss Penny says she's impressed with how much I know!
Entries.Tue10: I'm sure Jas and Vincent thought I was weird, at first. I accidentally squawked at the school table a few times... that didn't help.$s#$e#It was a big change for everyone. But we're good friends now!$h
Entries.Wed: Between Linus and Miss Penny, I'm going to learn everything there is to learn!$h#$e#Mayor Lewis says I'm on the fast track to becoming a 'well-rounded citizen'... whatever that means.
Entries.Thu: Have you ever noticed all the interesting birds that live here?#$e#If you listen closely, they might tell you something.
Entries.winter_Thu: The birds of this valley don't mind the cold so much.#$e#I'm a little jealous of their warm coats...$s
Entries.Fri: Linus has been teaching me about all the wild food in the valley. There's a lot of good stuff out here!$h#$e#Though... I do kind of miss having golden walnuts for breakfast every morning...$s
Entries.winter_Fri: Linus taught me how to make a special spice berry rubbed fish...#$b#He says if I eat enough of it it'll keep me warm this winter!$h
Entries.Fri8: Uncle Linus says I should 'cook' my fish before eating it...$s#$b#I'm having a hard time getting used to it... so dry...$s
Entries.Mon: Hey, @. Nice to see you back on the island, just like old times. This is fun!#$e#You know, I was scared when you first arrived... I knew my life was about to change.$u
Entries.Sun: You know, Stardew Valley might be my new home... but the island will always be my home, too.#$e#It's nice to be able to come back and visit.
Entries.Sat: Maybe some day, I'll visit Zuzu City...$u#$b#But I'm not even close to being ready, yet. This world is already so strange to me, and I'm very comfortable here right now!$h
Entries.Sun10: The parrots want me to thank you for all the golden walnuts you've found. They're really enjoying them.$h
Entries.Sat10: @? Um... I'm a little embarrassed to ask...$u#$b#But... do you think Jas would ever like a guy like me?$u#$b#Or am I too weird?$s#$e#Hahaha... who cares. I'll figure it out some day.$h

4.0: Aku tadi lihat ada mangga besar melayang di langit. Linus bilang benda itu namanya balon udara!$u#$b#Kukira cuma burung yang bisa terbang...

18.0: Saat pertama ke sini, Linus membuatkan pakaian dari daun buatku, seperti yang dipakainya...#$b#Tapi aku jadi kelihatan lucu... mirip mangga berdaun lebat!$h#$e#Aku akan pakai bajuku yang terbuat dari bulu saja.

LeoDeparture.0: Aku harus menemukan tempat tinggal...$s#$b#Tapi aku ada rencara... Aku akan bergantung pada teman-temanku.

Thu8.0: Awalnya terasa sedih... karena harus meninggalkan pulau dan pergi ke tempat asing.$s#$e#Tapi lama-lama jadi terbiasa.#$b#Karena aku orang yang mudah beradaptasi!$h

Thu10.0: Awalnya aku merasa asing di sini. Tapi aku dapat banyak teman!$h#$b#Dan setelah itu, aku merasa cocok berada di sini...

Tue.0: Nona Penny mengajariku sekuat tenaga agar tidak tertinggal di sekolah. Dia sangat baik...#$e#...Untungnya, aku masih ingat beberapa hal dari masa lalu... sebelum aku terdampar di pulau... jadi aku tidak kesulitan dalam belajar.#$e#Nona Penny bilang dia kagum karena aku tahu banyak hal!

Tue10.0: Aku yakin Jas dan Vincent awalnya menganggapku aneh. Karena aku sesekali berkicau tanpa sengaja...$s#$e#Karena semuanya sudah mengerti. Sekarang kami jadi teman baik!$h

Wed.0: Selain dari Linus dan Nona Penny, aku akan mempelajari apapun yang belum kuketahui!$h#$e#Mayor Lewis bilang aku sudah mendekati untuk jadi 'warga yang baik'... entah apa maksudnya.

Thu.0: Apa kau pernah lihat semua burung unik di tempat ini?#$e#Kalau kau mendengar mereka, mereka bisa memberitahumu sesuatu.

winter_Thu.0: Burung-burung di lembah ini tahan dingin.#$e#Aku agak iri dengan bulu tebal mereka...$s

Fri.0: Linus mengajariku tentang makanan liar yang tersedia di lembah ini. Ternyata ada banyak jenisnya!$h#$e#Yah... Kadang aku masih kangen sarapan makan Golden Walnuts sih...$s

winter_Fri.0: Linus mengajariku membuat ikan yang diolesi Spice Berry...#$b#Katanya itu makanan untuk menghangatkan tubuh di musim dingin!$h

Fri8.0: Kata Paman Linus, aku harus 'memasak' ikan sebelum memakannya...$s#$b#Aku agak sulit membiasakannya... karena ikannya jadi kering...$s

Mon.0: Hei, @. Senang melihatmu di pulau lagi, seperti dulu. Ini asyik!#$e#Kau tahu, aku ketakutan saat kau pertama kali ke sini... Karena aku tahu hidupku akan berubah.$u

Sun.0: Memang, Stardew Valley adalah rumah baruku... tapi pulau akan selalu jadi rumahku juga.#$e#Senang rasanya bisa kembali sesekali.

Sat.0: Mungkin nanti, aku akan pergi ke Zuzu City...$u#$b#Tapi aku masih belum begitu siap. Dunia ini terasa sangat aneh bagiku, dan aku masih merasa nyaman di sini!$h

Sun10.0: Para burung betet berterima kasih atas semua Golden Walnuts yang kau beri. Mereka sangat menyukainya.$h

Sat10.0: @? Eng... Aku agak sungkan tanya soal ini...$u#$b#Menurutmu... apa Jas suka dengan cowok sepertiku?$u#$b#Apa aku terlalu aneh baginya?$s#$e#Hahaha... siapa peduli. Akan kucari tahu suatu saat nanti.$h

Entries.Rainy_Day_0: Do you like rainy days as much as I do, @?
Entries.Rainy_Day_1: We're different in so many ways... but that's alright.
Entries.Rainy_Day_2: Good morning, @. I went out early and found this for you. [305 308 203 795 397]#$e#I hope it's not too strange.
Entries.Rainy_Day_3: I wonder if the wizard knows about... this? I hope he can keep a secret.$s
Entries.Rainy_Day_4: As much as I try to be civilized, I have the urge to be mischievous sometimes...$6#$e#They say it's a condition of my people.
Entries.Rainy_Day_Krobus: Ah, It's more humid today with the rain... I feel a lot more comfortable.
Entries.Rainy_Night_0: On nights like this, those who gaze out windows sometimes see shadowy figures. To think... it might've been me.$7
Entries.Rainy_Night_1: If the other shadow people knew about our living arrangement, they would... 'punish' me.$s#$e#Most of them despise humans, you know.
Entries.Rainy_Night_2: You're sopping wet, and cold! Isn't that dangerous to your species?$s
Entries.Rainy_Night_3: I already had dinner, but it wasn't something you'd be able to eat... sorry.
Entries.Rainy_Night_4: Ever since I left my people, I've been searching for a new home... now I belong somewhere. That means everything to me.
Entries.Rainy_Night_5: It's said that my people came here long ago, when a great catastrophe allowed spirits from the void to cross into the physical plane.
Entries.Rainy_Night_Krobus: The sound of the rain reminds me of the sewers... it's comforting.#$e#The sewers were my refuge... I felt safe there. But don't worry... I feel the same way about my new home, too.
Entries.Indoor_Day_0: If I could come help you, I would... but I'll do my best to keep the house in order.
Entries.Indoor_Day_1: I tried my best to make human food... [203 204 651 225]#$e#You can eat it later, don't worry about it...
Entries.Indoor_Day_2: I'm happy here, in the house. I like to spend all my time in a good spot... I don't need to "get out" like humans do.#$e#But I understand that you need to! Please don't feel like you have to stay here with me.$3
Entries.Indoor_Day_3: I'm considering spending my day all balled up and wedged in the corner...#$e#What? You mean you don't do that?$3
Entries.Indoor_Day_4: On Fridays, I like to stay quiet out of respect for Yoba. I hope you don't mind.
Entries.Indoor_Day_Krobus: I wish I could help you on the farm, but I can't go out in the sun...
Entries.Indoor_Night_0: I cleaned all the bugs out of the house today... Sorry, I didn't save you any! *smack*$7
Entries.Indoor_Night_1: You feel solid... sometimes I wish I had bones, too...$s
Entries.Indoor_Night_2: Sometimes I wonder if humans and shadow people could really ever co-exist... It's a lovely idea, but is it realistic?$s#$e#I hope so...
Entries.Indoor_Night_3: Sometimes I pause and think of all that I've learned about humans from you...#$b#I wish all my fellow shadow people could know this feeling.
Entries.Indoor_Night_4: I want to be a good housemate for you, but I never know if I'm doing well... *groan* $s#$e#I have a hard time understanding human expression. B... but... you're happy living with me?#$e#Okay!$7
Entries.Indoor_Night_Krobus: Hi, @. Welcome home. You look like you've been working hard out there!$h
Entries.Outdoor_0: I'll stay out here for just a bit, but we've got to be careful... if anyone approaches I'll need to hide!
Entries.Outdoor_1: It's rare that I can step outside!
Entries.Outdoor_3: Wide open spaces make me nervous...$s
Entries.Outdoor_4: Please go about your day, I'll just stay here and guard the house.
Entries.Outdoor_Krobus: I'll wait here for a bit, and see if any bugs come my way.#$e#I haven't had breakfast yet!
Entries.OneKid_3: I'm not sure how, but Yoba has blessed this house with a 'child'...
Entries.TwoKids_0: Don't worry... I already made %kid1 and %kid2 a void egg omelet.
Entries.TwoKids_2: I worry about the future of the children... But I trust that Yoba has a plan for them.
Entries.TwoKids_3: This house has been blessed with two children, now... Does that mean Yoba approves of our unconventional living arrangement?
Entries.Good_1: I feel a sensation in my body... is this... 'platonic love'?$l#$b#... Oh, wait... I'm just shedding my skin.$s
Entries.Good_2: I've learned to overcome my bias against humans... but Dwarves still disgust me.$a
Entries.Good_3: You started nibbling on me during the night, and mumbling about 'black lick or ish'... what did you mean by that?$3
Entries.Good_0: We're making progress, and I feel really hopeful.$h
Entries.Good_5: I was just admiring this lovely house... what a wonderful place.$l
Entries.Neutral_0: I won't ever grow old, but you will. Sometimes it makes me sad... but that's okay.$s
Entries.Neutral_1: Do you think your Grandpa would approve of a monster living in his house?
Entries.Neutral_2: Do you think we could get in trouble for living together?$s
Entries.Neutral_3: It's so bright in here... I might close my eyes for a few hours.$s
Entries.Neutral_4: I can't go outside, I can only eat certain food, I need the temperature a certain way... I hope it's not too much of a bother to live with me, @.$s
Entries.Neutral_6: I'll tell you a secret... I don't actually sleep, I just lay there with my eyes closed...
Entries.Neutral_7: You're a strange one, to want to live with a creature like me.
Entries.Neutral_8: I'm going to clean the house all day! This is fun.$7
Entries.Neutral_9: I wonder if we'll live here our entire lives? Moving would probably be too dangerous for me.
Entries.Bad_1: *sigh*... Maybe I should've stayed with my own kind.$s
Entries.Bad_2: Are you still happy, living with me?$s
Entries.Bad_4: I think you'd be happier living with another human...$s
Entries.Bad_5: I've detected a change in your behavior... what does it mean? *groan*$s
Entries.Bad_6: You only have one short life to live... are you certain you want to spend it with a hideous creature like me?$s
Entries.Bad_7: Maybe a relationship like this is destined to fail...$s
Entries.spring_1: What's your plan for the new year, @?
Entries.spring_23: You should go to the flower dance tomorrow! Don't worry about me.
Entries.summer_1: I get sunburnt very easily, so I need to be careful this time of year.
Entries.summer_8: Mmm... what's that lovely smell? You must've been sweating all night...$h
Entries.summer_15: It's summer... that means the house is full of flies.#$e#Don't worry, I'll take care of them. It's good protein!$h
Entries.fall_8: I don't feel like doing anything today.
Entries.fall_15: Have you figured out what you're going to use for your grange display tomorrow?
Entries.fall_24: If I showed up to the Spirit's Eve festival they'd put me in a cage...$s
Entries.winter_28: Thanks for letting me stay here, @. I'm looking forward to another great year!$h
Entries.spouseRoom_Krobus: #$c .5#We're so physically different that it's a challenge to live together, isn't it?#$e#I hope the humidity here isn't bothersome to you. We both have to compromise in order to live together!
Entries.spring_Krobus: It's 'spring' now, isn't it? I can smell the peppery aroma of wild horseradish.
Entries.summer_Krobus: You call this time of year 'summer', right? The warmth and humidity is nice, but I wish it wasn't so sunny.
Entries.fall_Krobus: It's been feeling a bit cooler lately, with a musty smell. You call this time of year 'fall', correct?
Entries.winter_Krobus: The darkness this time of year is very soothing. If only it were warmer!

Rainy_Day_0.0: Apakah kau juga menyukai hari-hari yang penuh dengan hujan, @?

Rainy_Day_1.0: Kita memiliki banyak perbedaan di berbagai hal... tapi itu tidak menjadi masalah bagiku.

Rainy_Day_2.0: Selamat pagi, @. Aku pergi lebih awal dan menemukan ini untukmu. [305 308 203 795 397]#$e#Aku harap ini tidak terlalu aneh.

Rainy_Day_3.0: Aku ingin tahu apakah wizard tahu tentang... ini? Aku harap ia bisa menjaga rahasia.$s

Rainy_Day_4.0: Sebanyak apapun aku mencoba untuk menjadi beradab, terkadang aku tetap memiliki keinginan untuk melakukan kejahilan...$6#$e#Mereka bilang itu adalah kondisi dari orang-orang sepertiku.

Rainy_Day_Krobus.0: Ah, hujan membuat hari ini menjadi semakin lembab... Aku menjadi semakin nyaman.

Rainy_Night_0.0: Di malam seperti ini, mereka yang memandang ke luar jendela terkadang melihat sesosok bayangan. Jika dipikir lagi... mereka mungkin sedang melihatku.$7

Rainy_Night_1.0: Jika shadow people lain mengetahui keadaan hidup kita, mereka akan... 'menghukum'-ku.$s#$e#Kebanyakan dari mereka memandang rendah manusia.

Rainy_Night_2.0: Kau basah kuyup dan kedinginan! Bukankah itu berbahaya untuk spesiesmu?$s

Rainy_Night_3.0: Aku sudah makan malam, tapi itu bukanlah sesuatu yang bisa kau makan... maaf.

Rainy_Night_4.0: Sejak aku meninggalkan orang-orangku, aku telah mencari rumah baru untukku... Sekarang, aku telah menemukkan tempatku. Ini sangat berarti untukku.

Rainy_Night_5.0: Konon katanya orang-orangku telah datang kesini sejak dahulu, ketika sebuah bencana besar membuat roh bisa menyebrang ke alam fisik.

Rainy_Night_Krobus.0: Suara hujan mengingatkanku dengan gorong-gorong... Itu membuatku nyaman.#$e#Gorong-gorong adalah tempatku untuk mengungsi... Aku merasa aman disana. Tapi jangan khawatir... Aku juga merasakan hal yang sama kok, dengan rumah baruku.

Indoor_Day_0.0: Jika aku bisa ikut denganmu, aku pasti akan ikut... Tapi untuk sekarang, aku akan lakukan yang terbaik untuk menjaga rumah kita.

Indoor_Day_1.0: Aku telah melakukan yang terbaik untuk membuat makanan manusia... [203 204 651 225]#$e#Kamu bisa makan itu nanti, jangan cemaskan itu...

Indoor_Day_2.0: Aku bahagia disini, di rumah ini. Aku suka menghabiskan waktuku di tempat yang bagus... Aku tidak perlu "keluar" seperti manusia.#$e#Tapi aku mengerti jika kamu membutuhkannya! Tolong jangan merasa seperti kamu harus tetap berada di dalam rumah sepanjang hari bersamaku.$3

Indoor_Day_3.0: Aku mempertimbangkan untuk menghabiskan waktuku di pojok ruangan...#$e#Apa? Kamu nggak melakukan hal semacam itu?$3

Indoor_Day_4.0: Setiap Jumat, Aku ingin puasa bicara untuk menghormati Yoba. Aku harap kamu tidak keberatan.

Indoor_Day_Krobus.0: Aku harap aku bisa membantumu di lahan pertanianmu, tapi aku tidak bisa terkena sinar matahari...

Indoor_Night_0.0: Hari ini aku telah membersihkan semua serangga dari rumah... Maaf, aku tidak menyisakannya sedikitpun untukmu! *smack*$7

Indoor_Night_1.0: Kamu terasa keras... kadang aku berharap aku juga memiliki tulang...$s

Indoor_Night_2.0: Kadang aku bertanya-tanya apakah manusia dan 'shadow people' benar-benar dapat hidup berdampingan... Itu ide yang indah, tapi apakah itu realistis?$s#$e#Aku harap demikian...

Indoor_Night_3.0: Kadang aku berhenti sejenak dan memikirkan semua yang telah saya pelajari tentang manusia darimu...#$b#Aku harap semua rekan 'shadow people'-ku bisa mengetahui perasaan ini.

Indoor_Night_4.0: Aku ingin menjadi teman serumah yang baik untukmu, tapi aku tidak pernah tahu apakah aku cukup baik dalam melakukannya... *groan* $s#$e#Aku memiliki kesulitan dalam memahami ekspresi manusia. T... Tapi... kau senang tinggal denganku?#$e#Oke!$7

Indoor_Night_Krobus.0: Hai, @. Selamat datang. Nampaknya kau telah bekerja keras di luar sana!$h

Outdoor_0.0: Aku akan diam disini sebentar, tapi kita harus berhati-hati... jika ada yang mendekat, aku harus bersembunyi!

Outdoor_1.0: Benar-benar kesempatan yang langka untukku bisa berjalan diluar!

Outdoor_3.0: Ruang terbuka yang luas membuatku gugup...$s

Outdoor_4.0: Tolong jalani harimu, aku akan tetap disini dan menjaga rumah.

Outdoor_Krobus.0: Aku akan menunggu sebentar disini, dan melihat jika ada serangga yang datang ke arahku.#$e#Aku belum sarapan dari tadi!

OneKid_3.0: Aku tidak tahu bagaimana, tapi Yoba telah memberkati rumah ini dengan seorang 'anak'...

TwoKids_0.0: Jangan cemas... Aku telah membuatkan %kid1 dan %kid2 sepiring void egg omelet.

TwoKids_2.0: Aku cemas dengan masa depan anak-anak... Tapi aku percaya jika Yoba telah memiliki rencana untuk mereka.

TwoKids_3.0: Rumah ini sekarang telah diberkati dengan dua anak... Apakah itu berarti Yoba telah menyetujui rumah tangga kita yang tidak konvensional?

Good_1.0: Aku merasakan sebuah sensasi didalam tubuhku... Apakah ini... 'cinta platonis'?$l#$b#... Oh, tunggu... Aku baru saja merontokkan kulitku.$s

Good_2.0: Aku telah belajar untuk mengatasi biasku terhadap manusia... tapi 'Dwarves' masih membuatku jijik.$a

Good_3.0: Kau mulai menggigitku di malam hari, dan bergumam tentang 'black lick or ish'... apa yang kau maksud?$3

Good_0.0: We're making progress, and I feel really hopeful.$h

Good_5.0: I was just admiring this lovely house... what a wonderful place.$l

Neutral_2.0: Do you think we could get in trouble for living together?$s

Neutral_3.0: It's so bright in here... I might close my eyes for a few hours.$s

Neutral_7.0: You're a strange one, to want to live with a creature like me.

Neutral_8.0: I'm going to clean the house all day! This is fun.$7

Neutral_9.0: I wonder if we'll live here our entire lives? Moving would probably be too dangerous for me.

Bad_2.0: Are you still happy, living with me?$s

spring_1.0: What's your plan for the new year, @?

spring_23.0: You should go to the flower dance tomorrow! Don't worry about me.

summer_1.0: I get sunburnt very easily, so I need to be careful this time of year.

summer_8.0: Mmm... what's that lovely smell? You must've been sweating all night...$h

summer_15.0: It's summer... that means the house is full of flies.#$e#Don't worry, I'll take care of them. It's good protein!$h

fall_8.0: I don't feel like doing anything today.

fall_15.0: Have you figured out what you're going to use for your grange display tomorrow?

winter_28.0: Thanks for letting me stay here, @. I'm looking forward to another great year!$h

spring_Krobus.0: It's 'spring' now, isn't it? I can smell the peppery aroma of wild horseradish.

summer_Krobus.0: You call this time of year 'summer', right? The warmth and humidity is nice, but I wish it wasn't so sunny.

Entries.Abigail_spouse: I beat all these games last year!$h
Entries.Leah_spouse: I learned all of Robin's techniques last year, but she's always one step ahead of me!
Entries.Maru_spouse: mumph... This is my one chance to pig out on barbecue sandwiches.
Entries.Penny_spouse: I hope we win the grange display contest!
Entries.Haley_spouse: Did you remember to bring good stuff for our grange display? I hope we win this year.
Entries.Sebastian_spouse: Hey, @. I'm just catching up with Sam. Go ahead and have some fun.
Entries.Sam_spouse: Sebastian's the same as always. Are you having fun at the festival?
Entries.Alex_spouse: I'm just catching up with some old friends... you go on and have a good time.
Entries.Harvey_spouse: I'll wait here until you're ready to go home...
Entries.Elliott_spouse: The smokey aroma drew me here, yet 'twas the zesty sauce that truly sealed my fate... *gurgle*$s
Entries.Abigail: I already beat all the games... now what?
Entries.Robin: Woodworking is an ancient tradition that I'm very proud to be a part of.$h
Entries.Demetrius: Robin really works hard on her carpentry stuff... she deserves a little recognition now and then.
Entries.Maru: *slurp* mmm... this barbecue sauce is amazing.$h
Entries.Sebastian: It's kinda hectic today... I'm just gonna hang out here for a while.
Entries.Pierre: My store carries the very finest quality products in the whole valley. Please, inspect my grange display closely and see for yourself!
Entries.Caroline: Pierre is very serious about his grange display. He's been setting aside the best-looking produce for weeks in preparation.#$e#Hey, best of luck to you if you enter!
Entries.Linus: These animals never judge people by their looks. The same can't be said for humans.
Entries.Alex: I played the 'Strength' game too many times and now my arms feel like rubber.
Entries.George: Hmm... smoked turkey haunch? I guess this festival isn't all bad.$h
Entries.Evelyn: I wish Gus would include a vegetarian option. Some zucchinni skewers, maybe?
Entries.Lewis: Well @, It's the big day... Our most important festival of the year, the 'Stardew Valley Fair'.#$b#If you'd like to participate by setting up a grange display, I've left an empty stand for you. Just let me know after you've set everything up so we can get to the judging.
Entries.Clint: I complain about my job sometimes, but I do take pride in my work.#$b#These are some of my finest pieces. I hope you like them.
Entries.Emily: You know, I would've made a pretty good clown. I think I missed my calling.
Entries.Penny: I won the wheel of chance ten times in a row and now the man won't let me play anymore...$s
Entries.Pam: Better hurry up, kid... Before ol' Pam here fishes every last lunker out of the tent! Hehe.$h
Entries.Haley: Have you been to the fortune teller? She set up her stand in the graveyard.#$e#I already saw her... she told me something... interesting. *giggle*$h
Entries.Jodi: He doesn't look very happy... I guess Mayor Lewis had to cut costs with a budget clown this year.
Entries.Kent: I'm waiting for this clown to start doing something funny.#$e#Pretty disappointing.
Entries.Sam: Hey @. Having a good time?#$e#The slingshot tent is pretty fun, and if you get good at it you can really rack up the star tokens.
Entries.Leah: I really admire Robin's carpentry skills. I use a lot of the same techniques in my own line of work.
Entries.Shane: All these animals are friendly and love to get massaged.
Entries.Marnie: I tried my best, but my display is pretty weak compared to Pierre's.$s#$e#Well, maybe the judges will give me bonus points for the massive cheese wheel.
Entries.Elliott: I'm trying to get Gus to tell me his sauce recipe, but he won't budge.
Entries.Gus: Eat as much as you like! It's all free today... compliments of Mayor Lewis.$h#$e#Oh! Make sure to dribble some of my secret sauce on there.
Entries.Dwarf: You say it's raining up above? *gasp*#$e#Rain... It's almost mythical to us. Some of us live our entire lives without ever experiencing it.
Entries.Wizard: Welwick and I have known each other for a long time... she is a remarkable diviner, and a good friend.#$e#...#$e#That clown... I know him from somewhere.#$e#Was it the school of illusion? Or maybe the Carnival of Secrets? Hmm...
Entries.Harvey: And just a few steps over there, Gus is grilling up a batch of pork ribs... Yikes.$s#$e#I've got some soul-searching to do...$11
Entries.Sandy: I heard it's raining back home. Is that why you came here?$h#$e#I kind of miss the rain, actually...$s
Entries.Jas: Ow! A hen pecked my little finger!$u
Entries.Marlon: Clint's blades get sharper every year.#$e#So do his prices...
Entries.Willy: Are you setting up a grange display, @? It's your chance to show off all the good produce from %farm!
Entries.Leo: Haha! I've never seen anything like this before...$h

Abigail_spouse.0: Aku mengalahkan semua permainan ini tahun kemarin!$h

Leah_spouse.0: Aku mempelajari semua teknik Robin setahun ini, tapi dia selalu selangkah lebih maju!

Maru_spouse.0: mumph... Inilah kesempatanku untuk memakan barbecue sandwiches.

Penny_spouse.0: Aku harap kau memenangkan kontes pertunjukannya!

Haley_spouse.0: Apa kau ingat, untuk membawa barang yang akan diikutkan dalam kontes pertunjukkan? Aku harap kita menang tahun ini.

Sebastian_spouse.0: Hei, @. Aku sedang bicara dengan Sam. Bersenang - senanglah.

Sam_spouse.0: Sebastian sama seperti biasa. Apa kau senang mengikuti festival ini?

Harvey_spouse.0: Aku akan menunggumu sampai kau siap pulang...

Elliott_spouse.0: Aroma yang mengiurkan ini menarik perhatianku, tapi 'saus yang enak inilah yang bahkan bisa membungkam jiwaku... *gurgle*$s

Abigail.0: Apa kau tahu...Aku sudah mengalahkan semua ppermainan ini?

Robin.0: Pahat kayu adalah tRadisi kuno, oleh karena itu aku bangga bisa melakukannya.$h

Demetrius.0: Robin bekerja keras atas pekerjaannya... Dia pantas mendapat pujian dari sekarang.

Maru.0: *slurp* mmm... saus barbecue ini sangat lezat.$h

Sebastian.0: Hari ini terlihat semuanya sangat ramai... Sepertinya aku akan mencoba membaur sekali - kali.

Pierre.0: Tokoku menghasilkan produk yang kualitas terbaik di seluruh Valley. Silahkan, Lihat pada stands punyau dan perhatikan baik - baiki!

Caroline.0: Pierre sangat serius dengan kontes ini. Dia sudah menyiapkan produk terbaik selama seminggu ini.#$e#Hei, jika kau juga ikut kontes, aku doakan semoga beruntung!

Linus.0: Para hewan tidak pernah menilai sesuatu dari penampilan saja. Sama seperi manusia.

Alex.0: Aku terlalu banyak bermain permainan 'Strength' dan sekarang tanganku terasa seperti karet.

George.0: Hmm... ada smoked turkey? Aku rasa festival ini sepenuhnya tidak buruk.$h

Evelyn.0: Aku harap Gus membuat makanan sayuran. zucchinni skewers, mungkin?

Lewis.0: Baiklah @, Ini adalah hari yang besar... Festival paling besar di di tahun ini, 'Stardew Valley Fair'.#$b#Jika kau ingin berpartisipasi, Aku sudah menyiapkan satu stand kosong untukmu. Beritahu aku kalau kau sudah menaruh produkmu biar nanti aku bisa menilainya.

Clint.0: Kadang aku merasa muak dengan pekerjaanku, tapi aku bangga dengan pekerjaanku ini.#$b#Banyak logam berharga disini. Aku harap kau akan menyukainya.

Emily.0: Kau tahu, Aku yakin akan menjadi badut yang lucu. Aku rasa, aku kehilangan kesempatanku.

Penny.0: Aku memenangkan 'wheel of chance' 10 kali berturut - turut dan sekarang bapak itu tidak memperbolehkanku bermain lagi...$s

Pam.0: Sebaiknya kau lebih cepat, nak... Sebelum Pam yang tua ini mendapatkan semua ikan di dalam tent! Hehe.$h

Haley.0: Apa kau sudah menemui peramal? Dia ada di dekat pemakaman.#$e#Aku sudah menemuinya... dia mengatakan sesuatu... yang menarik. *hihi*$h

Jodi.0: Badutnya terlihat kurang ceria... Aku rasa walikota Lewis harus memotong upahnya untuk tahun ini.

Kent.0: Aku menungguu badutnya melakukan sesuatu yang lucu.#$e#Benar - benar mengecewakan.

Sam.0: Hei @. Apa kau bersenang - senang?#$e#Permainan 'slingshot' menyenangkan, apalagi jika kau bisa mengumpulkan nilai star token yang banyak.

Leah.0: Aku sangat mengagumi teknik memotong Robin. Aku sering menggunakan tekniknya untuk pekerjaanku.

Shane.0: Semua hewan sangat akrab dan mereka suka di elus - elus.

Marnie.0: Aku mencoba sebisaku, tapi sepertinya produkku akan kalah dengan produk Pierre's.$s#$e#Well, mungkin jurinya akan memberiku poin tambahan untuk keju raksasaku.

Elliott.0: Aku mencoba menanyakan resep masakannya Gus, tapi dia tidak mau memberi tahu.

Gus.0: Makanlah sebanyak yang kau mau! Hari ini semuanya gratis... berterima kasihlah pada walikota Lewis.$h#$e#Oh! Jangan lupa mencicipi masakanku yang baru ini.

Dwarf.0: Kau bilang, ada hujan di atas? *gasp*#$e#Hujan... Bagi kami itu hal yang mistis. Banyak dari ras kami hidup lama tanpa pernah merasakan hujan.

Wizard.0: Welwick dan aku sudah lama saling kenal... dia adalah penyihir yang berbakat, dan teman yang baik.#$e#...#$e#Kau tahu badut itu... Aku rasa, aku pernah menemuinya di suatu tempat.#$e#Di sekolah ilusi kah? Atau mungkin di Carnival of Secrets? Hmm...

Harvey.0: Saat aku keluar kantorku siang pagi ini, Gus sedang membakar daging segar... Hii.$s#$e#Membayangkannya saja sudah membuatku mual...$11

Sandy.0: Aku dengar di rumah sedang hujan. Jadi karena itukah kau datang kesini?$h#$e#Jujur saja, aku merindukan hujan...$s

Marlon.0: Pedang batan Clint semakin tajam tiap tahun.#$e#Harganya juga...

Willy.0: Apa kau ikut kones parade, @? Inilah kesempatanmu untuk menunjukkan produk terbaik dari kebun %farm!

Leo.0: Haha! Aku tidak pernah melihat yang seperti ini sebelumnya...$h

Entries.Abigail_spouse: You'll have to tell me what's beyond, I can't go on... spiders...$s
Entries.Leah_spouse: I may have had a little too much pumpkin ale...
Entries.Maru_spouse: I'm confused... you go on ahead and let me figure this out.
Entries.Penny_spouse: Oh... These vapors... Hmmm... You look nice tonight.$l
Entries.Haley_spouse: I get scared easily... I think I'm just going to stay right here.$s
Entries.Sebastian_spouse: It would be interesting to have one of these on the farm.
Entries.Sam_spouse: Hey, I was wondering when you'd show up!$h
Entries.Harvey_spouse: Hi... I was hoping you'd find me here...$l
Entries.Elliott_spouse: Mmph... I believe I've eaten a few too many slices of pumpkin pie.
Entries.Robin: Well, winter's almost here. It's a great time to stockpile wood and stone.
Entries.Demetrius: I haven't seen Maru in hours... I hope she's alright.
Entries.Maru: I think I've already been this way... no, wait...$s#$e#I'm lost...$s
Entries.Sebastian: I have no idea how these skeletons are walking... creepy.#$e#It's pretty cool though.
Entries.Caroline: I get scared very easily. I'll leave the haunted maze to the younger people.
Entries.Alex: There's something weird over there. But how do I get to it?#$e#There's gotta be a secret passage somewhere around here.
Entries.George: Hmm... smoked turkey haunch? I guess this festival isn't all bad.$h
Entries.Evelyn: I wish Gus would include a vegetarian option. Some zucchinni skewers, maybe?
Entries.Lewis: Good evening, @. Have you ventured into the haunted maze yet? It's quite spooky.#$e#That strange man who lives in the tower set it all up himself. He wouldn't let anyone near while he was working on it.
Entries.Clint: One of my iridium-infused maces would make quick work of these things.
Entries.Emily: Do you like the jack-o-lanterns? I carved them myself.
Entries.Penny: The vapor from this cauldron... it's making my head spin, but I can't seem to leave...$u
Entries.Pam: I'll come to any event with free grub! You won't see me in the haunted maze, though.
Entries.Jodi: Vincent's upset that I won't let him go into the haunted maze... but he's just a little boy!
Entries.Sam: That's odd... It's just a dead end up ahead.#$e#I could've sworn there was someone ahead of me when I went through the maze, though. Where'd they go?
Entries.Leah: Mm, hi. Sorry... mouth full of blackberries.
Entries.Marnie: Hi, @. Have you had a productive fall?#$e#It's starting to get quite cold... crops won't hold out for much longer.
Entries.Elliott: Why, hello @. It's chilly, isn't it?
Entries.Gus: It's a lot of fun to cook with pumpkin. Such an interesting fruit.
Entries.Dwarf: You say it's raining up above? *gasp*#$e#Rain... It's almost mythical to us. Some of us live our entire lives without ever experiencing it.
Entries.Wizard: The affairs of mundane folk matter little to me, but the elementals like a chance to see you up close.#$e#It was for them that I created this silly maze.
Entries.Harvey: Oh! You found me...$8#$b#The truth is, I got too scared so I came here to hide. Don't tell anyone.$s
Entries.Shane: Why is there no more pumpkin ale?
Entries.Sandy: I heard it's raining back home. Is that why you came here?$h#$e#I kind of miss the rain, actually...$s
Entries.Jas: But Aunt Marnie! I wanna go in the maze! I'm not scared!$s
Entries.Vincent: Mother won't let me go in the maze. *sob*$s
Entries.Marlon: Don't get too close to the cage.
Entries.Leo: %Leo's unblinking eyes are glued to the screen. You're unable to get his attention.

Abigail_spouse.0: Kau hArus beritahu aku apa yang ada di dalam sana, Aku tidak bisa kesana... laba - laba...$s

Leah_spouse.0: Aku mungkin terlalu banyak minum jus labu...

Maru_spouse.0: Aku pusing... pergilah duluan nanti aku menyusul.

Penny_spouse.0: Oh... asapnya terlalu banyak... Hmmm... kau terlihat tampan malam ini.$l

Haley_spouse.0: Aku takut... Aku pikir lebih baik aku tetap disini.$s

Sebastian_spouse.0: Pasti seru, kalau permainan seperti ini ada di kebun.

Sam_spouse.0: Hey, Aku daritadi berpikir kapan kau datang!$h

Harvey_spouse.0: Hai... sebelumnya aku berharap kau bisa menemukanku disini...$l

Elliott_spouse.0: Mmph... Aku rasa aku terlalu banyak memakan kua labu.

Abigail.0: Aku tidak bisa kesana... laba - laba...$s

Robin.0: Hmm, sebentar lagi musim dingin akan datang. Musim itu adalah waktu yang tepat untuk mengumpulkan kayu dan batu.

Demetrius.0: Dari tadi aku belum melihat Maru... Aku harap dia baik - baik saja.

Maru.0: Aku pikir, aku sudah melewati tempat ini... eh, tunggu...$s#$e#Aku tersesat...$s

Sebastian.0: Aku tidak mengerti bagaimana tengkorak itu bisa bergerak... seram.#$e#walau seram aku pikir menarik.

Caroline.0: Aku ini penakut. Aku serahkan semuanya pada anak - anak muda.

Alex.0: Ada sesuatu yang aneh disana. Tapi bagaimana aku bisa kesana?#$e#Pasti ada jalur rahasia disekitar sini.

George.0: Hmm... smOked turkey? Aku rasa festival ini tak terlalu buruk.$h

Evelyn.0: Aku harap Gus juga memasak sayur. Zucchinni skewers, contohnya?

Lewis.0: Selamat malam, @. Apa kau sudah masuk ke 'labirin berhantunya'? Di sana sedikit menyeramkan.#$e#Orang aneh yang tinggal dimenara hutan yang menyiapkan semua ini. Waktu itu dia tidak memperbolehkan siapaun mendekati tempat ini saat dia mempersipkan semuanya.

Clint.0: Salah satu tongkat iridiumku akan sangat berguna di tempat ini.

Emily.0: Apa kau suka jack-o-lanterns? Aku yang membuatnya sendiri.

Penny.0: Asap - asap ini... mempuat kepalaku pusing, tapi aku tidak bisa keluar...$u

Pam.0: Aku datang ke festival karena makanan gratis! Jadi kau tidak akan menemukanku di dalam labirin.

Jodi.0: Vincent marah saat aku melarangnya masuk ke labirin... tapi dia hanya anak kecil!

Sam.0: Ini aneh... Di depan jalan buntu.#$e#Aku yakin ada seseorang yang telah mendahuluiku saat mencari jalan.

Leah.0: Mm, hai. Maaf... mulutku penuh dengan blackberries.

Marnie.0: Hai, @. APakah produksimu bagus musim gugur ini?#$e#Cuacanya sudah mulai mendingin... Tananman tidak tahan dengan cuaca dingin.

Elliott.0: Oh, hai @. Disini dingin, iya kan?

Gus.0: Aku senang memasak labu. benar - benar buah yang menarik.

Dwarf.0: Kau bilang, ada hujan di atas? *gasp*#$e#Hujan... Bagi kami itu hal yang mistis. Banyak dari ras kami hidup lama tanpa pernah merasakan hujan.

Wizard.0: Aku tidak terlalu peduli dengan urusan dunia, tapi para roh ingin melihat para warga senang.#$e#KArena itulah aku membuat labirin aneh ini.

Harvey.0: Oh! Kau menemukanku...$8#$b#Sebenarnya, aku terlalu takut jadi aku kesini untuk sembunyi. Jangan bilang siapa - siapa.$s

Shane.0: Kenapa tidak ada jus labu disini?

Sandy.0: Aku dengar di rumah sedang hujan. Jadi karena itukah kau datang kesini?$h#$e#Jujur saja, aku merindukan hujan...$s

Jas.0: Tapi bibi Marnie! Aku ingin masuk ke labirin! Aku tidak takut!$s

Vincent.0: Ibu tidak mengizinkanku masuk ke labirin. *sob*$s

Entries.Abigail_spouse: Go away, we're adversaries until the egg hunt is over!$h
Entries.Leah_spouse: I never had many friends in town, so these events are always kind of boring for me. I enjoy the buffet, though.
Entries.Maru_spouse: I'm just catching up with Penny. Have you had your fill of eggs?
Entries.Penny_spouse: Maru's trying to convince me to eat a deviled egg. I'm just not sure I can stomach it...
Entries.Haley_spouse: I was going to eat some eggs, but then I remembered I'm on a spring diet.
Entries.Sebastian_spouse: I'll be rooting for you in the egg hunt.$h
Entries.Sam_spouse: The gang's just the same as always. Are you having a good time?
Entries.Alex_spouse: Ungh... I think I ate a dozen too many hard boiled eggs...$s
Entries.Harvey_spouse: How is everyone doing? I'm just taking a break for a little while. I'm looking forward to seeing you in the egg hunt!
Entries.Elliott_spouse: I enjoy seeing you so relaxed, my dear.$h
Entries.Abigail: Searching for eggs is like going on a treasure hunt.$h
Entries.Robin: Spring is a busy time of year... so it's nice to have a day off to catch up with friends.
Entries.Demetrius: Egg... what a strange thing to eat.
Entries.Maru: I always look forward to these gatherings... it makes the valley feel like a real community.
Entries.Sebastian: We used to do a rotten egg toss...#$b#Mayor Lewis put an end to that pretty quick.
Entries.Linus: No one really talks to me... I just come for the deviled eggs.
Entries.Pierre: Hey! How'd you get back here?$u#$b#Don't touch anything.
Entries.Caroline: Abby's always loved the egg hunt, ever since she was a tiny girl.
Entries.Alex: I try to eat at least three eggs every day.#$e#I need that protein for my legs.
Entries.George: What's everyone so happy about? Hmmph...#$b#Eggs... why eggs?
Entries.Evelyn: This festival has been a tradition for as long as I can remember.#$b#Tradition connects us with both the past and the future... it's comforting.
Entries.Penny: The children have been looking forward to this festival for weeks.
Entries.Pam: Hehe... I put something nice into the punch.$h#$e#Shhh... that's just between you and me, kid.
Entries.Emily: I've been up since dawn coloring eggs... it's always my favorite part of the season.$h
Entries.Haley: This festival is alright... but what I'm really looking foward to is the Flower Dance.
Entries.Jodi: Vincent loves this festival... it's a joy to see him so happy.
Entries.Kent: I'm not a big fan of eggs, to tell you the truth.
Entries.Marlon: Even with my bad leg, I never miss a town festival.
Entries.Leah: Mmmm... This fruit punch is unusually good.$h
Entries.Shane: Our hens have been working overtime to prepare for this festival.#$b#They deserve the best tonight... bowls full of sweet yellow corn!$h
Entries.Marnie: Welcome to the Egg Festival... complements of my wonderful brood of hens.
Entries.Elliott: Taking breaks from work can make you more productive in the long run.
Entries.Gus: I hope everyone's enjoying the food... I've been cooking for days to get everything ready.#$b#Fried eggs, boiled eggs, poached eggs, deviled eggs, scrambled eggs, chocolate eggs... you name it!$h
Entries.Dwarf: You say it's raining up above? *gasp*#$e#Rain... it's almost mythical to us. Some of us live our entire lives without ever experiencing it.
Entries.Wizard: Hmm... And what about raw lizard egg sprinkled with blackened marrow?
Entries.Harvey: Eggs definitely have a place in the well-balanced diet.#$e#Oops... I should take off my Doctor's hat for the time being.$11
Entries.Sandy: I heard it's raining back home. Is that why you came here?$h#$e#I kind of miss the rain, actually...$s
Entries.Jas: I hope I can find some eggs before Vincent takes them all...$s
Entries.Vincent: When does the egg hunt start?! I'm so excited!!$h
Entries.Willy: Sometimes I'll hide an egg too well and no one finds it...#$b#Well, until summer rolls around. Then the hot air starts to bring out the rotten smell... Hehe. $h
Entries.???: Ah, the sewers are flowing quickly today. It'll get nice and humid in here... just how I like it.
Entries.Leo: The idea of an egg hunt is a little bit weird... but I guess the eggs don't belong to any of my family members...$s#$b#Oh well, I'll join in anyway!$h
Entries.Abigail_y2: $y 'Do you think I'm too old to do the egg hunt?_Yes_Hmmph... you sound like my Mom!$a_No_Yeah, I guess so. If I'm still having fun, why stop?'
Entries.Robin_y2: It feels great to be outside again after that long, cold winter, doesn't it?
Entries.Demetrius_y2: Hey @, did you get a taste of my carp roe pie?#$b#...What? It is the 'egg' festival, isn't it?
Entries.Maru_y2: Think you'll win the egg hunt this year?
Entries.Sebastian_y2: You know what? I kind of miss the winter... it's simpler, in a way.
Entries.Linus_y2: I'll just slip in a little later and have some food. I'm eyeing that scrumptious looking pie!
Entries.Pierre_y2: Trying to make a back-room deal, huh? Hah! I admire your gumption.
Entries.Caroline_y2: It may be a little boring, but these festivals are a good chance to connect with our neighbors.
Entries.Alex_y2: I wonder what would happen to my arms and legs if I ate thirty eggs a day?
Entries.George_y2: Evelyn made eggs and leeks for breakfast, so I'm in a good mood.$h
Entries.Evelyn_y2: $y 'Do you have hens on your farm?_Yes_Oh, good! I'm sure they lay the most delicious eggs...$h_No_Spring would be a great time to start raising chickens, don't you think?
Entries.Clint_y2: Oh no... *gulp*... It's mostly salad this year...$s
Entries.Penny_y2: Hopefully Vincent will be able to find an egg this year... #$b#It would be good for him to feel like he's a contender.
Entries.Pam_y2: Hey... If you're gonna feed me eggs, I'm gonna need some hot sauce, kid!
Entries.Emily_y2: This year I sewed little pants and hats for some of the eggs. They look adorable!$h
Entries.Haley_y2: Oh! I still need to get my photo taken at the bunny stand. Does my hair look okay?
Entries.Jodi_y2: Kent always seems a little antsy during big gatherings like this...
Entries.Marlon_y2: Have you ever hunted for slime eggs? Now there's a true challenge...
Entries.Leah_y2: Hmm... The punch isn't as good as last year. It's missing something!
Entries.Shane_y2: Some of these eggs were laid just this morning. See? They're still warm!
Entries.Marnie_y2: Hens lay the eggs, but roosters play an important role, too... they protect the hens and prevent them from fighting with each other!#$b#That means happier hens and better eggs...$h
Entries.Elliott_y2: Be careful you don't accidentally take a raven's egg. They'll hold a grudge against you for the rest of their days!
Entries.Gus_y2: Shh... don't tell anyone, but I tried something different this year... Duck eggs in the custard!$h
Entries.Harvey_y2: Eggs are fine, but I'd advise against eating thirty per day!
Entries.Jas_y2: I'm going to try my best to win this year!
Entries.Vincent_y2: I want to live inside a big egg!
Entries.Willy_y2: Aye... on rainy days, you'll find catfish in these waters. They're a challenging catch, but well worth the effort!

Maru_spouse.0: Aku sedang bicara dengan Penny. Apa kau sudah mencoba makan hidangannya?

Penny_spouse.0: Maru mencoba mengajakku memakan deviled egg. Aku tidak yakin perutku bisa menghadapinya...

Haley_spouse.0: Aku sudah makan banyak telur, lalu aku ingat, seharusnya aku diet hari ini.

Sebastian_spouse.0: Aku akan mendukungmu di lomba nanti.$h

Sam_spouse.0: Warga lain senang seperti biasanya. Apa kau juga senang?

Alex_spouse.0: Uhhh... Aku pikir aku terlalu banyak makan...$s

Elliott_spouse.0: Aku senang bisa melihatmu bersantai, sayangku.$h

Abigail.0: Berburu telur rasanya sama seperti berburu harta karun.$h

Maru.0: Aku selalu menantikan acara - acara seperti ini... Karena aku senang melihat semua warga lain berkumpul.

Sebastian.0: Di acara ini, kami biasanya melakukan lomba lempar telur...#$b#tapi walikota Lewis melarang lomba itu.

Linus.0: Tidak ada yang ingin bicara denganku... Aku datang hanya karena disini ada telur.

Pierre.0: Hei! Bagaimana kau bisa berada di belakang tenda?$u#$b#Jangan sentuh apapun.

Caroline.0: Abby sangat menyukai berburu telur, bahkan sejak dia masih kecil.

Alex.0: Aku ingin memakan 3 telur setiap hari.#$e#Aku butuh protein untuk kakiku.

George.0: Mengapa semuanya terlihat senang hari ini? Hmmph...#$b#Apa karena telur?... kenapa harus telur?

Evelyn.0: Seingatku,festival ini adalah tradisi turuun temurun kota kita.#$b#Tradisi menghubungkan kita dengan masa lalu dan masa depan... Oleh karena itu kita harus merayakannya.

Penny.0: Anak - anak menantikan festival ini dari minggu lalu.

Pam.0: Hehe... Aku menaruh sesuatu ke dalam makanannya.$h#$e#Shhh... ini rahasia kita berdua ya, nak.

Emily.0: Aku bangun pagi - pagi untuk mewarnai telurnya... karena itu adalah bagian favoritku di musim ini.$h

Haley.0: Festival ini tidak buruk... tapi festival yang aku nantikan adalah festival Flower Dance.

Jodi.0: Vincent menyukai festival ini... Senang bisa melihatnya seceria itu.

Kent.0: Aku sebenarnya tidak terlalu suka telur, asal kau tahu saja.

Marlon.0: Bahkan dengan kaki lumpuhku ini, aku tidak pernah melewatkan festival kota.

Shane.0: Ayam kami sudah bekerja keras untuk mempersiapkan festival ini.#$b#Malam ini aku akan memberi mereka... sekotak penuh jagung kuning manis!$h

Marnie.0: Selamat datang di Festival telur... persembahan untuk ayam - ayam petelur kota kita.

Elliott.0: Beristirahat dari kerja akan membuatmu santai untuk pekerjaan selanjutnya.

Gus.0: Aku harap semuanya menikmati hidangannya... Aku sudah memasak dari kemarin untuk mempersiapkan semuanya.#$b#Aku sudah buat telur goreng, telur rebus, telur ceplok, sup telur, telur coklat... dan masih banyak lagi!$h

Dwarf.0: Kau bilang di permukaan ada hujan? #$e#Hujan... Aku tidak pernah merasakan hujan. Banyak diantara kami yang tidak pernah melihat hujan sebelumnya.

Wizard.0: Hmm... Apakah disini juga ada telur kadal?

Harvey.0: Telur itu makanan yang cocok untuk diet.#$e#Upps... Seharusnya aku tidak berbicara seperti dokter untuk hari ini.$11

Sandy.0: Aku dengar kkota Pelican sedang hujan sekarang. Jadi apakah karena itu kau datang kesini?$h#$e#hadehh..Aku jadi merindukan hujan...$s

Jas.0: Aku harap, aku bisa mendapatkan semua telur sebelum Vincent mengambil semuanya...$s

Vincent.0: Kapan lombanya dimulai?! Aku tidak sabar lagi!!$h

Willy.0: Terkadang aku menyembunyikan telurnya terlalu bagus sampai - sampai tidak ada yang bisa menemukannya...#$b#Dan, pada saat musim panas. Udara panas membawa aroma busuk telur tadi... Hehe. $h

???.0: Ah, Saluran pembuangan benar - benar penuh hari ini. Seperti yang aku suka... lembab dan nyaman.

Leo.0: The idea of an egg hunt is a little bit weird... but I guess the eggs don't belong to any of my family members...$s#$b#Oh well, I'll join in anyway!$h

Abigail_y2.0: $y 'Do you think I'm too old to do the egg hunt?_Yes_Hmmph... you sound like my Mom!$a_No_Yeah, I guess so. If I'm still having fun, why stop?'

Robin_y2.0: It feels great to be outside again after that long, cold winter, doesn't it?

Demetrius_y2.0: Hey @, did you get a taste of my carp roe pie?#$b#...What? It is the 'egg' festival, isn't it?

Maru_y2.0: Think you'll win the egg hunt this year?

Sebastian_y2.0: You know what? I kind of miss the winter... it's simpler, in a way.

Linus_y2.0: I'll just slip in a little later and have some food. I'm eyeing that scrumptious looking pie!

Pierre_y2.0: Trying to make a back-room deal, huh? Hah! I admire your gumption.

Caroline_y2.0: It may be a little boring, but these festivals are a good chance to connect with our neighbors.

Alex_y2.0: I wonder what would happen to my arms and legs if I ate thirty eggs a day?

George_y2.0: Evelyn made eggs and leeks for breakfast, so I'm in a good mood.$h

Evelyn_y2.0: $y 'Do you have hens on your farm?_Yes_Oh, good! I'm sure they lay the most delicious eggs...$h_No_Spring would be a great time to start raising chickens, don't you think?

Clint_y2.0: Oh no... *gulp*... It's mostly salad this year...$s

Penny_y2.0: Hopefully Vincent will be able to find an egg this year... #$b#It would be good for him to feel like he's a contender.

Pam_y2.0: Hey... If you're gonna feed me eggs, I'm gonna need some hot sauce, kid!

Emily_y2.0: This year I sewed little pants and hats for some of the eggs. They look adorable!$h

Haley_y2.0: Oh! I still need to get my photo taken at the bunny stand. Does my hair look okay?

Jodi_y2.0: Kent always seems a little antsy during big gatherings like this...

Marlon_y2.0: Have you ever hunted for slime eggs? Now there's a true challenge...

Leah_y2.0: Hmm... The punch isn't as good as last year. It's missing something!

Shane_y2.0: Some of these eggs were laid just this morning. See? They're still warm!

Marnie_y2.0: Hens lay the eggs, but roosters play an important role, too... they protect the hens and prevent them from fighting with each other!#$b#That means happier hens and better eggs...$h

Elliott_y2.0: Be careful you don't accidentally take a raven's egg. They'll hold a grudge against you for the rest of their days!

Gus_y2.0: Shh... don't tell anyone, but I tried something different this year... Duck eggs in the custard!$h

Harvey_y2.0: Eggs are fine, but I'd advise against eating thirty per day!

Jas_y2.0: I'm going to try my best to win this year!

Vincent_y2.0: I want to live inside a big egg!

Willy_y2.0: Aye... on rainy days, you'll find catfish in these waters. They're a challenging catch, but well worth the effort!

afterEggHunt.19: speak Lewis "Wow, lihat semua telur yang terkumpul!$h#$b#Kalau saja semangat kalian memungut sampah sama besarnya, kota kita akan menjadi kota paling bersih di wilayah Gem Sea! *chuckle*$h"
afterEggHunt.22: speak Lewis "Dan sekarang, pemenang egg hunt tahun ini adalah..."
afterEggHunt.35: speak Lewis "Oke, cukup sampai sini Egg Festival tahun ini. Semuanya, terimakasih sudah datang!"

AbbyWin.13: speak Lewis "Oke, cukup sampai sini Egg Festival tahun ini. Semuanya, terimakasih sudah datang!"

mainEvent.17: speak Lewis "Saatnya acara utama dimulai... Spring Egg Hunt Tahunan!$h"
mainEvent.22: speak Lewis "Tenang, semuanya. Simpan tenaga kalian untuk mencari telurnya dan pemenang akan mendapatkan hadiah ekslusif."

Entries.Abigail: I really hate dancing in front of everyone... It's so embarrassing.#$e#Mom makes me do it.$u
Entries.Robin: Ahh... The air smells so sweet with all these flowers.$h
Entries.Demetrius: These springtime dances can be traced back to ancient fertility rituals.#$e#Hey... You should know about this stuff, farmer.
Entries.Maru: I like dancing, but this one is a little stilted. The old timers really love it, though.
Entries.Linus: Oh, hello there. It's nice of you to talk to me.#$b#Spring is almost over... what a shame.
Entries.Pierre: What! How'd you get back here?$u#$b#Don't touch anything.
Entries.Caroline: I wish Pierre would spend this time with the family...$s
Entries.Alex: I'm just enjoying the scenery... hehe.
Entries.George: Flowers? I can hardly see them.#$e#It's too bright out here!
Entries.Evelyn: I've been working on these floral arrangements for a week. Do you like them?
Entries.Lewis: If you'd like to dance with the other young people, you'll need to find a partner.
Entries.Clint: I wonder if Emily would dance with me?
Entries.Pam: Now this is the life... Huh, kid? Sweet wine, a babbling brook, warm air... Did I mention wine?
Entries.Emily: Whoo... I'm stuffed. Hey, have you tried the red jelly yet?
Entries.Haley: I'm practicing my dance moves... It needs to be perfect.#$e#I've been flower queen for the past 5 years and I'm not ready to step off the throne just yet!
Entries.Jodi: Are you going to be dancing today, @?$h
Entries.Kent: This open field... it makes me nervous.#$e#*whisper* Happy thoughts, Kent. Happy Thoughts.
Entries.Sam: You know what? I admit it... I really like flowers!
Entries.Leah: Hi @. Glad to see you here.$h
Entries.Shane: Mmm... excellent sauce. *slurp*#$e#Ah, this green stuff is spicy! *munch*#$b#*crunch* ...ow.$s
Entries.Marnie: *sigh*... Love is in the air... And I'm still single.$s
Entries.Elliott: I wore my best shirt for the dance... This sort of thing doesn't happen very often!
Entries.Gus: Frog season is really starting to pick up.
Entries.Dwarf: You say it's raining up above? *gasp*#$e#Rain... It's almost mythical to us. Some of us live our entire lives without ever experiencing it.
Entries.Harvey: I'm working up the courage to ask someone to dance with me.$11
Entries.Sandy: I heard it's raining back home. Is that why you came here?$h#$e#I kind of miss the rain, actually...$s
Entries.Jas: Some day, I'm going to be the flower queen!
Entries.Vincent: That's not fair... Why can't I be the flower queen?
Entries.Willy: I should've brought my fishing pole.
Entries.Leo: The flowers here are nice, but they aren't as colorful as back home!$h#$e#I wonder if I'll ever have to get up there and dance...$u

Abigail.0: Aku sebenarnya benci harus menari dihadapan orang... Itu memalukan.#$e#Ibu yang memaksaku melakukannya.$u

Robin.0: Ahh... Udara jadi sejuk karena bunga - bunga.$h

Demetrius.0: Tarian musim semi ini dulunya adalah ritual kuno untuk upacara kesuburan.#$e#Hei... Kau seharusnya tahu tentang ini.

Maru.0: Aku suka menari, tapi tradisi ini menurutku terlalu kaku. Tapi, orang tua sepertinya menyukai radisi ini.

Linus.0: Oh, hai. Senang bisa icara denganmu.#$b#Musim semi hampir selesai... sayang sekali.

Pierre.0: Apa! Bagaimana kamu bisa berada di balik sini?$u#$b#Jangan sentuh apapun.

Caroline.0: Aku harap Pierre lebih mementingkan keluarganya daripada usaha...$s

Alex.0: Aku baru saja menikmati pemandangan ini... hehe.

George.0: Bunga? Aku tidak bisa melihatnya.#$e#Di sini terlalu terang!

Evelyn.0: Aku yang membuat hiasan bunganya seminggu ini. Apa kau menyukainya?

Lewis.0: Jika kau ingin menari, carilah pasanganmu.

Clint.0: Aku penasaran apakah Emily mau menari denganku?

Pam.0: Wahh, inilah hidup... Huh, nak? Wine manis, suara air yang mengalir, udara yang hangat... Eh..Apa adku tadi bilang wine?

Emily.0: Wahhh... Aku kenyang. Hei, Apa kau sudah mencoba makan jelly merah?

Haley.0: Aku sedang berlatih menari... agar nanti terlihat sempurna.#$e#Aku sudah menjadi ratu bunga selama 5 tahun ini dan aku tidak mau kehormatan itu!

Jodi.0: Apa kau akan menari hari ini, @?$h

Kent.0: Lapangan besar seperti ini... membuatku gugup.#$e#*bisik* Kent. Pikirkan hal menyenangkan. Pikirkan hal menyenangkan.

Sam.0: Apa kau tahu? Jujur... Aku sangat menyukai bunga!

Leah.0: Hai @. Senang bisa bertemu denganmu disini.$h

Shane.0: Mmm... sausnya enak. *slurp*#$e#Ah, makanan hijau ini tenyata sangat pedas! *munch*#$b#*crunch* ...ow.$s

Marnie.0: *huuh*... Cinta ada di udara... dan aku masih single.$s

Elliott.0: Aku membawa pakaian terbaikku untuk menari... Hal ini tidak biasa aku lakukan!

Dwarf.0: Kau bilang, ada hujan di atas? *gasp*#$e#Hujan... Bagi kami itu hal yang mistis. Banyak dari ras kami hidup lama tanpa pernah merasakan hujan.

Harvey.0: Aku sedang mengumpulkan keberanian untuk mengajak seseorang menari denganku hari ini.$11

Sandy.0: Aku dengar di rumah sedang hujan. Jadi karena itukah kau datang kesini?$h#$e#Jujur saja, aku merindukan hujan...$s

Jas.0: Suatu hari nanti, aku akan menjadi ratu bunga!

Vincent.0: Tidak adil... Kenapa aku tidak boleh jadi ratu bunga?

Leo.0: Dibandingkan dengan rumahku, bunga-bunga di sini sangat cantik, tapi kurang bewarna!$h#$e#Apakah suatu saat aku bisa ikut menari juga...$u

Entries.Governor: What a lovely occasion... It's always a joy to visit Stardew Valley.#$e#I must speak to the missus about purchasing a vacation home here.
Entries.Abigail_spouse: Don't let me stop you from having fun today. I just feel like watching the sea by myself.
Entries.Leah_spouse: It's nice to see everyone once in a while, but mostly I want to get back to the farm.
Entries.Maru_spouse: Harvey keeps trying to talk to me, but all I want is a piece of this roast.
Entries.Penny_spouse: I'm just humoring some old friends. What I really want is a bowl of that soup.
Entries.Haley_spouse: Phew... I'm afraid to move, or else I might start to sweat.
Entries.Sebastian_spouse: I'm doing my best to stay in a good mood...
Entries.Sam_spouse: I guess it wouldn't be very nice to put something nasty in the soup...
Entries.Alex_spouse: Hey, I'll take any excuse to come hang out at the beach. This weather is amazing!
Entries.Harvey_spouse: Oh dear... I've got sand in my socks...$s
Entries.Elliott_spouse: The old cabin seems to be holding up well. Every time I return I half expect the thing to be rotted...
Entries.Abigail: It's tiring to socialize with everyone... I'd rather watch the sea.
Entries.Robin: Ow... you stepped on my foot, dear.
Entries.Demetrius: This is tiring, honey. Are you ready to visit the buffet soon? *pant*
Entries.Maru: Whatever Linus is roasting smells awfully good... *slurp*
Entries.Sebastian: One year Sam put a pound of anchovies in the potluck soup.#$e#Ever wondered why Sam leads the town in community service hours?$h
Entries.Linus: A slow, continuous rotation is key to achieving the perfect roast.
Entries.Pierre: Hmm... maybe if I get on the governor's good side he'll give my business a tax break...#$b#I wonder if he likes aged whiskey?#$e#Now if only the Mayor would stop shmoozing with him all afternoon.
Entries.Caroline: I put fresh vegetables from my garden into the communal soup pot.
Entries.Alex: Perfect weather for a beach party, huh?
Entries.George: That music! It's too loud.#$b#Can't I have a little peace and quiet to enjoy the ocean?
Entries.Evelyn: Ahh... The smell of the ocean takes me back many years. Long before you were born.
Entries.Lewis: Look sharp! The governor's here for his annual visit.#$b#If you brought something for the potluck make sure and add it to the soup cauldron.
Entries.Clint: I'm full, but what else is there to do besides eat?
Entries.Penny: We do this festival every year to give the governor a taste of everything the valley has to offer.#$e#Mayor Lewis hopes it will get the governor on our good side. That's why he's so neurotic about the way the soup tastes.
Entries.Pam: Heh... free buffet. One of the perks of living here. Enjoy it, kid!
Entries.Haley: I would dance, but I don't want to get sweaty.
Entries.Jodi: I hope the soup is good this year.
Entries.Marlon: I'll be back here by the trees... the air is a lot cooler.
Entries.Sam: Governor? Who cares...#$e#Why should I care about some random old guy?
Entries.Leah: How's the farming coming along? It must be a busy season for you.
Entries.Shane: Wow... you don't get hot pepper chutney like this in the big city...
Entries.Marnie: If you brought something for the soup, climb the stairs on the other side and throw it in.
Entries.Elliott: I woke up late, stepped out of the door and found myself in the middle of all this hubbub!#$e#I forgot that today was the Luau.$h
Entries.Gus: These blasted sand-flies keep landing on the food!
Entries.Dwarf: You say it's raining up above? *gasp*#$e#Rain... It's almost mythical to us. Some of us live our entire lives without ever experiencing it.
Entries.Wizard: The merpeople are curious about your festivities.#$e#They become upset when you litter into the ocean.
Entries.Harvey: Good thing I came with sunscreen.#$e#I wonder if Maru could use some sunscreen on her shoulders?
Entries.Sandy: I heard it's raining back home. Is that why you came here?$h#$e#I kind of miss the rain, actually...$s
Entries.Willy: Hi there, @. Taking a breather?#$e#To tell you the truth, I'd rather be fishing right now.
Entries.Leo: Shhh... I'm learning the secrets of the perfect roast.

mainEvent.23: speak Lewis "Oke teman-teman, sekali lagi sudah saatnya untuk potluck.#$b#Saya percaya kalian semua memasukan bahan berkualitas dalam pancinya tahun ini. Kita tidak mau Pak Gubernur menyesali kunjunganya ke mari!"
mainEvent.27: speak Lewis "Jadi... Pak Gubernur? Jika anda tidak keberatan, silahkan dicicipi supnya"
mainEvent.29: speak Governor "Tentu saja! Saya sudah menantikan ini sepanjang tahun."

governorReaction6.2: speak Governor "Hmm... agak tajam, tapi rasanya lumayan enak!"
governorReaction6.5: speak Governor "Sebentar... ada sesuatu di dalam mangkukku... ini apa?$2"
governorReaction6.25: speak Governor "ini... ini keterlaluan!$1#$b#Saya tidak pernah merasa lebih terhina sepanjang hidup saya!$1"
governorReaction6.33: speak Governor "Bweh... lidahku terasa bengkak... sepertinya aku mau muntah.$u"
governorReaction6.43: speak Lewis "Siapapun yang ambil bagian dalam tidakan mengerikkan ini benar-benar keterlaluan. Menggunakan barang pribadi saya untuk untuk hal seperti ini!$4#$b#Selain itu merusak rasa sup kita... tidak bisa di maafkan! Saya tidak pernah lebih malu atas komunitas ini... Benar-benar menjijikkan.$4"
governorReaction6.47: speak Lewis "Pulang sana, perayaan ini sudah berakhir.$s"
governorReaction6.51: message "Kurasa 'lelucon kecil' itu tidak berjalan terlalu baik..."

governorReaction5.24: speak Lewis "Nah sekarang... ada yang mau makan sup?"
governorReaction5.35: message "Supnya hambar, tapi Luau ini masih tetap menyenangkan!"

governorReaction4.19: speak Lewis "Anda benar... Ini enak sekali!$h"
governorReaction4.22: speak Lewis "Kerja hebat, semuanya! Oke, ada lagi yang mau coba?$h"
governorReaction4.33: message "Wow, Pak Gubernur tidak bercanda... sup ini luar biasa!"

governorReaction3.18: speak Lewis "Nah... siapa lagi yang mau sup?"
governorReaction3.29: message "Acara Luau yang sukses! Untung saja aku bawa sesuatu yang enak buat supnya."

governorReaction2.22: speak Lewis "Yah... ada lagi yang mau sup?"
governorReaction2.33: message "Supnya biasa-biasa saja, tapi selain itu acara Luaunya sukses!"

governorReaction1.34: message "Supnya tidak terlalu enak, tapi selain itu acara Luaunya sukses!"

governorReaction0.6: speak Governor "Bweh! Ini....bweh. Kurasa aku akan sakit... $u"

Governor.0: Benar - benar menyenangkan... Aku selalu ceria saat mengunjungi Stardew Valley.#$e#Sepertinya aku akan membangun rumah di sini.

Sebastian_spouse.0: Aku berusaha sebisaku agar tidak bosan...

Demetrius.0: Ini melelahkan, sayang. Apa kau belum mau makan? *hah*

Maru.0: Apapun yang dimasak Linus selalu enak... *slurp*

Caroline.0: Aku menaruh sayur segar dari taman belakang rumah, ke dalam pot.

Alex.0: Cuaca yang indah untuk bermain voli, ya kan?

Evelyn.0: Ahh... Aroma laut, mengingatkanku masa muda. Lama sebelum kau lahir.

Lewis.0: Semangatlah! Gubernur datang  pada kunjungan tahunannya.#$b#Jika kau membawa sesuatu pastikan kau memasukkannya kedalam pot.

Clint.0: Aku kenyang, memangnya hal apa lagi yang bisa dilakukan selain makan?

Pam.0: Hehe... makanan gratis. Aku bisa makan sepuasnya. Nikmatilah!

Haley.0: Aku ingin menari, tapi aku tidak mau berkeringat.

Jodi.0: Aku harap supnya bakal enak tahun ini.

Marlon.0: Aku akan berteduh di bawah pohon ini... udaranya sangat sejuk.

Sam.0: Guberrnur? Siapa peduli...#$e#Kenapa juga aku harus peduli kepada orang tua yang tidak kukenal?

Shane.0: Wau... kau tidak akan bisa mendapat pepper chutney seenak ini dai kota lain...

Marnie.0: Jika kau membawa sesuatu untuk sup, Panjatlah tangga itu dan masukkan bahan intu ke dalam pot.
