Entries.Leah_spouse: Hey. I'm paying my respects to another bygone summer. I'll come meet up with you when we launch the candle-boat.
Entries.Abigail: Such a rare and exciting thing...
Entries.Robin: *yawn*... It's past my bed-time.$s#$e#Hey, did you see that candle-boat? I crafted it myself.$h
Entries.Demetrius: The 'Moonlight Jelly'... what a remarkable species! We're very lucky that they stop here on their long journey south.#$e#It's unknown why they are attracted to light... very curious.
Entries.Maru: It's kind of cold, actually. I guess fall is right around the corner.
Entries.Sebastian: I thought I saw something moving in there... something big, something dark.#$e#Just trying to scare you...$h
Entries.Pierre: Psst... Make sure to swing by the shop tomorrow to get your fall seeds!
Entries.Caroline: These candles are romantic, aren't they?
Entries.Linus: I'll just sneak up when the jellies arrive... I don't want to bother anyone.
Entries.Alex: I can't believe summer's over... I feel like it just started.$s
Entries.George: What, why are you looking at me like that? You think I'm too old to enjoy something like this?
Entries.Evelyn: I remember seeing the jellies once, as a little girl. Oh, how I jumped with joy when they arrived!#$e#But that was long ago... I'm a lot less energetic now.
Entries.Lewis: Good evening, @. The Moonlight Jellies are close... I already saw one glowing in the distance.#$b#Once we launch the candle-boat they'll come up to the docks and say hello.
Entries.Clint: I wore my special shoes tonight... No one noticed.$s
Entries.Emily: Look out there, at the endless sea. Deep underwater, all kinds of life forms are moving around in the dark.#$b#Eerie, isn't it?
Entries.Penny: Life is so easy for a jellyfish... just letting the waves carry you onward forever.
Entries.Pam: Don't tell Gus, but I'm a little disappointed there's no buffet tonight.
Entries.Haley: I should've brought my camera! I always forget.$s
Entries.Jodi: There! I just saw something glowing!#$b#Oh... It's gone.$s
Entries.Kent: Good evening, @. Hope you can find some time to relax before the harvest season.
Entries.Sam: I wonder if they're poisonous?#$e#Maybe I shouldn't push Sebastian in the water after all...$h
Entries.Leah: Hey. I'm paying my respects to another bygone summer.
Entries.Shane: The jellies were here a year ago, and they'll be back again a year from now... nature is amazing.
Entries.Marnie: That's a heavy load of people for an ancient wooden dock! I'll stay over here near the beach.
Entries.Elliott: If we keep polluting the oceans, the jellies will surely go extinct. It's already in the process of happening.#$e#What a shame... we have no respect for nature anymore.
Entries.Gus: 'Moonlight Jellies'... I wonder how they taste?$h#$b#I would never try it, of course!$u
Entries.Dwarf: You say it's raining up above? *gasp*#$e#Rain... It's almost mythical to us. Some of us live our entire lives without ever experiencing it.
Entries.Wizard: How did you find me back here? I thought I was well-hidden.#$b#Perhaps you are blessed with the gift of clairvoyance.#$e#I'm here to observe the Lunaloos... or 'Moonlight Jellies', as you call them. They possess an unusually potent magical aura for an aquatic life form.
Entries.Harvey: Well, summer's over. To be honest, I'll be happy to say goodbye to these blasted mosquitos!
Entries.Sandy: I heard it's raining back home. Is that why you came here?$h#$e#I kind of miss the rain, actually...$s
Entries.Jas: I hope there are babies this year!
Entries.Vincent: I wanna see the rare green jelly!
Entries.Willy: Most night-fish would be scared of the light... these are strange ones.
Entries.Leo: The moonlight jellies are my old friends... they come to the island every year, too.

Leah_spouse.0: Hei. Aku sedang berdoa untuk musim panas mendatang. Aku akan menemuimu saat peluncuran perahu lentera.

Abigail.0: Ini adalah hal yang jarang dan menyenangkan...

Robin.0: *hoam*... Ini sudah lewat jam tidurku.$s#$e#Hei, Apa kau sudah lihat perahu lenteranya? Aku yang membuatnya.$h

Demetrius.0: Ubur - ubur... benar - benar spesies yang menarik! Kita beruntung mereka lewat pantai ini saat melakukan perjalanan ke selatan mereka.#$e#Aku belum tahu, kenapa mereka tertarik dengan cahaya... Aku jadi penasaran.

Maru.0: Ini festival yang keren. Dan aku rasa musim gugur akan segera tiba.

Sebastian.0: Aku rasa aku melihat sesuatu bergerak disana...bentuknya besar dan gelap.#$e#Haha...Aku hanya mencoba menakutimu...$h

Pierre.0: Psst... Pastikan kau datang ke toko besok untuk membeli bibit musim gugur!

Linus.0: Aku akan kesana saat ubur - uburnya datang... Aku tidak ingin mengganggu siapapun.

Alex.0: Aku tidak percaya musim panas sudah berakhir....$s

George.0: Apa? Apa yang kau lihat? Kau pikir aku terlalu tua untuk menikmati acara seperti ini?

Evelyn.0: Aku ingat waktu kecil, saat pertama kali aku melihat ubur - ubur. Oh, Aku lompat kegirangan ketika mereka mendatangiku!#$e#Tapi itu dulu... Sekarang aku tidak sekuat dulu.

Lewis.0: Selamat malam, @. Ubur - ubur sudah dekat... Aku sudah melihatnya dari bersinar di kejauhan.#$b#Saat kita luncurkan kerahu lenteranya mereka akan mendekati kita.

Clint.0: Aku memakai sepatu baruku malam ini... Tidak ada orang yang peduli.$s

Emily.0: Diat disana, di laut luas. Di dasarnya terdapat berbagai macam mahkluk yang hidup dalam kegelapan.#$b#Menakutkan, bukan?

Penny.0: Hiduplah seperti ubur - ubur... Biarkan ombak membawamu ke arah tujuan selamanya.

Pam.0: Jangan bilang Gus, kalau aku sedikit kecewa, karena tidak ada makanan saat festival kali ini.

Haley.0: Aku seharusnya membawa kameraku! Aku selalu lupa.$s

Jodi.0: Itu! Aku baru saja melihat sesuatu bercahaya!#$b#Oh... sudah hilang.$s

Kent.0: Selamat malam, @. Aku harap kau bisa bersantai malam ini.

Sam.0: Aku penasaran apa ubur - ubur berbahaya?#$e#Aku ingin mendorong Sebastian ke air...$h

Leah.0: Hei. Aku sedang berdoa untuk musim panas mendatang.

Shane.0: Tahun lalu ubur - ubur datang kesini, dan tahun depan mereka juga akan datang kesini... Alam itu memang hebat.

Marnie.0: Orang lain senang berkumpul disana! Aku lebih nyaman di sini.

Elliott.0: Jika kita mengotori laut, ubur - ubur akan punah. sekarang hal itu sebentar lagi akan terjadi.#$e#Aku malu sebagia manusia.

Gus.0: Ubur - ubur... Aku penasaran bagaimana rasanya?$h#$b#Tentu saja aku tidak mau mencobanya!$u

Dwarf.0: Kau bilang, ada hujan di atas? *gasp*#$e#Hujan... Bagi kami itu hal yang mistis. Banyak dari ras kami hidup lama tanpa pernah merasakan hujan.

Wizard.0: Bagaimana kau bisa menemukanku didini? Aku pikir tidak ada yang bisa melihatku disini.#$b#Mungkin kau memiliki mata batin.#$e#Aku disini ingin mengawasi Lunaloos... atau yang biasa kalian sebut 'ubur - ubur'. Mereka mempunyai aura sihir yang aneh sebagai mahkluk air.

Harvey.0: Yahh, musim panas sudah berakhir. Jujur saja, Aku senang, akhirnya bisa meninggalkan musim yang penuh dengan nyamuk itu!

Sandy.0: Aku dengar di rumah sedang hujan. Jadi karena itukah kau datang kesini?$h#$e#Jujur saja, aku merindukan hujan...$s

Jas.0: Aku harap aku bisa melihat bayi ubur - ubur.

Vincent.0: Aku ingin lihat ubur - ubur hijau yang langka!

Willy.0: Kebanyakan ikan malam takut dengan cahaya... Ubur - ubur ini memang aneh.

Leo.0: Moonlight jellies adalah teman lamaku... mereka datang ke pulau setiap tahun nya.

Entries.Penny_spouse: Are you entering the fishing contest this year, @? My mom's pretty serious about winning.
Entries.Haley_spouse: Brr... my hands are freezing from making this snowman.$l
Entries.Sebastian_spouse: Don't worry about me, I never get cold...
Entries.Sam_spouse: Aren't you cold? Are you sure you don't want my jacket?
Entries.Alex_spouse: I'll be rooting for you in the fishing competition.
Entries.Harvey_spouse: I'm dreaming of our warm fire back home...$l
Entries.Elliott_spouse: I know you'll beat me in the fishing competition, but I don't mind. I'm just here for the fun of it.$h
Entries.Abigail: What do you think of my snow-goon?
Entries.Robin: I'm sorry, but carving ice parapets requires my undivided attention!
Entries.Demetrius: You know what? I probably should've worn a jacket.
Entries.Maru: I'm not very creative when it comes to snowmen.$s
Entries.Sebastian: Cold? Nah, I never get cold.
Entries.Pierre: This snow is so cold I can't feel my fingers anymore...$s
Entries.Shane: If it was up to me, I'd probably have a pizza festival at the saloon, instead...
Entries.Caroline: How's winter coming along for you, @?$h
Entries.Linus: Igloo-building's an art I picked up from the tundra dwellers who live beyond the frozen sea.#$e#That was many years ago.$h#$e#An Igloo makes a nice home, but it's easier to just stay in my tent year-round.
Entries.Alex: Snowmen are okay, I guess. But mostly I'm looking forward to the spring.
Entries.George: Hmmph... Wife dragged me out into the cold for this?
Entries.Evelyn: Did I ever tell you how George and I first met? He actually pelted me with a snowball in this very festival.#$e#He was a gentleman back then, and came over to see if I was okay.$h
Entries.Lewis: Welcome to the Festival of Ice!#$e#The highlight of today's festival is the ice fishing competition. We set up this 'frozen lake' and stocked it full of fish.#$b#Just let me know when you're ready to compete.
Entries.Clint: Emily started helping me without any provocation... does that mean something? *gulp*$4
Entries.Emily: Wow, this snowman needs a makeover. Who made this?$s
Entries.Penny: $y 'Hmm... What kind of snowman should we make?_A classic one. Carrot nose, top-hat, scarf._I guess maybe it's best to stick with the classics, huh?$h_Something funky. Icicle antennas, pine cone eyes._Okay! That sounds like fun.$h_Snowmen are boring. Think outside of the box!_Um, okay... I think I might stick with something more conventional.'
Entries.Pam: I plan on winning the ice fishing competition!#$e#Willy is gonna be pretty hard to beat, though... He does this kinda stuff day and night.$s
Entries.Haley: I guess Winter isn't all bad... playing in the snow can be fun!
Entries.Jodi: The forest looks beautiful in the winter, doesn't it?
Entries.Sam: Hey, @. Are you gonna enter the ice fishing competition?#$e#Oh, not me. I don't know how to fish.
Entries.Leah: Oh, ice. A beautiful material to sculpt in, but so impermanent.#$e#But I guess that might make the art even better.
Entries.Marnie: I feel bad for all the poor, cold animals out there.$s
Entries.Elliott: I'm entering the ice fishing competition today. Why not?#$e#It's rare that Willy ever loses, though.
Entries.Gus: Sorry there's no food.#$e#Just wait until the Feast of the Winter Star. You'll be stuffed for days.
Entries.Willy: $y 'Hey, @. Ready for some ice fishing?_Yes. I'll do my best!_That's the spirit!$h_Yes, and I'm going to beat you!_We'll see.$h_To be honest, no. I'm bad at fishing._Well, then think of it as good practice!$h'
Entries.Wizard: Sneaking off to visit my weird tower? You're odd for a mundane.
Entries.Harvey: Extreme temperatures can put your body under a lot of stress, so make sure to bundle up!#$e#Oh, and enjoy the festival!$h
Entries.Sandy: I heard it's raining back home. Is that why you came here?$h#$e#I kind of miss the rain, actually...$s
Entries.Jas: I wanna give him a carrot nose!$h
Entries.Vincent: I saw a big fish down there!
Entries.Leo: You could make an igloo twice as warm if you stuffed feathers in the walls!

Entries.1: Stir Fry/Stir Fry! It's a perfect way to get some healthy greens on your plate. Sautee the greens in a little sesame oil and make sure to add plenty of fresh ginger and garlic. Now breathe deeply... Oh, that's good.
Entries.2: Coleslaw/Coleslaw! Envisioning bland mounds of limp cabbage? You're not alone. But a great coleslaw can be so much more. Make sure you have juicy fresh cabbage for this one. Toss with a little vinegar and mayonnaise and you're all set. Ah, that's crisp.
Entries.3: Radish Salad/Radish Salad! There's nothing like a fresh, peppery radish. It reminds me of the late spring... my mother would slice up our fresh radishes and serve them on grainy bread with a little salt and pepper. Ah, those were the days... but I digress. Now, watch closely...
Entries.4: Omelet/Omelet! This is such a simple dish, but so often done incorrectly! A perfect omelet is a thing of beauty. It's a pure golden angel of gleaming egg, and I'm going to show you my secret method...
Entries.5: Baked Fish/Baked Fish! Whenever I make this one at home, my two cats go bananas. I need a second chef around just to keep them from hopping on the counter for a bite! Just make sure the fish is fresh, preferably caught with your own rod! Now watch as I place the fish on a bed of spring greens...
Entries.6: Pancakes/Pancakes! Sometimes I get carried away with fancy, complicated dishes... but there's something comforting about a simple pancake. You'll want plenty of butter and maple syrup to slather over these warm stacks... mmmm....
Entries.7: Maki Roll/Maki Roll! The delicate flavor of the ocean, sealed within a pillowy cloud of rice. Maybe a bit of wasabi for the adventurous. My mouth is watering as we speak. Oh, how I love sushi...
Entries.8: Bread/Bread! Breadmaking can be a very complex form of art, but I'll make it simple for you. The most important ingredient is flour, of course. But before we create the dough we'll need to activate our yeast. They prefer warm water and a little something to feed on. I use plain sugar, but honey or maple syrup will do!
Entries.9: Tortilla/Tortillas! How many of you are gnawing on a microwaved convenience-burrito while watching this program? Shame on you! You might as well wrap your beans in an old wash rag. Now, listen up. Once you've tried my fresh, rustic corn tortillas you'll never go back...
Entries.10: Trout Soup/Trout Soup! There's something about fresh-caught trout that just gets me buzzing. Maybe it's the subtle taste of the river. At any rate, I've got a wonderful trout soup recipe to share with you today...
Entries.11: Glazed Yams/Glazed Yams! It's yam season, and what better way to enjoy these delightful tubers than by slathering them in a sweet, sticky glaze? You'll need a nice, ripe yam and a whole bunch of sugar. Now, here's how you do it...
Entries.12: Artichoke Dip/Artichoke Dip! This is a delightful way to get more artichokes into your body. Personally, I don't even dip anything in there. I just guzzle the sauce down like it's a milkshake. Delicious.
Entries.13: Plum Pudding/Plum Pudding! Little Jack Horner is champing at the bit for this ooey-gooey delight. And who can blame him? The plums are floral and sweet, with just the right amount of tartness to fully activate every last one of your eager taste buds. You'll just have to try it and see for yourself...
Entries.14: Chocolate Cake/Chocolate Cake! What better way to spend these cold winter nights than digging your way through a rich chocolate mountain? With my help, you'll be well on your way to creating the finest cake you've ever laid eyes on. Now, you're going to need a lot of sugar...
Entries.15: Pumpkin Pie/Pumpkin Pie! In my house, it's a tradition to eat pumpkin pie during the feast of the winter star. The season just isn't complete without that wonderful flavor you can only achieve with the finest farm-fresh pumpkins. A little nutmeg, cinnamon, and clove will sweep you off to a land of crimson and gold...
Entries.16: Cranberry Candy/Cranberry Candy! Here's a fun one to help you celebrate the new year. Cranberries are quite bitter on their own, but submerge them in an ocean of sugar and they'll taste like angel's tears. Here's how you do it...
Entries.17: Pizza/Pizza! There's a reason pizza is a timeless culinary classic. You've got an artisan golden-brown crust, you've got a tangy, garlic-infused marinara sauce, and you're topping it all with a mouth-watering three-cheese blend. And we're just getting started! Let's throw some fresh pepper and tomato on the top. Oh, my!
Entries.18: Hashbrowns/Hashbrowns! This one's simple, but that's a good thing! You'll just want to shred some potatoes, add a liberal amount of salt, and fry to perfection in your favorite high-heat oil. Sounds easy, right? Well, I've got some pointers that'll make your job a lot easier...
Entries.19: Complete Breakfast/Complete Breakfast! Last week I taught you how to make hashbrowns. This week I'll show you how to combine them with other ingredients to create a hearty complete breakfast. This meal will really fill you up and give you the energy you need to get in a hard day's work.
Entries.20: Lucky Lunch/Lucky Lunch! An old legend has it that this meal is irresistable to spirits of luck and fortune. After consuming it, you're likely to attract a good spirit into your belly, where it will bless you with good fortune until the meal is digested! Sounds weird, huh? I can't say I believe it, but the meal is delicious nonetheless!
Entries.21: Carp Surprise/Hey, ever have a bunch of carp laying around and no idea what to do with them? Yeah, me too. Well, I've devised a great solution to this all-too-common problem. I call it... Carp surprise. It's quite easy to make, but you'll need a lot of carp...
Entries.22: Maple Bar/Maple Bars! Ever notice how the maple bars are always first to disappear from the doughnut box? Perplexing, because your average maple bar tastes like a sweet hockey puck. Agree? Well, just wait until you try my recipe. You can really taste the forest in these bars. Okay, you're going to need real, quality maple syrup...
Entries.23: Pink Cake/A viewer from Pelican Town wrote to me recently... let's see... Her name's Haley. She wrote, 'I tried your pink cake last time I was in Zuzu City and I fell in love with it. Could you share the recipe on your next episode?'. Well, why not? It's a marvelous cake. And you'll never guess the secret ingredient... melon!
Entries.24: Roasted Hazelnuts/Roasted Hazelnuts! I've got a nice old hazelnut tree behind my house, and every year I invite the family over for a nut roasting party! Once we start roasting, it's inevitable that the neighbors will show up. That rich, nutty smell is irresistable. Now, here's the family recipe...
Entries.25: Fruit Salad/Fruit Salad! Here's a healthy and delicious treat to brighten up your day. The most important thing to remember is that you need ripe fruit. Forget the bland stuff they sell at the supermarket... I'm talking fresh-picked, juicy, bursting-with-flavor fruit. Okay, now watch closely...
Entries.26: Blackberry Cobbler/Blackberry Cobbler! This one always reminds me of Stardew Valley. There's a few days in fall where the valley is overflowing with the most delicious blackberries I've ever tasted. If you can get your hands on some, I'd highly recommend them for this simple cobbler.
Entries.27: Crab Cakes/Crab Cakes! Crab meat is very flimsy on its own, but mixing it with bread crumbs and egg is a great way to give them some body. That's why these cakes are my favorite way to eat crab! But before you go cracking any shells, stay tuned for my essential seasoning mixture...
Entries.28: Fiddlehead Risotto/Fiddlehead Risotto! Fiddlehead ferns are beautiful, but actually quite bland on their own. That's why you have to pay careful attention to the spices you add. I'll be honest, it's not very easy to make a good fiddlehead risotto. But with my help, you'll have the best chance at achieving it.
Entries.29: Poppyseed Muffin/Poppyseed Muffin! Poppies make beautiful ornamental flowers... but why not make full use of the plant with these delightful muffins? I'm a huge fan of poppy seeds. They're subtle, but they add a nice flavor and a great texture to bready desserts. And they're healthy!
Entries.30: Lobster Bisque/Lobster Bisque! You could serve this one to the governor himself. It's rich, creamy and delicious, with just the right amount of oceanic flavor. The hardest part is finding some lobster, but I'm sure you can do it. Heck, if you're feeling crafty you could catch one yourself with a crab pot!
Entries.31: Bruschetta/Bruschetta! It's a wonderfully simple appetizer that really showcases the quality of the ingredients. You'll need bread, tomato, and oil. First, you'll need to grill the bread. Slice the tomato and place onto the grilled bread. Then drizzle with oil and serve. I told you it was simple!
Entries.32: Shrimp Cocktail/Shrimp Cocktail! Here's another good appetizer for you and your dinner guests. My cocktail sauce is extra zesty, and I'm sure you'll love it. Now, the first step...

1.1: Stir Fry! Makanan ini adalah masakan hijau sehat yang bisa kamu sajikan di atas piringmu. tumis sayuranmu dengan minyak, pastikan kau juga memasukkan bawang putih dan jahe untuk menambah cita rasa. Aduk terus sampai masak... Dan, selesai.

2.1: Coleslaw! Kamu tidak tahu cara memasak kubis? Jangan takut. Tanpa pengalaman memasak anda bisa memasak coleslaw. Cincang satu buah kubis segar. Beri kubis tersebut dengan sedikit cuka dan mayones lalu aduk sampai merata. Selesai.

3.1: Radish Salad! Tidak ada yang lebih segar dibanding, salad lobak. Masakan ini mengingatkanku akan musim semi... Ibuku selalu memotong lobak tipis lalu menyajikannya diatas roti gandum. Ah, hari - hari itu. Sekarang saksikanlah cara pembuatannya...

4.1: Omelet! Masakan yang simple, tapi banyak orang salah dalam penyajiannya! Omelet yang sempurna adalah omelet yang indah dengan kuning telur keemasan, dan sekarang waktunya bagiku untuk menunjukkan resep rahasianya...

5.1: Baked Fish! Setiap kali aku mEmasak masakan ini di rumah, Kedua kucingku mulai bertingkah. Sepertinya aku butuh bantuan hanya untuk menenangkan mereka! Pastikan kau menggunakan ikan segar! Sekarang perhatikan bagaimana aku melapisi bumbu kacang ini ke ikan...

6.1: Pancakes! Kadang aku lebih tertarik dengan masakan yang mewah dan unik... tapi masakan yang simple sangatlah menarik. Tuangkan Mentega dan maple syrup yang banyak diatas lapisan hangatnya... mmmm....

7.1: Maki Roll! Rasa yang kental dengan lautan, dibungkus dengan balutan nasi yang lembut. Dengan sedikit wasabi untuk menambah kenikmatannya. Hanya membayangkannya, mulutku sampai berair. Oh, Aku sangat menyukai sushi...

8.1: Bread! Banyak yang menganggap membuat roti itu sulit, tapi aku akan jelaskan cara pembuatannya yang simple. Bahan yang paling penting tentu saja gandum. tapi sebelum kita membuat adonannya kita harus membberinya sebuah ragi. Lalu, campurkan adonan itu dengan gula, tapi kau juga bisa menggantinya dengan sirup atau madu!

9.1: Tortillas! Sudah berapa banyak burrito instant yang kau makan selagi menonton acara ini? Memalukan sekali! Persiapkan kacang - kacangmu. Sekarang, dengarkan baik - baik. Inilah waktunya anda pertama kali memakan tortilla buatan anda sendiri, anda tidak akan menyesal...

10.1: Trout Soup! Ada satu hal yang kurang disaat kita memancing di sungai. Bagaimana rasa yang mewakili sungai tersebut. Untungnya, Hari ini aku punya resep trout soup spesial yang bisa kamu coba di rumah...

11.1: Glazed Yams! Ini adalah musim yam, dan cara terbaik untuk menikmatinya ialah mencampurkannya dengan sesuatu yang manis, Bagaimana membuatnya? Yang kamu butuhkan satu buah yam utuh dan gula yang banyak. Sekarang, akan kutunjukkan bagaimana cara membuatnya...

12.1: Artichoke Dip! Ini adalah cara yang menarik untuk mengkonsumsi artichokes. Kita sebenarnya tidak membuat bubur sama sekali. Kamu hanya perlu mengocok sausnya seperti milkshake. Sangat enak.

13.1: Plum Pudding! Plums adalah buah yang manis dan harum, jika kamu bisa mengolahnya dengan benar, siapa saja akan tergiur untuk mencobanya. Cobalah dan saksikan sendiri...

14.1: Chocolate Cake! Hal apa yang lebih menyenangkan daripada memakan kue coklat raksasa di malam musim dingin? Dengan bakatku, kau bisa membuat kue terbaik yang belum pernah kau lihat sebelumnya. Pertama, kau butuh gula yang banyak...

15.1: Pumpkin Pie! Memakan pie labu di malam bintang sudah menjadi tradisi di kampung halamanku. Musim itu tidak akan sempurna tanpa mendapatkan rasa labu yang segar dan manis. Kau butuh pala, kayu manis, dan cengkeh agar membuat warnanya coklat keemasan...

16.1: Cranberry Candy! Ini adalah salah satu cara untuk menikmati tahun baru. Cranberries memiliki rasa agak pahit, tapi jika buah ini dicampurkan dengan balutan gula buah ini akan terasa manis seperti air mata malaikat. Inilah cara pembuatannya...

17.1: Pizza! Ada sebuah alasan kenapa pizza menjadi makanan fovorit di berbagai tempat. Kulit garingnya yang menggoda, adonannya yang lembut, saus marinaranya yang dicampur dengan perasa bawang putih, dan diatas semua itu kau bisa memberi topping keju yang menggugah selera. Baiklah, kita mulai! Sekarang siapkan cabe dan tomat untuk membuat sausnya!

18.1: Hashbrowns! Masakan simple, dengan rasa yang sangat enak! Yang kau butuhkan adalah beberapa potong kentang, dan tambahkan dengan garam, lalu goreng dengan minyak diatas api ukuran sedang. Terdengar mudah, bukan? Baiklah, Aku ada tips untukmu bagaimana membuat masakan ini dengan lebih mudah...

19.1: Complete Breakfast! Minggu lalu, kau sudah mempelajari cara membuat hashbrowns. Minggu ini aku akan jelaskan bagaimana cara menyiapkan masakan itu dengan bahan lain, sehingga bisa membuat masakan yang sempurna. Masakan ini akan membuatmu kenyang dan mengembalikan energimu.

20.1: Lucky Lunch! Legenda bilang siapa yang memakan masakan ini akan diberkahi kebahagiaan dan keberuntungan. Setelah memakan masakan ini, Sebuah roh keberuntungan akan mendatangimu, dan akan memberkatimu dengan sebuah keberuntungan! Terdengar aneh, bukan? Aku bukan tidak mempercayainya, tapi yang jelas masakan ini benar - benar lezat!

21.1: Hei, apa kau punya banyak ikan carp dan tidak tahu mau diapakan? ya, aku juga. Well, Aku punya solusi untuk masalah yang anda alami sekarang. Solusi ini disebut... Carp surprise. Pembuatannya gampang, tapi kau butuh ikan carp yang banyak...

22.1: Maple Bars! Apa kau tahu kenapa selai maple selalu menjadi selai terkahir yang habis dintara selai lain? Bingung? Alasannya adalah selai maple yang anda gunakan tidak enak. Apakah benar? Hmm, tunggu dan cobalah resep dariku ini. Pertama, yang kau butuhkan dalam pembuatannya adalah maple syrup yang berkualitas...

23.1: Baru - baru ini penonton dari kota Pelican mengirim sesuatu... Coba kulihat... ini dari Haley. Dia menuliskan, 'Aku mencoba kue pink buatanmu waktu aku ke kota Zuzu waktu itu dan aku sangat menyukainya. Bisakah kau membagi resepnya di acara mingu depan?'. Hmm, Tentu saja? Itu adalah kue yang hebat. Dan kalian pasti tidak akan menyengka bahan rahasia pembuatan kue ini... bahan rahasianya adalah melon!

24.1: Roasted Hazelnuts! Aku punya pohon hazelnut di belakang rumah, dan setiap tahun aku mengundang keluargaku untuk pesta hazelnut bakar! Saat kami membakar kacang ini, para tetangga juga berkerumun datang ke rumahku. Dikarenakan cita rasa dan aroma harum Hazelnut sangatlah menggiurkan. Sekarang, Ini resepnya...

25.1: Fruit Salad! Masakan sehat dan lezat yang akan membuat harimu lebih bahagia. Hal penting yang harus diingat adalah kau harus menggunakan buah yang masak segar. Buah yang aku maksud bukanlah buah yang dijual di Supermarket... Buah yang aku maksud adalah buah segar yang dipetik sendiri dari pohonnya. Oke, Sekarang perhatikan baik - baik...

26.1: Blackberry Cobbler! Masakan ini selalu mengingatkanku Stardew Valley. Di hari saat musim gugur dimana seluruh valley di penuhi blackberries terlezat yang pernah kurasakan. Jika kau punya buah ini, Aku sangat anjurkan buat buah ini menjadi cobbler yang simple ini.

27.1: Crab Cakes! Daging kepiting bentuknya tipis, tapi jika digabungkan dengan remah roti dan telur, masalah itu bisa diatasi. Kue ini adalah hal yang paling kusuka dalam menikmati kepiting! Tapi sebelum kau mulai memasaknya, saksikanlah bumbu yang kugunakan untuk adoan ini...

28.1: Fiddlehead Risotto! tumbuhan Fiddlehead begitu unik. Karena itulah kau harus hati - hati dalam memberi bumbunya. Jujur saja, tidak mudah untuk membuat fiddlehead risotto dengan sempurna. Tapi dengan bantuanku, kau akan berkesempatan untuk mendapatkan kesempurnaan itu.

29.1: Poppyseed Muffin! Bunga Poppies adalah bunga yang indah untuk dijadikan pajangan... tapi kenapa kita tidak memanfaatkan bunga ini sepenuhnya, dengan mengolahnya menjadi sebuah muffin? Aku sangat menyukai bunga poppy. Bunga ini halus, tapi bisa memberikan rasa dan aroma yang menggiurkan untuk roti. Dan yang terpenting bunga ini banyak manfaatnya!

30.1: Lobster Bisque! kau bisa hidangkan masakan ini ke gubernur sekalipun. Masakan ini kaya akan rasa dan krim dengan tema seafood. Bagian tersulitnya adalah mencari lobsternya, tapi aku yakin kau bisa menangkapnya. Hmm, Jika kau beruntung kau bisa menangkapnya menggunakan crab pot!

31.1: Bruschetta! Masakan ini sangatlah simple. Kau hanya butuh roti, tomat dan minyak sayur. Pertama - tama, kau harus memanggang roti. Potong tomat lalu taruh diatas roti yang sudah dipanggang sebelumnya. Lalu beri sedikit minyak sayur lalu hidangkan. Simple bukan!

32.1: Shrimp Cocktail! Masakan ini cocok untuk makan malam bersama tamumu. Saus cocktail sangat menggugah selera, dan aku yakin kamu juga akan menyukainya. Sekarang, Pertama - tama...

Entries.1: This one's for all you greenhorns out there: chop wood and search for wild forage to earn some cash while waiting on your first harvest!
Entries.4: This one's for you folks living in Stardew Valley. Check for spring onion southwest of town, where the river meets the ocean. You can sometimes find a whole bunch growing right out of the dirt.
Entries.8: Let's talk fences. Fences are useful for keeping weeds at bay and protecting your crops. They also let farmers contain their livestock. Fences break down after a while, but stone, iron, and hardwood fences last a lot longer than basic wood!
Entries.11: Woes from crows? Sounds like you need a scarecrow! Placing a scarecrow on your farm deters crows from a pretty good distance. Make sure you protect your valuable crops!^One more thing... need a bigger backpack to hold all your stuff? Check your local general store.
Entries.15: It's salmonberry season! All across the countryside, bushes are teeming with juicy little berries, and they're free for the taking! Harvesting them is a great way to earn some extra cash.
Entries.18: Ah, refreshing rain... a Farmer's best friend! When it rains, you don't have to water your crops. Use this to your advantage!
Entries.22: Get your hands on a fishin' pole and sell your catch! Fishing is a great way to make a little extra cash when you have some down time. The distance your bobber lands from any dry land determines what kinds of fish you'll hook... as well as the location, season, time of day, and weather!
Entries.25: Fruit trees. They take an entire season to grow, so plan ahead! If the area directly surrounding your new tree isn't clear, it will interfere with growth. Once your fruit tree is mature, it'll produce delicious fruit for you every day while in season. Better start savin' up!
Entries.29: Summer's here, along with a whole slew of new crops to plant! Take hops, for example. The vines take a while to grow, but once they're mature they can be harvested every day. Good luck!
Entries.32: Here's a rundown of the fish you can only find in summer: Dorado, found in forest rivers during the day. Rainbow Trout, found in forest rivers and in the mountains during the day. Pufferfish, found in the ocean in the early afternoon. And Octopus, found in the ocean during the morning. Catch them while you can!
Entries.36: Let's talk corn. It's an unusual crop because it lasts for two seasons! That's right, while most crops die when the season changes, corn lives on. You can grow it in both summer and fall. Now, get out there and plant some corn!
Entries.39: Starting tomorrow, an unusual amount of shells and corals are expected to wash up on beaches all around the world. I'm no scientist, but I've heard it's something to do with crab mating season. At any rate, you could make some good coin combing your local beach.
Entries.43: Got a spa in your town? Relax and hold still in the steaming hot water to replenish your energy. Ahh... feels good, don't it?
Entries.46: Summer's known for its lightning storms. If you know how to craft a lightning rod, you can harvest the electricity and create battery packs. These can be sold or used for crafting!
Entries.50: Most towns have a seasonal calendar in front of the general store. It's a good idea to check on that now and then to get a feel for what's going on in the community. Make sure to check for any job postings as well!
Entries.53: Fall's almost here! It's arguably the most lucrative season for farmers, so make sure you're saving some money to buy new seeds. If you haven't upgraded your watering can by now, it's probably a good idea.
Entries.57: Let's talk sunflowers. When you harvest them you'll not only get a nice flower, but you'll likely get some seeds as well. You can replant those seeds or sell them. I'm sold!
Entries.60: If you're a farmer in a small town, it's likely you'll be invited to create a "grange display" at some point. Typically, a grange display consists of 9 items that best showcase your talents. Shoot for high quality, high value items and make sure to have a variety as well. Fish, minerals, artisan goods, fruit, and vegetables are all good to have!
Entries.64: It's blackberry season! Bushes across the countryside are overflowing with ripe fruit. Just go outside and see for yourself!
Entries.67: Fish Focus: Salmon. Salmon return to their spawning ground in fall to lay eggs. That means the rivers are chock-full of them! You can only find them in fall, so get out there and cast your pole.
Entries.71: Got any tappers? Crafty foragers known how to build 'em. You can attach them to the wild trees that grow all over. Maple trees yield maple syrup, oak trees provide resin, and pine trees produce pine tar. Syrup's the most valuable but all tree products have their uses!
Entries.74: Winter's almost here. Make sure you have enough hay stored up to feed your animals over the winter, when all the grass dies out. Each silo can hold 240 pieces of hay, so make sure to do the math and figure out if you need to build any more!
Entries.78: Fish Focus: Walleye. You can find this fish on rainy evenings during the fall and winter. It can be found in any freshwater location.
Entries.81: Winter's coming soon... and that means your farming operations will be coming to a halt. No crops grow in winter, unless you're lucky enough to have a greenhouse. But there's still plenty to do! More next time.
Entries.85: Winter... A time when all the world goes quiet.  Now's a great time to do some mining, fishing and gathering. Upgrade your tools in preparation for a productive spring. Or get your local carpenter to build something on your farm! Stock up on resources, upgrade, and prepare for the next year.
Entries.88: Wondering how to get your hands on 'Refined Quartz'? Just put a regular old quartz in the furnace. You'll need a lump of coal to fuel the fire.
Entries.92: Find any tree seeds while chopping wood? You can plant those in the ground and a new tree will grow. Get creative!
Entries.95: There's a couple fish you can only find in winter... Squid and Lingcod. Squid can be caught from the ocean in the evening. Lingcod can be found in fresh water all day. Of course, there's rumors of extremely rare and unique fish that can only be found in particular seasons, but I don't have any information on them.
Entries.99: Let's talk geodes. Geodes are hollow stones that often contain valuable minerals. A blacksmith can crack them open for you for a fee. Now, there's different kinds of geodes... and each one yields a different subset of minerals. The rare "omni-geode", however, can contain every kind of mineral.
Entries.102: If you really want to make someone happy, give them their favorite gift on their birthday! Trust me.
Entries.106: Ever see three little brown stems poking up out of the ground? They're hard to spot, sometimes. But if you dig on that spot, you'll always find something. Don't ask me how it works.
Entries.109: Ever had the urge to dig around in your neighbor's trash? Ew! Hey, if that's your thing, just don't do it when anyone's around. If they notice you, they'll be seriously grossed out, and it'll harm your friendship. Well, unless they're into the same thing.
Entries.113: Well, a new year has arrived. Keep your eyes peeled for any new kinds of seeds being stocked in your local general store. Hopefully you upgraded your tools during the winter and you're ready for a productive year!
Entries.116: Fish Focus: Eel. Eels can be caught from the ocean in the spring and fall, during rainy evenings.
Entries.120: Got a kitchen? Cooking is a great way to enhance your abilities. Not only do they provide a convenient source of energy, but many dishes temporarily increase your skills, speed, and more! Smells good, don't it?
Entries.123: Item Spotlight: Crab Pot. Experienced anglers know how to craft crab pots. Despite the name, the pots can be used to catch a wide variety of aquatic critters, in both fresh and salt water. Just place your crab pot in the water and load with bait. Come back the next day and check on it to see what you caught. You'll need to load it with bait again to catch more.
Entries.127: It's salmonberry season! All across the countryside, bushes are teeming with juicy little berries, and they're free for the taking! Harvesting them is a great way to earn some extra cash.
Entries.130: Let's talk honey. No, not you, silly. I'm talking about the sweet product made by our friends, the bees. Here's the thing... if you've got some flowers blooming near your beehouse your bees can produce flavored honey. Otherwise you'll only get 'wild honey'. Pretty sweet, huh?
Entries.134: Here's a tip for you adventurers out there... don't forget your weapon's special attack! Swords can block incoming attacks, which is very useful when slimes are jumping at you. Clubs can pound the ground, sending enemies flying... and with a dagger you can perform a super-quick triple-strike attack! Be safe.
Entries.137: I'd like to talk about the famous Adventurer's Guild near Pelican Town. The guild leader, Marlon, has a nice rewards program for anyone brave enough to slay monsters in the local caves. Adventurers will receive powerful items in exchange for slaying large quantites of monsters. There's a poster on the wall with more details. Very cool!
Entries.141: I've heard that some folks stand near moving trains to gather any debris that falls off. Wow... the things people will do for a freebie!
Entries.144: Animal Spotlight: Pig.^^In these parts, pigs are trained to sniff out valuable truffles. You've got to let the porkers outside and be patient... they'll work their magic when they're good and ready. Make oil out of the truffles to maximize your profit.
Entries.148: Here's a reminder of the fish you can only find in summer: Dorado, found in forest rivers during the day. Rainbow Trout, found in forest rivers and in the mountains during the day. Pufferfish, found in the ocean in the early afternoon. And Octopus, found in the ocean during the morning. Catch them while you can!
Entries.151: Fish Focus: Super Cucumber. You can find this rare fish in the ocean. It only comes out in the evening, during summer and winter.
Entries.155: I know it's hard... but stop worrying so much about your horse! You can leave them anywhere and they'll make their way back home. They're very smart and independent animals!
Entries.158: Here's an idea... start a wild tree orchard! Put tappers on those trees and harvest the valuable syrup. Or don't! See if I care.
Entries.162: Item Spotlight: Keg. The classic use of a keg is to make wine out of grapes. But did you know you can make wine out of any fruit? Yep.^You can also make juice out of veggies.
Entries.165: Do you have a journal? Don't forget to check it from time to time. It's easy to forget that you've written something important down.
Entries.169: If you managed to get your hands on a 'rare seed', now's the time to plant it. Although it's said to take all season to grow, reliable sources have told me it actually takes just 24 days. The end result is rumored to be the sweetest fruit in the entire world.
Entries.172: Some farmers have reported strange things happening when large fields of cauliflower, melon, or pumpkin reach maturity. Hmmm. I can't verify it, myself.
Entries.176: It's blackberry season! Bushes across the countryside are overflowing with ripe fruit. Just go outside and see for yourself!
Entries.179: Looking to get married? You're going to need a Mermaid's Pendant. Everyone this side of the Gem Sea knows what it means when you give them a Mermaid's Pendant.^Getting your hands on such a pendant can be tricky. Every region seems to have their own custom, but it always has something to do with the beach or ocean.
Entries.183: Item Spotlight: Recycling Machine. Have you been catching a lot of junk while fishing? It's all too common in this day and age. Well, with a recycling machine you can turn those items into something useful. Just place your trash items into the machine and let it do it's thing. Each type of trash produces different kinds of items.
Entries.186: Fish Focus: Albacore. This fish can be found either early in the morning or at night. Look for it in the ocean in fall or winter.
Entries.190: Fish Focus: Woodskip, sandfish, and scorpion carp. The woodskip is said to only live deep in the woods. The sandfish and scorpion carp can only be found in desert oases.
Entries.193: It's just a couple days until communities around the Ferngill Republic celebrate Spirit's Eve! One tradition you may not know of is the search for the golden pumpkin. If your town has a haunted maze, then you can be sure there's a golden pumpkin hidden somewhere. Those things are valuable!
Entries.197: Folks, take my advice. You're going to need a nursery in your house before you can have kids. Baby needs a crib!
Entries.200: Item Spotlight: Crystalarium. This amazing machine can create infinite copies of any kind of gemstone. Just place the gemstone you'd like to copy in the machine let it do it's thing. It might take a while, but hey... that's pure profit!
Entries.204: If you have adult barn animals, and space left in your barn... there's always a chance one of your animals could give birth. It's something to keep in mind.
Entries.207: Fish Focus: Catfish. This relatively rare fish comes out of hiding when it rains. You'll find them living in rivers beside towns, where they enjoy feeding on whatever scraps end up in the water. They don't like hot weather, so don't bother fishing for them in the summer!
Entries.211: Item Spotlight: Worm Bin. Need an endless supply of bait? Build yourself a worm bin. Once you've got one going, you'll get a few pieces of bait every single day.
Entries.214: Underneath all that snow, spring seeds are champing at the bit to start their new lives in the sun. Don't be surprised when spring rolls around and your farm needs some tidying up!
Entries.218: If you've got your hands on a gold pan, keep an eye out for something sparkly in the water.^There's often good ore in there, free for the taking!
Entries.221: Folks, I've got an announcement to make. This is the last new episode of Livin' Off The Land before my retirement. I've had a good time, and I'll miss you folks. Oh, and I've been told the station's going to start playing reruns next year. ^^Take care!

1.0: Untuk para petani baru yang ada di luar sana: Potonglah pohon dan cari tumbuhan liar selagi menunggu tumbuhanmu panen!

4.0: Untuk para warga Stardew Valley. Kamu bisa menemukan spring onion di sebelah barat daya kota, dimana air laut dan sungai bertemu. Kamu bisa menemukan tanaman itu tumbuh di atas tanah.

8.0: Kita akan membahas tentang Pagar. Pagar digunakan untuk menjauhkan rumput dan menjaga tanamanmu. Pagar juga bisa digunakan untuk membatasi hewan ternakmu. Pagar sewaktu - waktu bisa rusak, tapi pagar batu, besi, dan hardwood lebih tahan lama daripada pagar kayu biasa!

11.0: Tanamanmu dimakan burung gagak? Kedengarannya kau butuh sebuah scarecrow! taruh scarecrow di kebunmu untuk menakuti para burung gagak. Pastikan kau menaruhnya dekat dengan tanaman berhargamu!^Oh satu lagi... Tasmu tidak cukup membawa barang banyak? Cobalah kunjungi toko swalayan terdekat.

15.0: Sekarang musim salmonberry! Di seluruh penghujung desa, setiap semak - semak ditumbuhi dengan buah kecil ini, dan pastinya kamu bebas mengambilnya! Kumpulkan buah ini untuk mendapatkan pendapatan lebih.

18.0: Ah, Hujan... hujan adalah teman para petani! Ketika hujan, kamu tidak perlu menyiram tanamanmu. Gunakan kesempatan itu untuk bersantai!

22.0: genggam erat kail pancingmu dan jual tangkapanmu! Memancing adalah cara yang bagus untuk mendapatkan penghasilan eksra. Tempat memancingmu akan menjadi penentu ikan apa yang akan kamu dapatkan... penentu tersebut berupa lokasi, musim, waktu, dan cuaca!

25.0: Pohon buah. Ingat, Pohon ini butuh satu bulan untuk tumbuh besar! Jika area disekitar pohon ini terganggu oleh benda lain, itu akan menggangu pertumbuhan pohon. Ketika pohon buah telah dewasa, Pohon akan menghasilkan buah segar yang lezat setiap hari setiap musimnya. MAka dari itu, mulailah menanam!

29.0: Musim panas sudah tiba, bersama dengan bibit - bibit baru yang siap untuk ditanam! Tanamlah hops. Tumbuhan menjalar ini agak lama untuk tumbuh dewasa, tapi setelah dewasa tumbuhan ini bisa menghasilkan Hops setiap hari. Jadi selamat mencoba!

32.0: Ini adalah daftar ikan yang hanya bisa kamu tangkap saat musim panas: Dorado, bisa ditemukan di sungai hutan saat siang. Rainbow Trout, bisa deitemukan di sungai hutan atau di gunung saat siang. Pufferfish, bisa ditemukan di laut saat tengah hari. Dan Octopus, bisa ditemukan di laut saat pagi hari. Semoga beruntung!

36.0: Kali ini, kita akan memahas jagung. Jagung adalah tanaman yang unik, karena bisa bertahan sampai 2 musim! Itu benar, Kebanyakan bibit lain akan mati saat pergantian musim, akan tetapi jagung akan terus hidup. Kamu bisa menanam jagung di musim panas dan musim gugur. Sekarang, siapkan bibit jagungmu dan ayo menanam!

39.0: Mulai esok hari, kerang dan koral dengan jumlah yang banyak akan memenuhi pantai diseluruh penjuru dunia. Saya bukan seorang ilmuan, tapi yang saya tahu, hal ini ada hubungannya dengan musim kawin kepiting. Oleh karena hal ini, kamu bisa mendapat penghasilan tambahan, dengan mengumpulkan kerang - kerang,.

43.0: Di kotamu ada pemandian air panas? Bersantailah disana dan rasakan nikmatnya air panas yang akan mengembalikan energimu. Ahh... nyaman sekali, bukan?

46.0: Di musim panas sering terjadi hujan petir. Jika kamu tahu cara membangun lightning rod, kau bisa memanfaatkannya untuk membuat battery packs. Baterry pack ini nantinya bisa kamu jual atau untuk keperluan lainnya!

50.0: Setiap kota biasanya mempunyai kalender bulanan di majalah dinding kota. Disana kamu bisa melihat hari - hari penting dan ikut meramaikan aktifitas warga. Dan jangan lupa untuk mengecek bagian permintaan warga!

53.0: Musim gugur sebentar lagi datang! Musim ini sering dikatakan musing yang paling menguntungkan bagi petani, jadi pastikan kamu menyimpan uang untuk membeli bibit baru. Jika kamu belum meng-upgrade alat sirammu, sekarang adalah waktunya.

57.0: Kita akan membahas sunflowers (bunga matahari). Ketika panen kamu tidak hanya akan mendapat bunga indahnya, tapi kamu juga akan mendapatkan biji - bijinya. Nah, dengan biji - biji ini kamu bisa menanam kembali bunga ini atau kamu juga bisa menjualnya untuk penghasilan tambahan!

60.0: Sekarang musim blackberry! Seluruh semak - semak di setiap pinggiran hutan akan dipenuhi oleh buah manis ini. Pergilah sekarang dan buktikan sendiri!

64.0: Jika kamu seorang petani dari kota kecil, biasanya kamu akan diundang untuk membuat "grange display" (pertunjukkan hasil kebun). Biasanya, kamu harus mengisi grange display dengan 9 barang yang sesuai dengan bakatmu. Bawa barang dengan kualitas terbaik. Kau bisa membawa ikan, mineral, buah, dan sayuran untuk dilombakan!

67.0: Kabar ikan: Ikan salmon. Di musim ini, ikan salmon kemali ke perairan air tawar untuk bertelur. Artinya, sungai sekarang di penuhi oleh ikan ini! Kamu hanya bisa menangkapnya saat musim gugur, jadi bersiaplah memancing sebelum ketinggalan.

71.0: Apa kamu punya tappers? Petani yang kreatif biasanya tahu cara membuatnya. Taruh Tapper di pohon liar. Dengan Tapper pohon maple bisa menghasilkan maple syrup, pohon oak bisa menghasilkan resin, dan pohon pinus bisa menghasilkan pine tar. Syrup adalah yang paling berguna tapi produksi pohon lainnya punya kegunaan masing - masing!

74.0: Musim dingin sebentar lagi datang. Pastikan kamu sudah menyimpan jerami yang banyak untuk pakan ternakmu selama musim dingin, karena semua rumput mati di musim ini. Setiap silo hanya bisa menyimpan 240 buah jerami, jadi mulailah perkiraan berapa jerami yang harus kamu gunakan untuk musim ini!

78.0: Kabar ikan: Ikan Walleye. Kamu bisa menangkap ikan ini, saat hujan pada malam musim gugur dan dingin. Ikan ini biasanya hidup di perairan sungai.

81.0: Musim dingin segera tiba... dan artinya pekerjaan kebunmu akan terhambat. Itu karena, tidak ada tumbuhan yang tumbuh di musim ini, kecuali kamu punya rumah kaca tentunya. Tapi walaupun begitu, masih banyak hal lain yang bisa dilakukan! Sampai jumpa.

85.0: Musim dingin... Waktu dimana semuanya menjadi sepi. Di musim ini adalah waktu yang tepat untuk menambang, memancing dan melakukan aktifitas lainnya. Seperti, meng-Upgrade peralatanmu di musim ini, untuk persiapan musim semi nanti. Atau kamu juga bisa menyuruh tukang kayu lokal untuk membangun sesuatu di kebunmu!

88.0: Kamu bingung bagaimana caranya untuk membuat 'Refined Quartz'? Taruh saja quartz biasa ke furnace. Kau butuh coal untuk menghidupkan apinya.

92.0: Kamu menemukan benih pohon saat memotong kayu? Kamu bisa menanam benih itu ke tanah dan pohon baru akan tumbuh. Cobalah!

95.0: Ada beberapa ikan yang hanya bisa ditemukan saat musim dingin... Squid (cumi) dan Lingcod. Squid bisa ditemukan di laut saat malam. Lingcod bisa ditemukan di perairan sungai saat siang hari. Selain kedua ikan ini, ada kabar tentang ikan yang hanya bisa ditemukan di beberapa musim saja, tapi kami belum mendapatkan informasi yang jelas tentangnya.

99.0: Kali ini, kita akan membahas tentang geode. Geode adalah sebuah batu keras yang biasanya di dalamnya mengandung sebuah mineral yang berguna. Seorang pandai besi bisa menghancurkan geode ini untukmu. Lalu, ada beberapa macam geode... dan setiap macamnya mengandung mineral yang berbeda. Geode yang paling langka adalah "omni-geode" Geode ini biasanya mengandung semua macam mineral.

102.0: Jika kamu ingin membuat seseorang bahagia, beri hadiah favorit saat ulang tahun mereka! Percayalah mereka pasti bahagia.

106.0: Apa kamu pernah melihat cacing kecil keluar di tanah? Gali tanah di tempat cacing tersebut, kamu pasti akan menemukan sesuatu. Jangan tanya aku kenapa bisa terjadi demikian

109.0: Apa kamu pernah membongkar kotak sampah tetanggamu? ihh! Hei, jika kamu sering melakukanny, pastikan tidak ada yang orang disekitarmu. Jika mereka melihatmu, mereka akan merasa jijik denganmu, dan itu akan mempengaruhi hubungan kalian.

113.0: Tahun baru akhirnya tiba. Cek terus bibit - bibit baru yang dijual di toko swalayan di kotamu. Kami berharap kamu sudah meng-upgraded peralatanmu saat musim dingin kemarin untuk bersiap tahun produktif yang baru!

116.0: Kabar ikan: Eel (belut). Eels bisa ditemukan di perairan laut pada musim semi dan gugur, ketika cuaca hujan di malam hari.

120.0: Apa kamu punya dapur? Memasak adalah cara yang tepat untuk meningkatkan kemampuanmu. Tidak hanya itu, masakan yang dimasak berfungsi sebagai penyedia energi praktis, tapi ada beberapa masakan yang bisa menambah skill, kecepatan gerakmu dan lainnya! Apa kamu tertarik?

123.0: Item Spotlight: Crab Pot. Pemancing yang berpengalaman pasti tahu cara membuat crab pots. Walaupun namanya penangkap kepiting, benda ini juga bisa menangkap mahluk air lain selain kepiting. Cukup taruh benda ini ke air dan isi dengan umpan. Kembalilah besok dan lihat apa yang kau tangkap.

127.0: Sekarang musim salmonberry! Di seluruh penghujung desa, setiap semak - semak ditumbuhi dengan buah kecil ini, dan pastinya kamu bebas mengambilnya! Kumpulkan buah ini untuk mendapatkan pendapatan lebih.

130.0: Kita akan membahas tentang honey. Madu adalah sebuah cairan manis yang di hasilkan oleh lebah. Kami punya tips untukmu... Jika kamu punya bunga mekar di dekat rumah lebahmu, lebah akan sangat mudah dibuat. Jika tidak, kamu harus menunggu lama untuk mendapat cairan manis ini. Tertarik mencoba?

134.0: Ini adalah tips untuk para petualang yang sedang berpetualang di luar sana... Gunakan selalu 'special attack' senjatamu! Pedang bisa mem-blok serangan, dimana sangat berguna jika ada slime yang melompat ke arahmu. Club (palu) bisa digunakan untuk mengguncang tanah, dimana akan melempar musuh jauh... dan dengan dagger (pisau) kau bisa melakukan serangan 3 kali super cepat! Semoga beruntung.

137.0: Kita akan membahas tentang Guild petualang terkenal yang ada di kota Pelican. Pemimpin guild tersebut, Marlon, punya sebuah program dimana seorang petualang akan mendapat hadiah jika cukup berani untuk mengalahkan beberapa monster. Petualang yang mendapat hadiah biasanya mendapat senjata yang kuat. Jika kamu ingin melihat apa saja monster yang harus dikalahkan, lihatlah catatan di sana. Apa kamu tertarik?

141.0: Aku dengar ada beberapa orang sengaja menunggu kereta api lewat, supaya bisa mengumpulkan barang - barang yang tak sengaja di jatuhkan kereta tersebut. Walah... Aku tak menyagka mereka punya waktu sebanyak itu!

144.0: Animal Spotlight: Pig (babi).^^Pada saat ini, pig mempunyai kemampuan menemukan jamur truffles. Kau hanya harus membiarkan hewan ini keluar dari kandang lalu bersabar... sampai mereka menemukan jamur berharga ini. jamur ini bisa kamu jadikan minyak untuk memaksimalkan harganya.

148.0: Ikan yang hanya bisa di tangkap saat musim panas: Ikan Dorado, bisa ditemukan di sungai hutan pada saat siang hari. Ikan Rainbow Trout, bisa ditemukan di sungai hutan dan gunung saat siang hari. Ikan Pufferfish (buntal), bisa ditemukan di laut awal - awal tengah hari. dan Octopus (gurita), bisa dirtemukan di laut saat pagi hari. Semoga beruntung!

151.0: Kabar ikan: Super Cucumber. Kamu bisa menemukan mahluk langka ini di lautan. hanya aja dia mahluk ini hanya muncul saat malam di musim panas dan dingin.

155.0: Aku tahu ini sulit... tapi berhentilah mengkhawatirkan kudamu! Kamu bisa meninggalkan kuda ini dimanapun dan kudamu ini pasti akan kembali kerumah dengan sendirinya. Kuda benar - benar hewan yang pintar dan mandiri!

158.0: Tips untuk mendapat penghasilan tambahan! Taruh tappers ke pohon liar dan tunggu beberapa hari. Setelah selesai menunggu, pohon akan menghasilkan produk khas mereka.

162.0: Item Spotlight: Keg. Keg biasanya digunakan untuk membuat wine dari buah anggur. Tapi apa kamu tahu, kamu bisa membuat wine dari buah selain anggur? Jawabannya bisa.^Kamu juga bisa menaruh sayuran di benda ini untuk membuat sebuah jus.

165.0: Apa kamu punya jurnal? Jangan lupa sesekali untuk memeriksanya. Supaya kamu ingat sesuatu hal penting yang kamu tulis sebelumnya.

169.0: Jika kamu mempunyai 'rare seed', sekarang adalah waktunya untuk menanam tanaman itu. Walaupun katanya bibit ini bisa tumbuh di musim apa saja, sumber terpercaya kami mengabarkan bahwa bibit ini akan tumbuh dewasa dalam 24 hari. Dan kabar terakhir yang kami terima, buah ini adalah buah termanis yang pernah ada di muka bumi.

172.0: Sekarang musim blackberry! Seluruh semak - semak di setiap pinggiran hutan akan dipenuhi oleh buah manis ini. Pergilah sekarang dan buktikan sendiri!

176.0: Beberapa petani melaoporkan terjadi sesuatu yang aneh di kebun mereka disaat cauliflower, melon, dan pumpkin tumbuh dewasa. Hmmm. Walau begitu, kami tidak bisa membuktikannya secara pasti.

179.0: Apa kamu ingin menikah? jika iya, kamu butuh Mermaid's Pendant. Sudah menjadi tadisi untuk memberi Mermaid's Pendant saat ingin menikah dengan seseorang.^Untuk mendapatkan pendant sangatlah sulit. Setiap kota pasti punya caranya sendiri, tapi cara ini selalu berhubungan dengan pantai dan lautan.

183.0: Item Spotlight: Recycling Machine. Apa kamu pernah mendapat sampah saat memancing? Hal ini sangat biasa terjai saat zaman seperti ini. dengan recycling machine kamu bisa mengubah sampah - sampah ini menjadi baranag yang lebih berguna. Kamu hanya harus menaruh sampahmu pada mesin ini dan mesin akan melakukan tugasnya. Setiap tipe sampah, akan menghasilkan hasil barang yang berbeda.

186.0: Kabar ikan: Ikan Albacore. Ikan ini bisa ditemukan di pagi dan malam hari. Carilah ikan ini di perairan laut saat musim gugur dan dingin.

190.0: Kabar ikan: Woodskip, sandfish, dan scorpion carp. Ikan woodskip dikabarkan hanya bisa ditemukan di perairan hutan dalam. Ikan sandfish dan scorpion carp hanya bisa ditemukan di danau gurun.

193.0: Beberapa hari lagi warga Ferngill Republic mengadakan acara Spirit's Eve! tradisi dimana para warga mencari labu emas. Jika kotamu mengaakan acara ini juga. Ikutlah mencari labu emas ini, untuk memeriahkan acara!

197.0: Para hadirin, ingatlah ini. Kamu harus pergi cek kesehatanmu jika ingin mempunyai anak!

200.0: Item Spotlight: Crystalarium. Mesin hebat ini bisa meng-kopi mineral - mineral. Taruh mineralmu ke dalam mesin ini dan tunggu mesin ini menggandakan barangmu. memang lama, tapi hei... bersabarlah!

204.0: Jika ruangan di kandangmu masih ada, dan kamu memiliki hewan ternak dewasa... Ada kesempatan hewan ternakmu melahirkan anak. Jadi ingatah baik - baik.

207.0: kabar ikanFish Focus: Ikan Catfish. Ikan ini biasanya keluar saat hujan. Kamu bisa menemukan ikan ini hidup di sungai dekat kota, dimana ikan ini baisa menikmati makanan yang ada di seitar sungai tersebut. Ikan ini tidak menyukai udara panas, jadi jangan mencarinya saat musim panas!

211.0: Item Spotlight: Worm Bin. Apa kamu butuh pasokan umpan? Buatlah worm bin. Jika kamu punya mesin ini, mesin ini akan menghasilkan umpan tiap harinya.

214.0: Dibawah salju musim dingin, biasanya benih - benih tanaman liar sudah mulai tumbuh, jadi jangan terkejut kebunmu di penuhi rumput musim semi nanti!

218.0: Jika kamu punya gold pan, perhatikan spot berkilauan di dalam air.^Biasanya logam berguna tedapat disana, dan kau bebas mengambilnya!

221.0: Para hadirin, Kami punya mengumuman penting. Ini adalah acara episode terakhir Livin' Off The Land. Aku senang bisa menemani anda semua selama ini. Oh, dan juga mulai musim depan acara ini akan di siarkan tayangan ulangnya. Terima kasih!

Entries.intro: 0/Hi there, viewers. Every week I travel around the country to meet people from all different walks of life. Together, we'll broaden our horizons and learn about unique careers, lifestyles, and perspectives. I'm Tom Laminar, and you're watching 'Saturday Spotlight'.

intro.1: Halo, pemirsa. Setiap minggu aku berjalan ke seluruh tempat dan menjumpai banyak kehidupan yang berbeda. Bersama - sama, kita buka wawasan kita dan dapatkan pengetahuan tentang masalah karir, gaya hidup, dan perspektif. Aku Tom Laminar, dan selamat datang di 'Saturday Spotlight'.

Entries.Maru0: I'm really excited.$h#$b#I'm going to be your wife. Hehe.$l
Entries.Maru1: I need to get mentally prepared for being a farmer's wife.
Entries.Leah1: I've always dreamed of living on a farm.$h#$e#I'm going to be so happy.
Entries.Haley0: I'm so happy!$h#$e#It's just like I always dreamed.$l
Entries.Haley1: It's okay. I know we can't have a honeymoon, since your farm needs to be taken care of.#$e#I'm a farmer now, too!
Entries.Penny0: @.. I'm a little scared. This is such a big change!#$e#Don't worry, I'm really happy, too.$h
Entries.Penny1: We're going to have a little farm family, soon.$l#$e#I'm so glad you feel this way about me.$h
Entries.Abigail0: Hehe. Me? Married? I never thought this would happen.$h#$e#We're going to have a lot of fun together.$h
Entries.Abigail1: I'm engaged to a farmer. Wow!$h#$e#Our lives are going to be a lot different from now on.$l
Entries.Sam0: I'm going to be really happy as your husband, @.$l#$e#I'm excited.
Entries.Sam1: I never dreamed this would happen. I'm so lucky.$l#$e#I can't wait till the wedding.$h
Entries.Sebastian0: In a couple days I'm going to be living on a farm. I can't believe it.$h#$e#I'm happy, though.$l
Entries.Sebastian1: When you showed up in town, I never thought I'd be marrying you some day.$l#$e#Life is strange, huh?$h
Entries.Harvey0: Oh my goodness! I have so much to prepare before the wedding! I'm nervous.$l#$e#I'll be relieved after we're all settled in on your farm.$h
Entries.Harvey1: I'm really happy.$h#$e#This was always my secret wish.$l
Entries.Elliott0: The farm will be such a lovely place to write. I'm really looking forward to this.$h#$e#We're going to make a great pair.$l
Entries.Elliott1: This is going to be such an adventure! I'm really excited. Aren't you?$h#$e#We can use my cottage as a beach house.$l
Entries.Alex0: @, this is the greatest thing that could have happened.$l#$e#I can't wait.$h
Entries.Alex1: I'm going to love being a farmer.$h
Entries.Shane0: Part of me is wondering if this isn't all some elaborate prank.#$e#I can't believe you'd actually want to marry someone like me.
Entries.Shane1: @... My head's spinning, and I haven't even had a beer today.
Entries.Emily0: Can you believe we're about to move in together? I've never lived with anyone but my family.#$e#It's... exciting.
Entries.Emily1: I always knew something important would happen between us... I just never thought it would be this!$h#$e#The parrot is excited too.
Entries.Krobus0: @... I'm afraid we'll have to keep this a secret... Neither my people nor yours would accept us living together.
Entries.Krobus1: You know I'll be a very strange person to live with, right? I won't be able to leave the house...

Maru0.0: Aku sangat bersemangat.$h#$b#Aku akan menjadi istrimu. Hehe.$l

Maru1.0: Aku harus persiapkan mental untuk menjadi istri Petani.

Leah1.0: Aku selalu bermimpi tinggal dikebun.$h#$e#Aku akan sangat bahagia.

Haley0.0: Aku senang!$h#$e#Ini seperti mimpi jadi kenyataan.$l

Haley1.0: Tak apa. Aku tau kita tak bisa bulan madu, karena kebun butuh diurus juga.#$e#Aku petani juga sekarang!

Penny0.0: @.. Aku sedikit takut. Ini adalah perubahan yang besar!#$e#Jangan khawatir, Aku sangat bahagia juga.$h

Penny1.0: Sebentar lagi kita akan punya keluarga kecil petani.$l#$e#Aku sangat senang kau punya perasaan padaku.$h

Abigail0.0: Hehe. Aku? Menikah? Aku tak menyangka ini akan terjadi.$h#$e#Kita akan bersenang-senang bersama.$h

Abigail1.0: Aku dilamar seorang Petani. Wow!$h#$e#Kehidupan kita akan mulai berbeda dari sekarang.$l

Sam0.0: Aku akan sangat bahagia menjadi suami mu, @.$l#$e#Aku bersemangat.

Sam1.0: Aku tak menyangka ini akan terjadi. Aku sangat beruntung.$l#$e#Aku tak sabar sampai hari pernikahan kita.$h

Sebastian0.0: Dalam beberapa hari lagi aku akan tinggal dikebun. Aku tak percaya itu.$h#$e#Tapi, aku bahagia.$l

Sebastian1.0: Ketika kau muncul dikota, Aku tak menyangka aku akan menikahimu suatu hari nanti.$l#$e#Hidup itu aneh, ya kan?$h

Harvey0.0: Ya ampun! Aku harus melakukan banyak persiapan sebelum hari pernikahan! Aku gugup.$l#$e#Aku akan lega saat kita sudah tinggal dikebun.$h

Harvey1.0: Aku sangat bahagia.$h#$e#Dari dulu inilah harapan ku.$l

Elliott0.0: Kebun akan jadi tempat menyenangkan untuk menulis. Aku sungguh tak sabar.$h#$e#Kita akan jadi pasangan yang serasi.$l

Elliott1.0: Ini akan menjadi petualangan yang baru! Aku sangat bersemangat. Kamu?$h#$e#Kita bisa pakai rumahku sebagai rumah pantai.$l

Alex0.0: @, ini adalah hal terindah yang terjadi dalam hidupku.$l#$e#Aku tak bisa menunggu.$h

Shane0.0: Sebagian diriku bertanya, apakah ini hanya lelucon.#$e#Aku tak menyangka orang seperti mu ingin menikahi ku.

Shane1.0: @... Kepalaku pusing, walaupun aku belum menyentuh bir.

Emily0.0: Bisa kah kau percaya kita akan hidup bersama? Aku tak pernah tinggal bersama selain dengan keluargaku.#$e#Ini... sungguh menyenangkan.

Emily1.0: Aku selalu tau sesuatu yang baik akan terjadi pada kita... Aku tak menyangka ini yang akan terjadi!$h#$e#Si Kakatua bersemangat juga.

Krobus0.0: @... Aku takut hubungan kita harus terus menjadi rahasia... Baik kaumku maupun kaummu tidak akan menerima jika kita tinggal berasama.

Krobus1.0: Kau tau kan kalau aku akan menjadi teman hidup yang sangat aneh? Aku tidak akan pernah bisa meninggalkan rumah...

Entries.NewChild_SecondChild1: Just look at our little family... We've come a long way, haven't we?
Entries.NewChild_SecondChild2: Two beautiful children... We've come a long way, haven't we?
Entries.NewChild_Adoption: It's so wonderful to welcome little {0} into our life.
Entries.NewChild_FirstChild: Everything went well, and now little {0} is part of the family. We're very fortunate.
Entries.Spouse_KitchenBlocked: You've got a bunch of your stuff blocking the kitchen... I guess you're not getting dinner tonight.$a
Entries.Spouse_MonstersInHouse: Um... Honey? Why are there monsters in the house?
Entries.Farm_RobinWorking_ReadyTomorrow: Your new {0} will be finished tomorrow! Are you excited?
Entries.Farm_RobinWorking1: Your new {0} will be ready in {1} days. Just pretend I'm not here.
Entries.Farm_RobinWorking2: Your new {0} will be ready in {1} days. I'm going to be working on this thing day and night!
Entries.AnimalShop_Marnie_Trash: Why are you looking through my trash can?$s
Entries.SeedShop_Abigail_Drawers: Hey, don't even think about it! That's private!$a
Entries.Wizard_Hatch: What are you doing? I only allow those I trust to enter there.
Entries.Clint_NoInventorySpace: Hey. Your tool is ready but you don't have any room in your inventory.
Entries.Clint_StillWorking: Um, I'm still working on your {0}. It won't be ready today.
Entries.Gunther_MuseumComplete: The museum looks amazing! Thanks again for all your help.
Entries.Gunther_NothingToDonate: It doesn't seem like you have anything to donate to the museum. Better get out there and do some treasure hunting, huh?
Entries.Gunther_NoArtifactsFound: Hello there! Welcome to the Stardew Valley Archaeological Office.#$b#Uh... This is embarrassing, but the previous curator made off with the entire collection. We don't have any artifacts for display.#$b#But I'm hoping to remedy that soon! Hey, if you find any artifacts or minerals out there... would you let me know?
Entries.Sandy_PlayerClubMember: What happened? You're a club member?!
Entries.MisterQi_PlayerClubMember: It's good to finally meet ya, kid. Welcome to my exclusive clubhouse.#$e#You've got the 'spark'... that's why I singled you out.#$e#What spark? Ah... The conduit of mystery, of art...#$b#People like us have a responsiblity to keep the world alive, to give folks a taste of the extraordinary.#$e#You see, kid... The world's like a bowl of rice. It's got substance, but it ain't worth nothin' without a good, zesty sauce. That's where we come in.#$b#Didn't you ever wonder who put those treasure chests in the old mineshaft? I like to give people surprises.#$e#You'll understand someday. Just keep doing your best and never give up.
Entries.Robin_HouseUpgrade_Accepted: Thank you! I'll get started tomorrow. I should be finished in around three days.
Entries.Robin_PamUpgrade_Accepted: That's so generous of you! I'll start working on the upgrade tomorrow. It should take around three days.
Entries.Mines_PlayerKilled_Robin: ...I found you unconscious in the mines. I almost mistook you for a piece of exotic wood!#$b#Be a little more careful next time, okay?$s
Entries.Mines_PlayerKilled_Clint: ...I found you unconscious in the mines. I think I blew my back out, dragging you all the way up here.#$b#Be a little more careful next time, okay?$s
Entries.Mines_PlayerKilled_Maru_Spouse: ...I found you unconscious in the mines. You were gone so long I started to get worried about you!#$b#Be a little more careful next time, okay?$s
Entries.Mines_PlayerKilled_Maru_NotSpouse: ...I found you unconscious in the mines. I was hunting for minerals and I almost stepped on your head!#$b#Be a little more careful next time, okay?$s
Entries.Mines_PlayerKilled_Linus: ...I found you unconscious in the mines. You're lucky I happened to pass by!#$b#Be a little more careful next time, okay?$s
Entries.Mines_PlayerKilled_Spouse_PlayerMale: You were gone so long I started to get worried about you! I started crying when I saw your limp body...$s
Entries.Mines_PlayerKilled_Spouse_PlayerFemale: You were gone so long I started to get worried about you! I almost had a heart attack when I saw your limp body...$a
Entries.Morris_PlayerSignedUp: Excellent! Welcome to Joja Corporation! Come back tomorrow and we can see about getting started on some community development projects... Oh, and don't forget your wallet! Hehe.#$b#Now, let me call Mayor Lewis and see about gutting that nasty old community center...
Entries.Morris_ComeBackLater: Come back tomorrow and we can see about getting some community improvements started... Just make sure to bring a lot of money. Hehe.
Entries.Morris_Greeting: Welcome to JojaMart! How are you doing today?#$b#I don't believe we've met. I'm Morris, Joja Customer Satisfaction Representative.#$b#When you decide you want to become a Joja Member, I'll be delighted to help make your transition a joyous experience.
Entries.Morris_WeekendGreeting: Welcome to JojaMart! How is your weekend going?#$b#We're currently in the process of setting up a brand-new membership system for our customers. Please check back soon to join!
Entries.Morris_FirstGreeting: Welcome to JojaMart! How are you doing today?#$b#We're currently in the process of setting up a brand-new membership system for our customers. Please check back soon to join!
Entries.Morris_FirstGreeting_CommunityCenterComp: Welcome to JojaMart! How are you doing today?#$b#Unfortunately, due to unforeseen circumstances our Joja Membership offer is not currently available. I'm certain it will get sorted out soon!
Entries.Morris_WeekendGreeting_CommunityCenterCo: Welcome to JojaMart! How is your weekend going?#$b#Unfortunately, due to unforeseen circumstances our Joja Membership offer is not currently available. I'm certain it will get sorted out soon!
Entries.Morris_WeekendGreeting_MembershipAvailab: Welcome to JojaMart! How is your weekend going?#$b#Membership is now available! With a Joja Membership, you'll be able to make improvements in the community with the help of our dedicated personnel... for a fee, of course.#$b#Oh, and another thing... Mayor Lewis promised us that if anyone else joined up, he'd let us turn that old community center into a Joja Warehouse. Isn't that wonderful?#$q -1 -1#Membership costs {0}g. Well, would you like to join us?#$r -1 -1 Yes#Yes.#$r -1 -1 No#No.
Entries.Morris_FirstGreeting_MembershipAvailable: Welcome to JojaMart! How are you doing today?#$b#Membership is now available! With a Joja Membership, you'll be able to make improvements in the community with the help of our dedicated personnel... for a fee, of course.#$b#Oh, and another thing... Mayor Lewis promised us that if anyone else joined up, he'd let us turn that old community center into a Joja Warehouse. Isn't that wonderful?#$q -1 -1#Membership costs {0}g. Well, would you like to join us?#$r -1 -1 Yes#Yes.#$r -1 -1 No#No.
Entries.Morris_WeekendGreeting_SecondPlayer: Welcome to JojaMart! How is your weekend going?#$b#Hmm... Our records show that you live on a farm with some other folks... I'm sorry, but we can only sell a membership to the owner of your residence.
Entries.Morris_FirstGreeting_SecondPlayer: Welcome to JojaMart! How are you doing today?#$b#Hmm... Our records show that you live on a farm with some other folks... I'm sorry, but we can only sell a membership to the owner of your residence.
Entries.Morris_StillProcessingOrder: We're currently processing your last Community Development order. Please come back after the work is complete.
Entries.Morris_CommunityDevelopmentForm_PlayerMa: $q -1 -1#I've got the Joja Community Development Form right here for you, sir. Care to take a look?#$r -1 -1 Yes#Yes#$r -1 -1 No#No

It was a hit!$h#$b#I'm glad Pierre's stock is starting to expand again.#$e# Anyways...

It was the first time I've seen one of those there in a while... #$b#I cooked it up for dinner last night... It filled the house with a {3} odor. I don't even want to know where Pierre found that thing.$s#$e# Anyways...

Entries.PurchasedItem_2_QualityHigh_Jodi: Hi... did you sell {1} {2} to the general store the other day? I think I bought it...#$e#It was pretty high-quality stuff. As soon as I smelled it I was back in Granny's old cottage...

Entries.PurchasedItem_3_NonRude: I went shopping last night and picked up {1} {2} on sale for only {3}g.#$e# I couldn't pass up that great price.

Entries.PurchasedItem_5_VegetableOrFruit: I bought the tastiest {2} from Pierre's shop the other day. #$b#He said that he grew the thing in his own backyard. I didn't know Pierre was such a talented farmer!$h#$b#Looks like you might have some competition, huh?

Entries.PurchasedItem_5_Foraged: I bought the tastiest {2} from Pierre's shop the other day. He said he found it himself while exploring the mountains. I didn't know Pierre was such a talented forager!

Entries.PurchasedItem_Abigail_QualityLow: Hey. We had one of those {2}s you sold at the shop for dinner last night... I guess it was starting to go bad and my Dad couldn't bear to throw it out.$h#$b#Unfortunately it tasted like {3}.$s
Entries.PurchasedItem_Abigail_QualityHigh: Hey. We had one of those {2}s you sold at the shop for dinner last night... I guess it was starting to go bad and my Dad couldn't bear to throw it out.$h#$b#It was still pretty good, though.
Entries.PurchasedItem_Caroline_QualityLow: Oh, @... This is embarrassing. I threw one of your {2}s you sold us into my compost bin.$s#$b#Now the whole thing smells horrendous. Where did you find that thing again?
Entries.PurchasedItem_Caroline_QualityHigh: Oh, @... This is embarrassing. I threw one of your {2}s you sold us into my compost bin.$s#$b#But on the bright side, the worms are really loving it! They've never looked happier!

Entries.PurchasedItem_2_QualityHigh_Jodi_Willy: Hi... did you sell {1} {2} to the fish shop the other day? I think I bought it...#$e#It was pretty high-quality stuff. Very firm meat.

Entries.PurchasedItem_3_QualityLow_Rude_Willy: I went shopping last night and picked up {1} {2} on a 'chum-bucket' sale for only {3}g.#$e# It was {4}! No wonder Willy was practically giving that {5} away...
