Entries.AnimalHouse_Incubator_Hatch_VoidEgg: A new chick hatched... It looks odd.
Entries.BeachNightMarket_SubmarineInUse: The submarine is currently in use. Come back later.
Entries.BeachNightMarket_GiftGiverClosed: Merchant: The night market starts at 5pm... visit me then for a free cup of coffee!
Entries.BeachNightMarket_GiftGiverQuestion: Merchant: Hello there! Care for a cup of coffee?
Entries.BeachNightMarket_GiftGiverEnjoy: Merchant: Mmm... smells great, doesn't it?
Entries.BeachNightMarket_PainterClosed: Famous Painter Lupini: Come back when the market opens, if you wish to purchase my fine work.
Entries.BeachNightMarket_PainterQuestion: Famous Painter Lupini: I'm selling this painting for 1200g. What do you say?
Entries.BeachNightMarket_PainterSold: Famous Painter Lupini: My apologies... I have no more paintings to sell today.
Entries.BeachNightMarket_WarperQuestion: Shrouded Figure: I can send you home for 250g.
Entries.Beach_FixBridge_Question: Use 300 pieces of wood to fix the bridge?
Entries.Beach_FixBridge_Hint: Hmmm... With 300 pieces of wood this could be fixed.
Entries.Beach_GoneFishingMessage:
Gone fishing.

   I'll be back tomorrow.
Entries.Beach_Mariner_PlayerMarried: Old Mariner: Glad the amulet worked out for ye, {0}.
Entries.Beach_Mariner_PlayerHasItem: Old Mariner: Don't be shy, now. Show that amulet to the one you intend to marry.
Entries.Beach_Mariner_PlayerNotUpgradedHouse: Old Mariner: I can see that sparkle in yer eye, {0}. Ye must be head over heels in love. But I'm afraid a bigger house is essential for a happy marriage.
Entries.Beach_Mariner_PlayerBuyItem_Question: Old Mariner: Ah, I can see it in yer eyes... There be a special someone in yer heart. Just so happens I'm sellin' a 'Mermaid's Pendant'. Give that to yer intended and they'll know exactly what you mean.
Entries.Beach_Mariner_PlayerNoRelationship: Old Mariner: I've got this old amulet to sell... but somethin' tells me yer not ready for it, {0}.
Entries.BusStop_BuyTicketToDesert: Buy a ticket to Calico Desert for 500g?
Entries.BusStop_DesertOutOfService: The bus to Calico Desert is out of service.
Entries.BusStop_NoDriver: Please return when a bus driver is present.
Entries.BusStop_ReturnToHorse2: Your loyal horse waits patiently for your return.
Entries.CommunityCenter_AreaCompletion1: We are the Junimos... Keepers of the forest.
Entries.CommunityCenter_AreaCompletion2: This house was empty for years... The trees moved in and so did we.
Entries.CommunityCenter_AreaCompletion3: We're happy to help... It's not our house, after all.
Entries.CommunityCenter_AreaCompletion4: So many wonderful bundles... thank you! Thank you!
Entries.CommunityCenter_AreaCompletion5: When we're done here, we'll return to the other world.
Entries.CommunityCenter_JunimosReturned: The Junimos have returned to the spirit world.
Entries.Farm_1SlimeEscaped: A slime escaped during the night.
Entries.Farm_GrandpaNote:
{0}-

Wait for my return on the dawn of your third year.

-Grandpa
Entries.Farm_GrandpaShrine_PlaceDiamond: You place the diamond on Grandpa's Shrine.
Entries.Farm_GrandpaShrine_DiamondSlot: There's a diamond-shaped slot in the shrine... was that always there?
Entries.Forest_WizardTower_Locked: It's locked. You can hear someone inside, though.
Entries.Forest_OpenedSewer: You unlock the sewer hatch with the Rusty Key!
Entries.Desert_BusArrived: Alright, kid. Just get back on the bus when you're ready to go home.
Entries.Bus_NoDriver: You'll have to wait until Pam's on duty to ride the bus.
Entries.DoorUnlock_NotFriend_Male: You're not good enough friends with {0} to enter his bedroom.
Entries.DoorUnlock_NotFriend_Female: You're not good enough friends with {0} to enter her bedroom.
Entries.DoorUnlock_NotFriend_Couple: You're not good enough friends with {0} or {1} to enter their bedroom.
Entries.FarmHouse_Bed_GoToSleep: Go to sleep for the night?
Entries.MensLocker_WrongGender: That's the men's locker room... you can't go in there!
Entries.WomensLocker_WrongGender: That's the women's locker room... you can't go in there!
Entries.WizardTower_WizardShrine:
The Shrine Of Illusions  
Make an offering of 500g to change your appearance?
Entries.Desert_SandDragon_Initial: Its maw gapes at the desert sun. Even in death, it yearns for a taste.
Entries.Desert_SandDragon_ConsumeEssence: You place the essence in the dragon's maw. Only then do you notice a note hidden in the eye socket:
Entries.Desert_SandDragon_MrQiNote: 'You've proven yourself, kid. Check out the pile of lumber next to your house. -Mr. Qi'
Entries.Railroad_Box_ConsumeShell: You throw the shell into the box. Immediately, a note falls down from the rafters above:
Entries.Railroad_Box_MrQiNote: 'Well done. Your next task: Place 10 beets inside Mayor's fridge. -Mr. Qi'
Entries.ManorHouse_LedgerBook_Singleplayer: Pelican Town Ledger Book... It looks like the mayor uses this to keep track of finances.
Entries.ManorHouse_LedgerBook_NoFarmhands: If any farmhands join your farm, you can transfer money to each other.
Entries.ManorHouse_LedgerBook_SharedWallets_Clie: Pelican Town Ledger Book... The owner of the farm can request the mayor to split the funds of the farmhands.
Entries.ManorHouse_LedgerBook_SharedWallets_Sepa: Split the funds of each farmer? Tonight, the money will be divided evenly. If you change your mind, come back here before night's end.
Entries.ManorHouse_LedgerBook_SeparateWallets_Ho: It's the mayor's ledger book. What would you like to do?
Entries.ManorHouse_LedgerBook_SeparateWallets_Me: Merge the funds of each farmer? Tonight, everyone's money will be combined. If you change your mind, come back here before night's end.
Entries.ManorHouse_LedgerBook_SeparateWallets_Tr: Who would you like to send money to?
Entries.ManorHouse_LedgerBook_SeparateWallets_Ho: How much money would you like to send?
Entries.ManorHouse_DivorceBook_NoSpouse: Pelican Town Marriage Log... After marriage, you may file for divorce here. Let's hope that isn't necessary!
Entries.ManorHouse_DivorceBook_Question: File for divorce? There is a 50,000g fee.
Entries.ManorHouse_DivorceBook_Cancelled: Your divorce request has been cancelled.
Entries.ManorHouse_DivorceBook_Filed: Your divorce papers have been filed, but your spouse won't know until tomorrow morning. If you change your mind, come back here before night's end.
Entries.ManorHouse_MayorFridge_Initial: It's the mayor's fridge. It's mostly full of milk and iced tea.
Entries.ManorHouse_MayorFridge_ConsumeBeets: You quickly place the beets in the fridge. Wait a sec... there's a note taped to the milk. It's addressed to you:
Entries.ManorHouse_MayorFridge_MrQiNote: 'Good job, kid. Your final task: Give the sand dragon his last meal. -Mr. Qi'
Entries.Tunnel_TunnelSafe_Initial: It's a battery powered lock-box. Unfortunately, there's no battery in it.
Entries.Tunnel_TunnelSafe_ConsumeBattery: It worked! The lock-box swings open. Inside, there's a note:
Entries.Tunnel_TunnelSafe_MrQiNote: 'Your first task: Bring a rainbow shell to the train platform. Leave it in the box. -Mr. Qi'
Entries.SkullCave_SkullDoor_Unlock: You insert the skull key into the keyhole. It's a perfect fit!
Entries.Farm_GreenhouseRuins: Whatever this once was, it's now in ruins.
Entries.Saloon_Arcade_PK_NewGame+: Press button for a more difficult journey...
Entries.JoshHouse_Alex_Trash: There's a bunch of protein bar wrappers.
Entries.SamHouse_Sam_Trash: Looks like Sam cleans his trash bin regularly.
Entries.SeedShop_Abigail_Drawers: It's full of clothes... wait. There's a sword hidden under the clothes.
Entries.Submarine_SubmergeQuestion: Captain: Ahoy there! Want to take the deep-sea fishing tour? It'll cost ya 1,000g.
Entries.Submarine_AscendQuestion: Captain: Shall I take us back up?
Entries.Submarine_Done: Captain: We're back! Make sure not to leave any fish lying around.
Entries.Mines_MineElevator_NotWorking: It doesn't seem to be working...
Entries.Mines_ResetMine:
Reset your progress in the mine?
(You'll be back at mine level 1).
Entries.Club_CalicoJack_HS: This table's for the big shots. It's a 1000 coin bet.
Entries.Club_CalicoJack: Wanna play some CalicoJack? This is the 100 coin table.
Entries.Club_QiCoins_BuyStarter: You have 0 Club Coins. Buy a starter pack for 1000g?
Entries.Club_ClubSeller: Psst... I have a 'Statue of Endless Fortune' for sale... only 1,000,000g. What do you say?
Entries.Club_ClubSeller_NotEnoughMoney: Hey, I said 1,000,000g! This isn't gonna cut it.
Entries.Town_DwarfGrave_Translated:
You translate the dwarvish:     

Stand between the pillars three
With gift as precious as the sky:
A rainbow forged from land, not sea
Then galaxies will heed your cry.
Entries.Town_mgThiefMessage: Shadow Guy: Eeeeep! You caught me! I'm sorry! Take it! Take it! It looked so valuable, I couldn't help myself...
Entries.Town_SpecialCharmQuestion: Driver: Hey kid... I need a lucky break... why don't 'cha bring me a 'rabbit's foot'? I'll make it worth your while.
Entries.Town_specialCharmNoFoot: Driver: Come back when you got a 'rabbit's foot' on ya, kid.
Entries.LockedDoor_FriendsOnly: It's locked... Only {0}'s friends can enter uninvited.
Entries.ScienceHouse_CarpenterMenu: What can I do for you?
Entries.ScienceHouse_RobinAbsent:
Sorry! Shop's closed for the day... I'm at Caroline's place for aerobics club.

-Robin
Entries.ArchaeologyHouse_Rearrange: Would you like to rearrange the museum's collection?
Entries.HaleyHouse_EmilyRoomObject: There's a tape inside:'Freeform Dance Rhythyms'
Entries.Club_CalicoJack_Rules1: The objective is to get as close to 21 as possible. Cards range from 1 to 9, except for the first card which can be as high as 11. Each player starts with two cards, but the dealer's first card remains hidden. Each turn you can choose to draw a random number between 1 and 9 or pass.
Entries.Club_CalicoJack_Rules2: Once you pass, the dealer's hidden card is revealed. She must draw until her total reaches or exceeds 18. If either player exceeds 21 on their turn, they lose. If the dealer passes, then all cards are revealed and the highest score wins.
Entries.Club_CalicoJackHS_NotEnoughCoins: You need at least 1000 coins to play here.
Entries.Club_CalicoJack_NotEnoughCoins: Hey, the betting's fixed at 100 coins. You don't have enough. Go buy some coins from the machine if you want to play.
Entries.ScienceHouse_Carpenter_UpgradeHouse1: I can increase the size of your house and add a kitchen. It will cost 10,000g and you'll also need to provide me with 450 pieces of wood. Are you interested?
Entries.ScienceHouse_Carpenter_UpgradeHouse2: I can increase the size of your house and add a nursery. It will cost 50,000g and you'll also need to provide me with 150 pieces of hardwood. Are you interested?
Entries.ScienceHouse_Carpenter_UpgradeHouse3: I can add a cellar to your house. The cellar can be used to age certain products, like wine and cheese. It will cost 100,000g. Are you interested?
Entries.ScienceHouse_Carpenter_CommunityUpgrade1: ...What's that? You want to build Pam a house? That's a great idea!^I'll just need 950 wood and 500,000g...
Entries.ScienceHouse_Carpenter_NotEnoughWood1: Sorry... You have the money, but I also need 450 pieces of wood.
Entries.ScienceHouse_Carpenter_NotEnoughWood2: Sorry... You have the money, but I also need 150 pieces of hardwood.
Entries.ScienceHouse_Carpenter_NotEnoughWood3: Sorry... You have the money, but I also need 950 pieces of wood.
Entries.Farm_WeedsDestruction: The spreading weeds have caused damage to your farm.
Entries.JojaMart_SignUp: If you become a Joja Member, the community center will become a Joja Warehouse, and you will no longer be able to refurbish it. However, Joja will provide an alternative means to improving the town. Are you sure you want to join?
Entries.Mines_Overrun: This area is overrun with monsters.
Entries.Railroad_TrainComing: A train is passing through Stardew Valley

Now open 7 days a week From 9am-5pm!

Entries.WitchHut_EvilShrineRightDeActivate: -Dark Shrine of Night Terrors-^The ancient magi-seal of protection will be restored, preventing monsters from appearing on your farm at night.^Make an offering of one Strange Bun?

--Old Master Cannoli--
...Still searching for the sweetest taste...

Entries.IslandFarmhouse_Drawer: You open the drawer and find a tattered journal...
Entries.Gourmand_Intro: Kribbibbit... Whooo? You da farmer who tend-a da land outside me house, bub?
Entries.Gourmand_RequestIntro: Gurrp... Dah land once teemed wis fresh, fresh fooda... *sigh*... me wish ta seein' da teemin' once more.
Entries.Gourmand_RequestQuestion: You be growin' da thing outside now, bub?
Entries.Gourmand_RequestFailed: Kriibbitt... You no grow da thing I wish-a da see... Grow dis a thing and return-a ta me..
Entries.Gourmand_Request_0: Grow you for me... da pink thing... da juicy thing...
Entries.Gourmand_Request_0_Success: Gurrrp... Yes. Bombo pink... Bombo juicy...|...Bringin' me back to da good old days... sunny days when things bein' sweeter...|*slurp*... Me wanna take a big bombo juicy bite...|...But, me won't.
Entries.Gourmand_Request_1: Me wanna see da longo yellow ticklin' thing... da thing dat be wavin' in the wind...
Entries.Gourmand_Request_1_Success: Gurrrp... Good. Bombo longo and when da run through it... bombo ticklin'.|Heh... remindin' me of an old girlfriend... *gurp*...|Heh... Now me wanna tickle-da you...|...But, me won't.
Entries.Gourmand_Request_2: Me wanna eat da zesty ground-fruit, but make da breath stink...
Entries.Gourmand_Request_2_Success: Gurrrp... Yes... Me eatin' da thing once. Made da breath smell bombo bad...|...Remindin' me of Papa when I was just a tadpole...|Heh... Me wanna take a big bite, and smell bombo bad...|...But, me won't.
Entries.Gourmand_Reward: Kriibbitt... Yes... Thank-a da you. This bringin' me back... To da good times, long, long ago, bub...|Here... This da for you.
Entries.Gourmand_LastReward: Kriibbitt... Yes... Me remember everything now!|Thank-a da you for remindin' me so much.|This da one last reward for you, bub.
Entries.Gourmand_Finished: Kriibbitt... Good to see you again, bombo-friend.|I hope a you growin' da big bombo fruit, bub!
Entries.Gourmand_InProgress: Ah... I see you growin' da thing. But it's still ding-ee small. Come back when it's bombo big...

Club_CalicoJack_Rules1.0: Tujuan permainan adalah mendapatkan kartu dengan nilai mendekati 21 setipis mungkin. Nilai kartu beragam dari 1-9, kecuali untuk kartu pertama yang nilainya bisa setinggi 11. Setiap pemain mulai dengan 2 kartu, tapi kartu pertama dealer disembunyikan. Di setiap giliran kamu bisa memilih untuk mengambil kartu acak yang bernilai antara 1-9 atau bisa memilih berhenti.

Club_CalicoJack_Rules2.0: Jika memilih berhenti, maka kartu dealer akan dibuka. Dan dia terus mengambil kartu sampai jumlah nilanya mencapai atau melebihi 18. Jika kedua pemain dapat nilai melebihi 21 pada giliran mereka, maka mereka kalah. Jika dealer memilih berhenti, maka semua kartu akan dibuka dan yang nilainya tertinggi akan menang.

Entries.0:
Tips On Farming--
*Use fertilizer to improve quality, reduce workload, or hasten crop growth.
*Fruit trees take a whole season to grow, but they require very little maintenance. Keep the area directly around your new sapling clear, or else it may not grow properly.
*Crops will die as soon as the season ends, unless they grow in multiple seasons (e.g. Corn).
*Some crops, such as kale and wheat, need to be harvested with the scythe.
Entries.1:
...This is a book by Marnie.
 'Animals are very sensitive. They like to be pet every day, and prefer to eat grass outdoors than dry hay. They don't like being outside in the rain, though. Happy animals produce higher quality products!'
Entries.2:
On Foraging
 The local woods and mountains are great places to find wild produce! A good forager will clear out any weeds, stumps, or stones from these areas, so the wild produce has plenty of space to grow!
Expert foragers know the secret to cultivating wild food so that it can be grown on the farm. Isn't that amazing?
Entries.3:
The Fisherman, Act I: 
Tex: Gordy, how do you catch so many fish? For me, it takes forever!
Gordy: You must make the choice to become a true fisherman... and over time your fishing speed will increase!
Tex: So you're saying that improving my fishing skill will make me fish faster?
Gordy:Correct. One day you may even learn the secret to creating your very own bobbers, improving your mastery even more. Now, begone!
Entries.4:
How deep do the mines go?
 This question has been pondered by many Stardew Valley explorers over the years... The truth is, no one really knows. Or at least, they aren't telling anyone.
Unfortunately, many of those who venture deep into the mines never return...
However, there have been a few bold adventurers who have traveled deep into the mines, and have resurfaced with interesting reports.
 Apparently, there are three distinct areas in the mine, each with unique monsters and treasures.
Some adventurers speak of gigantic underground lakes and strange creatures... But none of these claims have been proven.
Entries.5:
An old farmer's journal:
 I've been here for a year now, and I've started to make friends with the local townspeople. It sure feels great! And they're sending me gifts and secret family recipes in the mail, too! That's really helpful.
Entries.6:
'Scarecrows'
 Once you start growing a lot of crops on your farm, you can expect to be visited by crows. In the morning, you might discover that a crow has made breakfast out of your hard work!
One way to prevent those bothersome crows from eating your crops is to set up scarecrows near your crops.
Be aware that scarecrows have limited range, so you'll need multiple if your farm is large.
Scarecrows keep track of how many crows they've diverted. You can use that to tell if they're in a useful spot.

* 'Collectible Scarecrows' aren't just for looks! They work just the same as the regular model.
Entries.7:
The Secret of the Stardrop 
--
For thousands of years, people have been intrigued by the mysterious powers of the stardrop... but no one knows where they come from!
 Professor R. J. Kutler, a leading researcher on strange fruit, says this: 'We've discovered traces of genetic material on meteorites that closely resemble the Stardrop, but it's not a proven match'.
Regardless of where they come from, the peculiar fruit is said to be uncommonly delicious... and some even claim they grant special power to those who eat them.
Entries.8:
Journey Of The Prairie King -- The Smash Hit Video Game!

Did you know? Anyone who beats 'Journey Of The Prairie King' is automatically entered into a drawing for a special prize!

Did you know? The developer has stated that the protagonist is based on a real-life character... A true cowboy hero from a prairie-island in the Gem Sea!
Entries.9:
-- A Study On Diamond Yields --

 After years of research in the mines, I believe I've learned something about diamond frequency.
My research involved only the stones that are scattered about the mines...The ones that are broken with a pickaxe. Mineral yields from other sources require more research.
Diamonds seem to only form at mine level 50 or greater. At level 50, approximately 1 in 500 stones will be diamond-rich.
 After level 50, the frequency of diamond formation seems to increase by about .000016 per level. Quite a rare gem!
-M. Jasper
Entries.10:
-~-Brewmaster's Guide-~-
   Ah... to brew! 
The rich smell of yeast wafting through a cedar loft... The floral overtones of freshly cut hops on a winter's eve... but I digress. You are probably more interested in the practical side of brewing...
To brew, you will need a keg. I'll leave it up to you to devise blueprints for a keg.
Kegs can be used to make several kinds of product. If vegetables are placed inside, the keg will produce juice. Juice takes the least amount of time to brew.
If wheat is placed in the keg, it will produce beer. Beer takes a while to brew, but it is quite profitable.
Placing hops in a keg will produce the beloved 'Pale Ale'
Place fruit in the keg to make wine. Wine takes the longest of all to make, but a wine made from the finest fruit is worth quite a bit!
Be patient with your keg... you'll know it's finished when it's perfectly still. And only drink in moderation, or you'll surely regret it!
Entries.11:
Mysteries Of The Dwarves
The Dwarves call themselves 'Smoluanu'... which translates to 'sky people'. An odd name for a group that lives deep underground, isn't it?
Another mystery of the dwarves is the advanced technology they supposedly possess. Evidence such as this had led me, despite the ridicule of my colleagues, to propose a new theory:
I believe the dwarves are the remnants of a once advanced civilization whose interplanetary vehicle crashed on this planet long ago.
I propose that this dwarvish spaceship bore down, deep underground... and over time, the dwarves became adapted to their new underground environment.
 My colleagues ask, 'Why didn't they come above ground and live on the surface?' ...Perhaps their old planet had a thicker atmosphere that protected them from stellar radiation, and they simply could not survive in our sunlight.
 That would explain why they only surface at night to take what they need from our houses...

-M. Jasper
Entries.12:
Highlights From The Book Of Yoba

Before time there was only the endless golden light.
 The light called out to itself...'Yoba'.
Yoba wanted more.
Yoba swirled the golden light into a vortex. Yoba swirled and swirled until a hole formed in the eye of the vortex.
From this hole sprung a seed.
Yoba smoothed the golden light.
Yoba smoothed and smoothed, and the light became soil.
Into this soil, Yoba planted the seed.
The seed sprouted, and behold! A vine sprung skyward, twisting and probing, casting a writhing shadow onto the golden void.
After 11 days, the vine bore fruit.
Yoba, with knowing wisdom, peeled the tough skin off the fruit and saw that the world was inside.
And so that is how the world came to be.
Entries.13:
Marriage Guide For Farmers
Before you ask someone to marry you, you'll have to date them for a while first (Ask someone to date you with a bouquet from Pierre's).
 When you're ready to pop the big question, you'll need to give them a 'Mermaid's Pendant'. Everyone knows what it means when you present them with one of those.
 It's rumored that on stormy days, the ghost of an old mariner appears in Stardew Valley, clutching just such a pendant.
 After the wedding ceremony, your partner will move in with you. Remember to treat your spouse well... They still like gifts even after marriage!
 
(Paid for by Pierre)
Entries.14:
The Fisherman, Act II: 
Tex: Gordy, tell me your best fisherman's story.
Gordy: *deep sigh*...I've caught a lot of big fish in my time...And some that are very rare and difficult...But there was one that I struggled to catch for three days and three nights
Gordy: I call this fish... 'The Legend'. He was a huge beast... And the harder I tugged on the line, the harder he tugged back. I let my guard down for a moment and he snapped my boat in two. I've never fished since.
Tex: Do you think anyone will ever catch him?
Gordy: Hmm... If this person were a master at fishing, and caught all other rare fish first, and made sure they ate the correct kind of food... then maybe. Above all you've got to have respect for the water, son.
Tex:...son? Do you mean... you're...
 ...f...father?
Gordy: Yes, my boy.

**Dramatic Music as the curtains fall**
Entries.15:
Technology Report!

The blueprints for an advanced piece of machinery called a 'Crystalarium' have recently been published.
 This machine can grow crystals from almost nothing, providing their owners with endless supplies of valuable gems!
Here's how it works: Place a gem of your choice inside the crystalarium... 
now be patient, it can take up to several days... but eventually the crystalarium will grow a copy of whatever you placed inside!
You'll know it's ready when it stops wiggling. Once you remove your gem the crystalarium will start working on yet another clone... You'll never need to restock it unless you want to change the kind of gem it produces!
Unfortunately, the crystalarium doesn't work with the extremely rare gemstone known as 'Prismatic Shard'... For some reason, the EMF from the shard interacts negatively with the crystalarium.
Entries.16:
Secrets Of The Legendary Fish

Fishermen speak of five rare and unique fish that can only be caught by skilled anglers. Once caught, they will never appear again.

The crimsonfish lives in the warm ocean waters of summer. It's been sighted on the far eastern side of the beach.

The Glacierfish, which only appears in winter, can be caught off the southern tip of arrowhead island in Cindersap Forest... near where the river meets the ocean.

The Anglerfish has been spotted in fall, north of town where the river flows down from the mountains.

There's rumor of a strange, twisted fish that lives in the sewer.



The final fish, of a species never before caught, is known simply as 'legend'. It is rumored that he lives in a log submerged in the mountain lake, and only ventures out on rainy spring days to nibble at the frog's eggs. Only the most skilled fisherman can hope to catch this one.

Train at fishing and be persistent, and eventually you will catch these elusive fish. Make sure to respect the water and don't remove too many fish from the ecosystem.

...Saw something weird in the tunnel leading out from Pelican Town. There's a little door hidden in the dark. Couldn't get it open, though.

-Gunther
Entries.18: Note From Gunther: Wow, this library has really become great, thanks to your help! Thanks a bunch!
Entries.19: Goblins^by M. Jasper^^The species commonly known as "Goblin" seems to have originated in the forests of the far northeast, beyond the Bluemire Hills. Characterized by their green skin, bright red eyes, and foul smell, initial encounters with Goblins can be frightening for unexperienced travelers.^^Despite their unsettling appearance, Goblins possess an intellectual and emotional capacity akin to humans, and have no trouble learning our customs and languages. The goblins I've met have been rather friendly and amiable, once I've shown that I mean no harm. Unfortunately, centuries of distrust and ill-treatment from humans has led many Goblins to pursue careers in the employ of witches, warlocks, necromancers, and other unsavory types.^^A traditional Goblin diet largely consists of grub meat, typically from the large and juicy grub varieties native to the Goblin home-forest. On special occasions, Goblins will indulge in an item called 'void mayonnaise'... considered perhaps the finest delicacy in all Goblin cuisine.

0.0:
Tips Dalam Bertani--
*Gunakan pupuk untuk meningkatkan kualitas, mengurangi beban kerja, atau mempercepat pertumbuhan tanaman.
*Phon buah butuh semusim penuh untuk tumbuh, tapi mereka hanya butuh sedikit perawatan. Pastikan area sekitar bibit pohonmu bersih, atau pohonnya tidak akan tumbuh dengan baik.
*Tanaman akan mati saat musim sudah berakhir, kecuali kalau mereka memang bisa tumbuh di banyak musim (Contoh. Jagung).
*Beberapa tanaman, seperti kale and wheat, perlu dipanen dengan sabit.

1.0:
...Buku ini ditulis oleh Marnie.
 'Binatang sangatlah sensitif. Mereka suka dielus-elus setiap hari, dan lebih suka dengan rumput di luar daripada jerami yang kering. Tapi mereka tidak suka diluar saat hujan turun. Binatang yang bahagia akan menghasilkan produk berkualitas tinggi!'

2.0:
Hasil Bumi Liar
 Hutan lokal dan pegunungan merupakan tempat terbaik untuk menemukan hasil bumi liar! Pencari hasil bumi liar yang baik pasti akan membersihkan gulma, pohon yang tumbang, dan batuan dari area ini, supaya tanaman liar bisa mendapatkan tempat yang luas untuk tumbuh!
Ahli pencari hasil bumi liar tahu rahasia untuk membudidayakan makanan liar supaya bisa ditanam di kebun. Bukankah itu luar biasa?

3.0:
Sang Nelayan, Ayat I: 
Tex: Gordy, bagaimana kau bisa menangkap banyak ikan? Aku butuh waktu lama untuk mengumpulkan sebanyak ini!
Gordy: Kamu harus mulai mengambil jalan nelayan sejati... dan sembari itu kecepatan memancingmu akan meningkat!
Tex: Jadi maksudmu dengan meningkatkan kemampuan memancingku akan membuatku bisa memancing dengan cepat?
Gordy: Benar. Suatu hari nanti kamu mungkin akan tahu rahasia cara membuat pelampung untuk pancingmu, dan meningkatkan kemampuanmu lebih baik lagi. Sekarang, pergilah!

4.0:
Sampai berapa dalam gua itu?
 Pertanyaan ini sudah sering diulang-ulang oleh kebanyakan petualang di Stardew Valley dari tahun ke tahun... Kenyataannya, tidak ada yang tahu pasti. Atau mungkin, tidak ada yang menceritakannya.
Sayangnya, banyak yang melakukan perjalanan ke gua tersebut tapi tidak pernah kembali lagi...
Meski begitu, ada beberapa petualang pemberani yang sudah menjelajahi gua tersebut sampai dalam sekali, dan kembali dengan laporan yang menarik.
 Tampaknya, gua ini dipisah menjadi tiga area, masing-masing dengan mosnter dan harta karun yang unik.
Beberapa petualang menyebutkan tentang danau bawah tanah dan monster-monster aneh... Tapi pernyataan tersebut masih belum terbukti kebenarannya.

5.0:
Jurnal seorang petani tua:
 Aku sudah setahun di sini, dan aku mulai berteman dengan warga lokal. Rasanya menyenangkan! Dan mereka sering mengirimiku hadiah dan resep rahasia keluarga lewat surat, juga! Itu sangat membantu.

6.0:
'Scarecrow'
 Setelah tanamanmu di kebun banyak yang tumbuh, kebunmu pasti akan dikunjungi gagak. Di pagi harinya, kau baru menyadari kalau gagak-gagak tersebut memakan hasil kerja kerasmu!
Salah satu cara untuk mencegah gagak yang menyebalkan agar tidak memakan tumbuhanmu adalah dengan memasang Scarecrow di dekatnya.
Ingatlah bahwa Scarecrow punya jarak yang terbatas, jadi kamu akan butuh beberapa jika kebunmu luas.
Scarecrow akan ingat berapa ekor gagak yang mereka usir. Kamu bisa memanfaatkan informasi itu untuk menentukan apakah mereka ada di area yang tepat atau bukan.

* 'Collectible Scarecrow' tidak hanya untuk pajangan! Mereka juga berfungsi sama seperti model yang biasa.

7.0:
Rahasia Stardrop 
--
Selama ribuan tahun, orang-orang tertarik pada kekuatan misterius stardrop... tapi tidak ada yang tahu darimana asalnya!
 Professor R. J. Kutler, seorang peneliti terkemuka yang meneliti buah-buahan aneh, mengatakan: 'Kami sudah menemukan jejak materi genetik dari meteor yang mirip dengan Stardrop, tapi tidak ditemukan kecocokan'.
Entah dari manapun asalnya, buah istimewa ini dikatakan sangat luar biasa lezat... dan beberapa bahkan mengaku mendapatkan kekuatan spesial bagi yang memakannya.

8.0:
Journey Of The Prairie King -- Vidio Gim Yang Lagi Ngehit!

Apa kamu tahu? Siapapun yang bisa menamatkan 'Journey Of The Prairie King' akan secara langsung dimasukkan ke undian dengan hadiah spesial!

Apa kamu tahu? Pengembangnya mengatakan bahwa tokoh utamanya berdasarkan karakter kisah nyata... Seorang pahlawan koboi sejati dari pulau padang rumput di Laut Gem!

9.0:
-- Studi Dalam Panen Berlian --

 Setelah bertahun-tahu melakukan riset di tambang, aku yakin bahwa aku mempelajari sesuatu tentang frekuaensi berlian.
Penelitianku hanya melibatkan batuan yang berada di tambang...yang bisa dihancurkan dengan belencong. Mineral yang dihasilkan dari sumber lain membutuhkan riset lebih dalam.
Berlian tampaknya hanya terbentuk di tambang lantai 50 atau lebih dalam. Pada lantai 50, kemunginannua adalah 1 dari 500 batu akan berisikan berlian.
 Setelah tingkat 50, frekuensi berlian tampak meningkat dengan nilai sekitar 0.000016 tiap tingkatnya. Batuan mulia yang sangat langka!
-M. Jasper

10.0:
-~-Panduan Pembuat Bir-~-
 Ah... bir! 
Aroma ragi kental yang bercampur dengan kayu pohon cemara... Warna bunga hop yang dipetik pada malam musim dingin... aku mulai ngelantur. Kamu mungkin lebih tertarik dengan penjelasan teknis dalam membuat bir...
Untuk membuat bir, kamu akan butuh sebuah keg. Aku akan serahkan padamu untuk cara membuat keg-nya.
Keg dapat digunakan untuk membuat beberapa produk. Jika sayuran yang dimasukkan, maka keg akan menghasilkan jus. Jus butuh waktu paling sedikit untuk diproses.
Jika gandum dimasukkan ke dalam keg, maka itu akan memproduksi bir. Bir butuh waktu untuk diproses, tapi lumayan menguntungkan.
Meletakkan bunga hop dalam keg maka akan memproduksi 'Pale Ale'
Masukkan buah ke dalam keg untuk memproduksi wine. Wine butuh waktu yang sangat lama untuk diproses, tapi sebuah wine yang dibuat dari buah terbaik akan menghasilkan laba yang lumayan!
Bersabarlah dengan keg-mu... kau akan tahu saat prosesnya selesai jika keg-mu diam tak bergerak. Dan minumlah dengan bijak, atau kau akan menyesal nanti!

11.0:
Misteri Para Kurcaci
Para Kurcaci menyebut diri mereka 'Smoluanu'... yang berarti 'orang-orang langit'. Nama yang aneh bagi segerombolan kelompok yang hidup jauh di bawah tanah, bukan?
Misteri lainnya dari kurcaci adalah teknologi canggih yang diduga mereka miliki. Bukti semacam inilah yang menuntunku, mengacuhkan tertawaan rekan-rekanku, untuk untuk menawarkan sebuah teori baru:
Aku percaya bahwa kurcaci adalah sisa dari peradaban maju yang alat transportasi antar planetnya jatuh ke planet ini dahulu sekali.
Aku beranggapan bahwa piring terbang kurcaci jatuh ke tanah, yang sangat dalam... dan seiring waktu, para kurcaci mulai beradaptasi dengan lingkungan bawah tanah tersebut.
 Rekanku bertanya, 'Kenapa mereka tidak naik ke atas dan tinggal di permukaan?' ...Mungkin planet asal mereka puny atmosfer yang lebih tebal yang melindungi mereka dari radiasi bintang, dan mereka tidak bisa bertahan hidup dengan paparan sinar matahari.
 Itu bisa menjelaskan kenapa mereka hanya ke permukaan di malam hari untuk mengambil apa yang mereka butuhkan dari rumah kita...

-M. Jasper

12.0:
Cuplikan Dari Buku Yoba

Sebelum waktu hanya ada cahaya keemasan yang abadi.
 Cahaya tersebut menyebut dirinya...'Yoba'.
Yoba ingin lebih.
Yoba memuta-mutar cahaya sampai menjadi sebuah pusaran. Yoba memutar dan memutar lagi hingga terbentuk sebuah lubang di tengah pusaran.
DAri lubang ini muncul sebuah bibit.
Yoba menghaluskan cahaya keemasan tersebut.
Yoba menghaluskan dan menghaluskan lagi, dan cahaya tersebut menjadi tanah.
Di tanah ini, Yoba menanam bibit tersebut.
Bibitnya tumbuh, dan lihatlah! Sebuah batang menjulur ke langit, memutar dan menjajaki, memanggil bayangan yang menggeliat menuju keemasan yang hampa.
Setelah 11 hari, batang tersebut melahirkan buah.
Yoba, yang dikenal kebijakannya, mengelupas kulit keras dari buah tersebut dan melihat ada dunia di dalamnya.
Dan begitulah asal-usul dunia ini.

13.0:
Panduan Menikah Bagi Petani
Sebelum kamu melamar seseorang, kamu harus berpacaran dulu dengannya (Tembak seseorang dengan membeli buket bunga dari Pierre).
 Ketika kamu siap melamar, kamu harus memberi dia 'Jimat Putri Duyung'. Semua orang tahu apa artinya jika kau memberi mereka jimat ini.
 Dirumorkan bahwa di hari yang badai, hantu seorang Pelaut Tua akan muncul di Stardew Valley, menggenggam jimat tersebut.
 Setelah upacara pernikahan, pasanganmu akan pindah ke rumahmu. Ingatlah untuk selalu memperlakukan pasanganmu dengan baik... Mereka masih tetap senang diberi hadiah meskipun sudah kau nikahi!
 
(Dibayar oleh Pierre)

14.0:
The Fisherman, Act II: 
Tex: Gordy, ceritakan kisah nelayan terbaikmu padaku.
Gordy: *bernafas dalam*...Aku sudah menangkap banyak ikan dalam hidupku...Dan beberapa ikan ada yang sangat langka dan sulit ditangkap...Tapi ada yang juga yang kutangkap selama tiga hari tiga malam karena saking sulitnya
Gordy: Aku menyebut ikan ini... 'The Legend'. Dia besar dan buas... Dan semakin kuat aku menarik pancingku, semakin kuat pula dia menarik umpannya. Aku sempat lengah sesaat dan dia membelah perahuku jadi dua bagian. Aku tidak pernah memancing lagi semenjak itu.
Tex: Apa kau pikir ada seseorang yang bisa menangkapnya?
Gordy: Hmm... Jika orang ini ahli memancing, dan bisa menangkap ikan-ikan langka terlebih dulu, dan juga makan makanan yang tepat... maka bisa saja. Hal yang paling penting adalah kau harus menghormati lautan, nak.
Tex:...nak? Jangan-jangan... Kamu...
 ...a...ayah?
Gordy: Ya, putraku.

**Musik Dramatis bermain ketika tirai ditutup**

15.0:
Laporan Teknologi!

Cetak biru dari alat canggih yang disebut 'Crystalarium' telah dipublikasikan.
 Mesin ini mampu membuat kristal tanpa perlu bahan apa-apa, memberikan pemilik mesin pasokan batu mulia tanpa ada batasan!
Begini cara kerjanya: Taruh sebuah batu mulia yang mau kau duplikat ke dalam crystalarium... 
lalu bersabarlah, prosesnya bisa terjadi selama berhari-hari... setelah selesai maka crystalarium akan menghasilkan duplikat batu mulia apapun yang kau taruh di dalam!
Kau akan akan tahu kalau hasilnya sudah siap saat mesinnya berhenti bergetar. Setelah kau mengambil batuan mulia hasil duplikat maka crystalarium akan memproses duplikatnya lagi... Kalian tidak perlu memberinya apa-apa kecuali saat ingin mengganti jenis batuan mulia yang ingin kalian duplikat!
Sayangnya, crystalarium tidak bisa menduplikat batuan mulia yang sangat langka semacam 'Prismatic Shard'... Entah kenapa, gelombang elektromagnetik dari Prismatic Shard bereaksi negatif pada mesin crystalarium.

16.0:
Rahasia dari ikan legendaris

Para nelayan menyebut lima ikan langka dan unik yang hanya bisa ditangkap oleh pengguna pancing yang sangat ahli. Setelah ditangkap, mereka tidak akan muncul lagi.

Ikan crimsonfish hidup di lautan hangat musim panas. Ada yang pernah melihat sosok ikan ini di bagian ujung timur pantai.

Ikan Glacierfish, hanya muncul saat musim dingin, hanya bisa ditangkap di ujung selatan pulau kepala panah di Hutan Cindersap... dekat di tempat di mana air laut bertemu dengan air sungai.

Ikan Anglerfish tampak pada saat musim gugur, di ujung selatan desa di mana aliran sungai turun dari gunung.

Rumor menyebutkan bahwa ada ikan aneh, dan buruk rupa yang tinggal di saluran got.



Ikan terakhir, adalah spesies yang belum pernah ada yang bisa menangkap, orang-orang menyebutnya ikan 'legend'. Dirumorkan juga bahwa dia tinggal di dalam bongkahan pohon yang tenggelam di danau dekat gunung, dan hanya muncul pada saat hujan di musim semi untuk menyantap telur-telur katak. Hanya nelayan paling ahli yang bisa berharap untuk menangkapnya.

Latihlah teknik memancingmu dengan keras, maka kau akan bisa menangkap ikan-ikan langka tersebut. Jangan lupa untuk menghormati perairan dan jangan mengambil terlalu banyak ikan dari ekosistem.

17.0:
...Aku melihat ada sesuatu yang aneh di terowongan menuju ke jalan keluar dari Desa Pelican. Ada pintu kecil tersembunyi di kegelapan. Tapi pintunya tidak dapat dibuka.

-Gunther

18.0: Catatan dari Gunther: Wow, perpusatakaan ini jadi tempat yang semakin hebat, semua berkat bantuanmu! Terima kasih banyak!

19.0: Goblin^oleh M. Jasper^^Spesie yang secara umum dikenal sebagai "Goblin" sepertinya berasal dari hutan di ujung timurlaut, melewati Bukit Bluemire. Dengan ciri-ciri kulit berwarna hijau, mata merah menyala, dan bau busuk, berjumpa dengan Goblin dapat menakutkan bagi wisatawan yang kurang pengalaman.^^Meskipun memiliki penampilan yang meresahkan, Goblin memeiliki kecerdasan dan kapasitas emosional yang mirip seperti manusia, dan tidak bermasalah saat mempelajari bahasa dan adat istiadat kita. Para goblin yang kutemui kebanyakan sangat ramah, setelah aku menunjukkan niat baikku. Sayangnya, berabad-abad diskriminasi dari manusia membuat beberapa goblin bekerja dengan penyihir, ahli nujum, dan sejenisnya.^^Diet tradisional goblin kebanyakan terdiri dari daging, khususnya dari varian daging yang besar dan padat yang berasal dari dekat hutan tempat goblin berasal. Pada kesempatan khusus, Goblin akan memanjakan diri dengan item yang disebut 'void mayonnaise'... yang dianggap terlezat dari semua hidangan Goblin.

Entries.Event.cs.1306: The farm hasn't changed much all that much since we last spoke... but that's okay.#$b#If you're enjoying your new life, that's all that matters to me...#$b#I must return to the other world, now... but feel free to call on me again when you're ready.

Entries.Event.cs.1810: Ahh... I see you in the saloon, surrounded by friends. It doesn't seem like you have any favorites... you're popular with everyone!
Entries.Event.cs.1811: Ahh... yes. I see you at the beach. There's some kind of event taking place. You walk up to {0} and say something funny... Hmmm... It seems like you two are good friends.
Entries.Event.cs.1815: He thought everyone forgot, but then you show up with a nice gift. What a good friend.
Entries.Event.cs.1816: She thought everyone forgot, but then you show up with a nice gift. What a good friend.
Entries.Event.cs.1818: Hmm... I see you laying on a cot... It looks like a hospital. {0} is there to keep you company while you recover. What a nice friend.

Entries.Event.cs.1826: ...Oh? It seems you'll be leaving more than a few heartbroken... Are you playing games with those who put their trust in you? Hmm...
Entries.Event.cs.1827: Now I see you and {0} in a field of grass. You seem happy.
Entries.Event.cs.1829: Now I see you and {0} in a dimly lit room. You look serious... but not unhappy. Something important must be happening.
Entries.Event.cs.1831: Ooo... It's dark, and I see you and a certain young man. He looks a little bashful, but happy to be with you.
Entries.Event.cs.1832: Ooo... It's dark, and I see you and a certain young man. He looks quite hopeful, and eager to spend time with you.
Entries.Event.cs.1833: Ooo... It's dark, and I see you and a certain young lady. She looks a little bashful, but happy to be with you.
Entries.Event.cs.1834: Ooo... It's dark, and I see you and a certain young lady. She looks quite hopeful, and eager to spend time with you.
Entries.Event.cs.1837: Hmmm... now what's this young man's name? ... I believe it starts with an '{0}'.
Entries.Event.cs.1838: Hmmm... now what's this young lady's name? ... I believe it starts with an '{0}'.
Entries.Event.cs.1843: Interesting... I see you and {0} working together on a farm. You seem very pleased about something.
Entries.Event.cs.1845: Now I see you, middle-aged, walking through town at dusk. You pause at a window to see a family having dinner. You hang your head and hurry off into the darkness.
Entries.Event.cs.1846: The crystal ball has moved on... Now I see you harvesting a plump, ripe melon. You're on a wonderful looking farm, bursting with life!
Entries.Event.cs.1847: The crystal ball has moved on... I see you somewhere dark... but there you are, inspecting a marvelous gemstone! It's glittering in the light of a small lantern.
Entries.Event.cs.1848: The crystal ball has moved on... AH! You're in combat! There's something dreadful bearing down on you from the dark, but you seem more than ready to face it.
Entries.Event.cs.1849: The crystal ball has moved on... Now I see you relaxing on the riverbanks, holding a fishing pole. Oh! Looks like something big is on the line!
Entries.Event.cs.1850: The crystal ball has moved on... It's you... in the forest. You spot some rare and delicious mushrooms hidden beneath a clump of grass... what a find!
Entries.Event.cs.1851: The crystal ball has moved on... I see you in a golden room... grinning about something. Oh, I see... You're playing some kind of game and you just can't lose!
Entries.Event.cs.1852: Ah... the crystal ball has gone dim. That's all I can do for you, young one.
Entries.Event.cs.1853: Now, just keep in mind that the future isn't set in stone! Whatever I've told you today can still be changed, if you set your heart on it. Farewell.

Entries.Utility.cs.5256: Welcome, everyone, to the 16th Centennial Stardew Hero Celebration!$h#$b#We've been a long time without a Stardew Hero, and I think we can all agree it's time to bestow this prestigious award on someone new!
Entries.Utility.cs.5259: ...The title of Stardew Hero is awarded only to those who've displayed extraordinary commitment to this valley and the people who live here.
Entries.Utility.cs.5260: There are many here who've done a lot for this community, but unfortunately there can only be one Stardew Hero.#$b#...And standing before you today are the two top contenders. @ and %rival.
Entries.Utility.cs.5263: @ moved here 2 years ago, and in that time {0} #$b#...Those kinds of accomplishments could breathe life into any community!
Entries.Utility.cs.5306: %rival also moved here 2 years ago. In that time he created one of the most productive farms I've ever seen!$h#$b#...And funneled a large sum into my personal bank acc... er, I mean campaign fund!
Entries.Utility.cs.5307: %rival also moved here 2 years ago. In that time she created one of the most productive farms I've ever seen!$h#$b#...And funneled a large sum into my personal bank acc... er, I mean campaign fund!
Entries.Utility.cs.5310: I would like to to say how much of a *blessing* it's been to meet all of you wonderful people! I'm so happy to know how important I am in making this community great.$h#$b#Unfortunately, @ was so jealous of me that he did everything possible to drag me down!$u#$b#But, against all odds, I've single-handedly transformed this valley into a new paradise, and touched your hearts in a way you'll never forget. *sniff*

Entries.Utility.cs.5315: The next Stardew Hero will be...
Entries.Utility.cs.5317: Congratulations, @! You earned it with a whopping {0} points!$h
Entries.Utility.cs.5320: I told you my seeds would get the job done!$h
Entries.Utility.cs.5321: This is the stupidest town I've ever set my foot in!$s
Entries.Utility.cs.5324: Well, congratulations %rival... It looks like you outscored @ by {0} points. $h
Entries.Utility.cs.5325: Of course I did. I never considered @ a threat even for a millisecond.$u
Entries.Utility.cs.5326: ...Sorry @. You did well, but you didn't accomplish enough to win.$s
Entries.Utility.cs.5327: Don't be sad, @... We still love you.$h
Entries.Utility.cs.5349: We all knew you were going to win, @. %rival was kind of a jerk.
Entries.Utility.cs.5351: It's such a great honor you received, @! But you earned it.
Entries.Utility.cs.5360: Hmmph. They'd never give that award to an old timer like me.
Entries.Utility.cs.5364: Ugh... how in the world did %rival win? That's awful.
Entries.Utility.cs.5367: When @ first arrived in Pelican Town, no one knew if he'd fit in with our community...#$b#But from this day forward, @ is going to be as much a part of this town as any of us!$h#$b#It is my great honor on this day {0} of {1}, to unite @ and %spouse in the bonds of marriage.
Entries.Utility.cs.5369: When @ first arrived in Pelican Town, no one knew if she'd fit in with our community...#$b#But from this day forward, @ is going to be as much a part of this town as any of us!$h#$b#It is my great honor on this day {0} of {1}, to unite @ and %spouse in the bonds of marriage.
Entries.Utility.cs.5370: Well, let's get right to it!
Entries.Utility.cs.5371: @... %spouse... #$b# As the mayor of Pelican Town, and regional bearer of the matrimonial seal, I now pronounce you husband and... well, husband!$h
Entries.Utility.cs.5373: @... %spouse... #$b# As the mayor of Pelican Town, and regional bearer of the matrimonial seal, I now pronounce you husband and wife!$h
Entries.Utility.cs.5375: @... %spouse... #$b# As the mayor of Pelican Town, and regional bearer of the matrimonial seal, I now pronounce you wife and... well, wife!$h

Entries.Bus.cs.7129: Kid: Dude, don't touch my board.
Entries.Bus.cs.7131: Lady: We just got back from the Zuzu City fun park... didn't we Simon?
Entries.Bus.cs.7134: Moustached Man: Don't worry, friend. I've got my eyes peeled for the valley.
Entries.Bus.cs.7135: It doesn't look too happy in there...
Entries.Bus.cs.7136: Old Lady: You're liable to hurt someone, waltzing around on a moving bus!
Entries.Bus.cs.7137: Old Lady: Ah well, if my knees weren't so stiff I'd probably do the same. Hehee.
Entries.Bus.cs.7140: Man: Get your claws off my bag.
Entries.Bus.cs.7141: Man: ...Did you hear me, kid? Scram!
Entries.Bus.cs.7142: Man: What are you, some kind of bum?
Entries.Bus.cs.7144: Man: For the love of Yoba, get your filthy paws off my designer bag!
Entries.Bus.cs.7145: Man: That bag costs more than you'll make in ten years!
Entries.Bus.cs.7146: Man: Arghh!! Take this and leave me alone, you hooligan!
Entries.Bus.cs.7150: Driver: Hey, you'd better take a seat.
Entries.Bus.cs.7152: Oooo... My feet hurt from all that shopping.$s#$b#Hey. Could you ask the driver how long it'll be until we get to Stardew?
Entries.Bus.cs.7156: Driver: Huh? We're almost there. It should only be a few more minutes.
Entries.Bus.cs.7157: Sir? Are you still there?$u#$b#Uh-huh... sorry to put you on hold, sir. I had some business to attend to.$h
Entries.Bus.cs.7158: That's right, sir... I'm on the bus right now, heading to Stardew Valley.$h
Entries.Bus.cs.7159: I have to say, so far I've been quite unimpressed with the locals.$h
Entries.Bus.cs.7160: They seem like a docile and unfashionable sort of people.$s#$b#The children look sickly, and all the young men are delinquents from what I've seen so far...$h
Entries.Bus.cs.7161: Although, they are displaying our corporate logo, which you'll be pleased to hear, sir.$h
Entries.Bus.cs.7162: *snort* ... Yes, sir. It definitely won't be a problem to get these country rubes to sign the paperwork...$u#$b#We'll have that new Joja Hypermarket up and running in no time. Then maybe we can discuss that new-$u
Entries.Bus.cs.7164: Moustached Man: There it is! Stardew Valley!

Entries.GrandpaStory.cs.12029: I want you to have this sealed envelope.
Entries.GrandpaStory.cs.12030: No, no, don't open it yet... have patience.
Entries.GrandpaStory.cs.12032: Someday, you might find yourself in a desperate gloom...
Entries.GrandpaStory.cs.12033: ...and your spirit will fight to stay awake.
Entries.GrandpaStory.cs.12034: There will come a day when you feel crushed by the burden of modern life...
Entries.GrandpaStory.cs.12035: ...and your bright spirit will fade before a growing emptiness.
Entries.GrandpaStory.cs.12036: When that happens, my boy, you'll be ready for this gift.
Entries.GrandpaStory.cs.12038: When that happens, my dear, you'll be ready for this gift.
Entries.GrandpaStory.cs.12051: Dear {0},^^If you're reading this, you must be in dire need of a change.^^The same thing happened to me, long ago. I'd lost sight of what mattered most in life... real connections with other people and nature. So I dropped everything and moved to the place I truly belong.^^^I've enclosed the deed to that place... my pride and joy: {1} Farm. It's located in Stardew Valley, on the southern coast. It's the perfect place to start your new life.^^This was my most precious gift of all, and now it's yours. I know you'll honor the family name, my boy. Good luck.^^Love, Grandpa^^P.S. If Lewis is still alive say hi to the old guy for me, will ya?

Entries.TV.cs.13124: Welcome to "Livin' Off The Land". We're back again with another tip for y'all. Now listen up:
Entries.TV.cs.13127: Greetings! It is I, the queen of sauce... here to teach you a new mouth-watering recipe from my secret cookbook. This week's dish...
Entries.TV.cs.13128: Ah... I sense that a new viewer has joined us. A young man from... Stardew Valley? Welcome, welcome!
Entries.TV.cs.13130: Ah... I sense that a new viewer has joined us. A young lady from... Stardew Valley? Welcome, welcome!
Entries.TV.cs.13132: Ah... yes, I can hear the spirits whispering something to me...
Entries.TV.cs.13133: Welcome back to 'Welwick's Oracle'... If you seek hidden knowledge of the future, well you've come to the right place.
Entries.TV.cs.13134: Hoo.. I see a glimmer within my scrying orb... A shard of knowledge from the future!
Entries.TV.cs.13135: Welcome to Welwick's Oracle... the ONLY show where the voice of the spirits is channeled directly... to YOU.
Entries.TV.cs.13136: Welcome to KOZU 5... your number one source for weather, news, and entertainment.^And now, the weather forecast for tomorrow...
Entries.TV.cs.13137: ...and now, let's turn our attention to Pelican Town and the rest of the southern coast.
Entries.TV.cs.13138: ...and that's our best prediction for {0}, folks. Now how about Pelican Town?
Entries.TV.cs.13140: ...our Stardew Valley weather station is operational and reporting in with tomorrow's data.
Entries.TV.cs.13141: I'm Tom Laminar, reporting in from KOZU 5... weather, news, and entertainment. Now, the report from Stardew Valley...
Entries.TV.cs.13142: ...You can see a variable pressure front coming down from the north here. Well that can only mean one thing, folks...
Entries.TV.cs.13143: ...If you look here, you'll see some tempurature fluctuations of low to moderate severity. Do you know what that means, folks?...
Entries.TV.cs.13144: ...To the northeast you can see a dry-line bulge creeping west near calico desert. It's pretty clear to me, folks...
Entries.TV.cs.13148: Just kidding... I'm not ready. I don't have anything for you today.
Entries.TV.cs.13151: You already know how to cook {0}.
Entries.TV.cs.13164: Um... that's odd. My information sheet just says 'null'. This is embarrassing...
Entries.TV.cs.13175: It's going to be clear and sunny tomorrow... perfect weather for the {0}! The event will take place {1}, starting between {2} and {3}. Don't be late!
Entries.TV.cs.13180: Bundle up, folks. It's going to snow tomorrow!
Entries.TV.cs.13181: Expect a few inches of snow tomorrow.
Entries.TV.cs.13182: It's going to be a beautiful, sunny day tomorrow!
Entries.TV.cs.13183: It's going to be clear and sunny all day.

Entries.SlayMonsterQuest.cs.13711: The monsters known as 'Duggies' are making a mess of the local mine! The holes they create could weaken the structural integrity of the mines. Could someone defeat {0} of these creatures?

Entries.SlayMonsterQuest.cs.13730: Ah, @! So you helped us with our slime problem? Thank you!$h#$b#I hope you didn't go through too much trouble...

Entries.SlayMonsterQuest.cs.13747: An invasive crab species is living in the local mine, threatening the native wildlife! These creatures are known for disguising themselves as stones. I'll pay someone to slay {0} of them.  -Demetrius

They've been multiplying quicker than normal due to human activity in the caves, so I'm hoping our efforts prevent them from threatening any other species.#$b#The local wildlife thanks you for what you did today, @. Enjoy your reward.$h

Bercerita tentang pramugari kereta yang jatuh cinta dengan arsitek yang suka mengembara... tapi dia diam-diam punya hubungan sama putri kondektur!#$b#Aku *hampir* kepikiran buat membagi hasilnya denganmu, karena kamu sudah banyak membantu!$h

Utility.cs.5256.0: Welcome, everyone, to the 16th Centennial Stardew Hero Celebration!$h#$b#We've been a long time without a Stardew Hero, and I think we can all agree it's time to bestow this prestigious award on someone new!

Utility.cs.5259.0: ...The title of Stardew Hero is awarded only to those who've displayed extraordinary commitment to this valley and the people who live here.

Utility.cs.5260.0: There are many here who've done a lot for this community, but unfortunately there can only be one Stardew Hero.#$b#...And standing before you today are the two top contenders. @ and %rival.

Utility.cs.5263.0: @ moved here 2 years ago, and in that time {0} #$b#...Those kinds of accomplishments could breathe life into any community!

Utility.cs.5306.0: %rival also moved here 2 years ago. In that time he created one of the most productive farms I've ever seen!$h#$b#...And funneled a large sum into my personal bank acc... er, I mean campaign fund!

We just left the Fern Islands last night, after staying for two months.^It was a wonderful experience... highly recommended.^Make sure you eat healthy and don't forget to pay the electricity bill!^^Love, Mom & Dad

Entries.Hospital.4: Is life sometimes difficult? Do you ever have trouble staying focused? Talk to your doctor about Pravoloxinone.^(Pravoloxinone is not for everyone. Side effects may include insomnia, severe anger, uncontrollable swelling of the throat, permanent discoloration of the lips, hair loss, and stroke. In extremely rare cases (1 in 500), test subjects experienced complete disintegration of one or more bones.)
Entries.Hospital.6: This clinic is licensed for medical practice by the Ferngill Republic Health Authority.

Entries.SamHouse.3: Jodi-^Since I'll be coming home soon I want to tell you a few things.^I might not be the same man you remember. I've seen some things out here that have really shaken me up. I've been having a real hard time relaxing.^I don't want to scare you or make you upset. I just don't want you to be shocked when I get back.^Remember, no matter how I act, you and the kids mean everything to me.^I'll see you soon.^-Kent

Entries.SeedShop.9: To Mr. Pierre:^It pains me to be the bearer of bad news, but I feel obligated to inform you of a recent development most threatening to your livelihood.^Joja Co. has decided to expand into Pelican Town.^It's too late for protest. Joja Builders have already broken ground for the new JojaMart.^^This must be devastating news for you. So many years in business...a local standby... and now, obscured by the shadow of a powerful, efficient, economically viable corporation. What a shame!^^As manager of the new JojaMart, I feel, to some degree, personally responsible for your predicament. As such, I'd like to offer you a position as Assistant Grocer. Wages start at 5g an hour. I look forward to seeing your resume!^^-Mr. Morris, Manager^Pelican Town JojaMart

Entries.MovieTheater_CraneMan: Crane Man: Can't talk... I'm in the zone.
Entries.MovieTheater_CraneOccupied: The crane game is in use by someone else.
Entries.MovieTheater_Welwick: Welwick: Hmm, not many people here... and I invested a lot of money in this movie!
Entries.MovieTheater_Welwick2: Welwick: I foresee great things in your future... If you buy lots of tickets to this movie!
Entries.MovieTheater_ShortsMan: Corner Guy: Brr... it's kind of drafty over here... I'm glad I wore my long pants!
Entries.MovieTheater_ShortsMan2: Corner Guy: Psst... I just saw the movie, and... Relax! I'm not going to spoil it for you.
Entries.MovieTheater_Mother: Woman: Simon, don't you want something healthy? *sigh*... okay...
Entries.MovieTheater_Mother2: Woman: How about some apple slices? No? *sigh*... okay...
Entries.MovieTheater_Child2: Simon: Mom! I want chocolate popcorn! *slurp*
Entries.MovieTheater_Lupini: Lupini: Amateurs! The set design was completely mundane!
Entries.MovieTheater_Lupini2: Lupini: Amateurs! My nephew's 2nd birthday party home video had better cinematography!
Entries.MovieTheater_ConcessionMan: Moviegoer: Urgh... Too many snack options!
Entries.MovieTheater_ConcessionMan2: Moviegoer: Ah, look at that popcorn go! Oh, the sounds... the smells!
Entries.MovieTheater_PurpleHairLady: Woman: Get lost... I'm busy rubbing elbows with the Governor!
Entries.MovieTheater_RedCapGuy: Man: Uh oh... I think I'm a little overdressed for this place...
Entries.MovieTheater_RedCapGuy2: Man: I sat in the front row... big mistake.
Entries.MovieTheater_Governor: Governor: It's lovely to see economic development in the valley!
Entries.MovieTheater_Governor2: Governor: I really must bring the missus out for soup and a movie!
Entries.MovieTheater_Gunther: Hey, I'd love to chat, but I need to head back to the museum!
Entries.MovieTheater_Gunther2: Hey, @. I just saw the movie, myself... not bad!
Entries.MovieTheater_Marlon: Gil slept through the whole movie... typical.
Entries.MovieTheater_Marlon2: That was an interesting one... what'd you think, Gil?#$b#...Gil?#$b#...He's out cold.
Entries.MovieTheater_Marcello: Marcello: What a spread! I think I'll go for the bourbon mayonnaise. Hehe!
Entries.MovieTheater_Marcello2: Marcello: What a spread! I think I'll go for the 12-grain spicy mustard. Hehe!
Entries.MovieTheater_Morris: As you can see, the theater is a major success!$h#$b#Whaa...? A return on your investment? Well, it's difficult, you know... might take a while, you understand... *mumble*$2
Entries.MovieTheater_Morris2: Ah, it's our very important investment partner! Enjoy the show, and don't forget to buy a bag of JojaCorn on your way in!$h
Entries.IslandShrine_Shrine: When dark clouds cry, begin your quest^To seek the fabled gem-birds four^Each day, one north, south, east, or west^Arrange their gifts upon my door
Entries.Pirates1: GREEN: You were always Momma's favorite! WaaaAaAa
Entries.Pirates2: RED: Mamma mia! Calm down, brother. Youch!
Entries.Pirates3: WELL-DRESSED PIRATE: *ahem*... Yar.#...#...Not convincing, huh?#*sigh*...#To tell you the truth, I don't really want to be a pirate. I'd rather grow palms.#Unfortunately, there's no money in the palm business...
Entries.Pirates4: BLACKGULL: Yar, matey. Ye must have a keen eye to've spotted our secret cove. Yo ho!
Entries.Pirates5: GRIM PIRATE: From yonder seas, a chilling tale, a nightmare sure to haunt your sleep...#'Twas midnight when I lost me hands... to a savage monster o' the deep...#Yar, 'tis true...#...#...#..............#..............................................#Alright, I'm just kidding. I actually lost them while trying to fish an eggshell out of the blender.#Alas... me famous cake batter days are over...
Entries.Pirates8: BARTENDER: Oi guv!... Grog and tasties are fer da pirates only.
Entries.Pirates7_0: DART MAN: Care for a game o' darts? You've got 20 darts to score exactly 301 points.
Entries.Pirates7_1: DART MAN: How about we make things more interesting. Hit exactly 301 points within 15 darts and I'll be impressed, matey!
Entries.Pirates7_2: DART MAN: Ah, good to see ya again, matey! Let's see if you can score 301 points within... 10 darts!
Entries.Pirates7_3: DART MAN: Ahoy! If it isn't me matey... ol' steady-hands! How about a game o' darts for old times' sake?
Entries.Pirates7_Win_Perfect: DART MAN: Well, shiver me timbers! That's a perfect game!
Entries.Pirates7_Win: DART MAN: Well, sink me! That's some good throwing!
Entries.Pirates7_WinPrize: Here's a little something for ya.
Entries.Pirates7_Lose: DART MAN: Yar... Better luck next time...
Entries.PirateBartender_PirateClothes: BARTENDER: Oi! I never seen the likes o' you, before. But if ye got the pirate look, then 'ave one on me! Har Har!
Entries.PirateBartender_PirateClothes_NoMore: BARTENDER: Back fer more, eh? Har Har! You've had enough, matey...

SeedShop.9.0: Kepada Tn. Pierre:^Sungguh menyakitkan saya harus menyampaikan kabar buruk ini, tetapi saya merasa berkewajiban untuk memberi tahu Anda tentang perkembangan terkini yang paling mengancam mata pencaharian Anda.^Perusahaan Joja telah memutuskan untuk memperluas cabangnya ke Pelican Town.^Sudah terlambat untuk protes. Tim Pembangunan Joja sudah mulai membangun JojaMart baru.^^Ini pasti berita buruk bagi Anda. Bertahun-tahun dalam bisnis... stabil dalam lingkup lokal... dan sekarang, dibayang-bayangi oleh perusahaan yang kuat, efisien, dan layak secara ekonomi. Sungguh memalukan!^^Sebagai manajer JojaMart yang baru, kurang lebih saya merasa bertanggung jawab atas kesulitan Anda pribadi. Karenanya, saya ingin menawarkan kepada posisi sebagai Asisten Toko kepada Anda. Gajinya mulai dari 5g per jam. Saya menantikan kiriman CV Anda!^^-Tn. Morris, Manajer^JojaMart Pelican Town

Entries.Character_CoopHelpString: Starting Cabins: Start with 1-3 cabins already in place, allowing your friends to join immediately. Alternatively, you can select "None" and build the cabins yourself (via Robin).^^Cabin Layout: If you decide to start your farm with pre-existing cabins, you can choose between two layout styles: "Nearby" places all cabins near the main farmhouse, encouraging a communal farming style. "Separate" places the cabins far apart, allowing more room for independence.^^Profit Margin: Adjusts the profit margin (money you earn) on goods you sell. 'Normal' is the original Stardew Valley experience. More experienced and/or larger groups may wish to decrease the margin.
Entries.Character_CoopHelpString2: Money Style: You can choose how money is earned and spent. In "Shared" mode, all players share the same pool of money. In "Separate" mode, each player has their own, individual pool of money. "Shared" is the classic Stardew Valley experience.
Entries.Character_FarmStandard: Standard Farm_A simple plot of land, with a large amount of open space to design your farm.
Entries.Character_FarmForaging: Forest Farm_The woods limit your farming space. However, the bounty of the forest is nearly at your doorstep...
Entries.Character_FarmFishing: Riverland Farm_Your farm is spread across several islands and scenic riverbanks. Fish are more common here than usual.
Entries.Character_FarmMining: Hill-top Farm_Rocky terrain and a winding river make it difficult to design your farm. However, a mineral deposit provides mining opportunities.
Entries.Character_FarmCombat: Wilderness Farm_There's plenty of good land here, but beware... at night the monsters come out.
Entries.Character_FarmFourCorners: Four Corners Farm_The land is divided into four parcels, each with its own perk. Perfect for a group!

Befriend coop animals quicker.
Incubation time cut in half.

Befriend barn animals quicker.
Sheep produce wool faster.

Entries.LevelUp_ProfessionDescription_Acrobat: Cooldown on special moves cut in half.

Character_CoopHelpString.0: Kabin Awal: Mulai dengan 1-3 kabin yang sudah dibangun, supaya temanmu bisa langsung ikut main. Atau kamu juga bisa memilih "Tidak Ada" dan membangun kabin sendiri (via Robin).^^Letak Kabin: Kalau kamu ingin memulai permainan dengan kabin, kamu bisa memilih antara dua jenis tata letak ini: "Berdekatan" semua kabin letaknya berdekatan dengan rumah utama, mendorong gaya pertanian gotong royong. "Berjauhan" semua kabin letaknya berjauhan, cocok untuk para pemain yang ingin mandiri.^^Margin Laba: Sesuaikan margin laba (uang yang kamu hasilkan) pada barang yang dijual. 'Normal' adalah pengaturan asli Stardew Valley. Pemain yang sudah berpengalaman biasanya ingin margin-nya dikurangi.

Character_CoopHelpString2.0: Jenis Keuangan: Kamu bisa memilih bagaimana uang didapatkan dan digunakan. Di mode "Berbagi" semua pemain keuangannya jadi satu. Di mode "Mandiri"masing-masing pemain mengatur keuangannya sendiri. "Berbagi" adalah pengalaman klasik Stardew Valley.

Character_FarmStandard.0: Standard Farm_Sebidang tanah sederhana, dengan ladang yang luas untuk mendesain kebunmu.

Character_FarmForaging.0: Forest Farm_Hutan akan membatasi ladang berkebunmu. Tapi, hasil ramban dari hutan dekat dengan rumahmu...

Character_FarmFishing.0: Riverland Farm_Ladangmu tersebar di pulau-pulau kecil yang dipisah oleh sungai indah. Ikan lebih banyak muncul di sini dari pada tempat lain.

Character_FarmMining.0: Hill-top Farm_Dataran berbatu dan sungai yang berliku membuatmu sulit untuk mendesain kebun. Tapi, dengan banyak endapan mineral membuat hasil tambang lebih mudah didapat.

Character_FarmCombat.0: Wilderness Farm_Ladangnya cukup luas di sini, tapi awas... malam hari ada monster-monster yang berkeliaran.

Character_FarmFourCorners.0: Four Corners Farm_Ladangnya dibagi jadi empat petak, masing-masing punya kelebihannya sendiri. Cocok untuk bermain bersama!
