Entries.Willy_Text: Hey there, I'm looking for a big wad o' bug guts. The juicier the better... at least that's what the crabs seem to like... 100 pieces should do the trick.
Entries.Willy_Objective_0_Text: Collect a bunch of bug meat
Entries.Willy_Objective_1_Text: Place the bug meat in the barrel next to Willy's house.
Entries.Pam_Text: Heard there's a spirit made out of potatoes that really packs a whallop, if you know what I mean. Mind dropping a few taters into a keg and bringing me a batch or two?
Entries.Pam_Objective_0_Text: Keg a few potatoes and collect 12 batches
Entries.Pam_Objective_1_Text: Place the product in Pam's kitchen.
Entries.Pierre_Text: Hello there. For an upcoming promotion, I'm thinking of offering some high-quality vegetables at a slight premium... Know where a thrifty shopkeep might find 25 gold-star vegetables?
Entries.Pierre_Objective_1_Text: Place the crops in the empty produce box in Pierre's shop.
Entries.Robin_Text: Hey! I have an idea for a new style of bed, but I'll need 80 hardwood to make it happen. Can anyone help?                     -Robin
Entries.Robin_Objective_1_Text: Add the hardwood to the stockpile in Robin's house.
Entries.Emily_Text: Hey! I'm going to invite some friends over to do a "rock rejuvenation" ceremony, but I'll need some crystals to channel the right energies. Do you think you could lend me a hand?
Entries.Demetrius_Text: For unknown reasons, the local population of {FishType:Text} has grown to an unsustainable level. I need a local angler to help reduce their numbers.
Entries.Demetrius2_Text: For unknown reasons, the local population of {FishType:Text} has grown to an unsustainable level. I need a local angler to help reduce their numbers.
Entries.Gus_Text: {Greeting}... but I'll need two dozen eggs. Any takers?                -Gus
Entries.Gus_Objective_1_Text: Put the eggs in Gus' fridge.
Entries.Gus_RE_Greeting_0: I've got the urge to make my famous giant omelet
Entries.Gus_RE_Greeting_1: I've got the urge to make another giant omelet
Entries.Lewis_Text: {Text} Anyone who ships 100 {Crop:TextPlural} by the end of the season will earn a substantial reward from the Pelican Town Agricultural Fund.
Entries.Lewis_RE_Text_0: {Crop:TextPluralCapitalized} are in high demand this year.
Entries.Lewis_RE_Text_1: Apparently, {Crop:TextPlural} are considered the latest 'superfood' in Zuzu City.
Entries.Lewis_RE_Text_2: There's a new beauty craze in Zuzu City... apparently, a lotion made from {Crop:Text} is said to remove wrinkles.
Entries.Lewis_RE_Text_3: The Queen of Sauce was recently spotted dining on fresh {Crop:Text}. Now everyone in the world wants one!
Entries.Lewis_RE_Text_4: The Governor is holding a banquet, and his Chefs are ordering huge numbers of {Crop:TextPlural}.
Entries.Wizard_Text: I seek an extremely rare and powerful goop, known as 'ectoplasm'. It can be found in the remains of slain ghosts.      -M. Rasmodius
Entries.Wizard_Objective_0_Message: Ah, It's brimming with the energy of forgotten souls... perfect.$h#$b#Now, begone! I shall require perfect silence to discern the true nature of this substance.
Entries.Clint_Text: The number of {Monster:LocalizedName} in the local caves have made mining dangerous... for other people, not me! There's good money for anyone willing to slay 50 of them.          -Clint
Entries.Linus_Text: I have an idea. There's a lot of trash in the water. Why don't we fish some out to make the valley more beautiful?                     -Linus
Entries.Linus_Objective_1_Text: Dump the trash in the recycling bin behind the train platform.
Entries.Evelyn_Text: George thinks no one in town cares about him. I'd like to prove him wrong! A dozen leeks should do the trick... they're his favorite.                      -Evelyn
Entries.Evelyn_Objective_1_Text: Place the leeks in Evelyn's kitchen.
Entries.Wizard2_Text: I require assistance in tracking down the rare and dangerous prismatic slime, within the local caves. Bring me a jar of its prismatic jelly and you will be duly rewarded.        -M. Rasmodius
Entries.Wizard2_Objective_1_Text: Deliver a prismatic jelly to Wizard
Entries.Wizard2_Objective_1_Message: Ah... you've returned from the hunt. I sense that you were successful!$h#$b#Now, hand over the jelly and begone! I have important work to do.
Entries.Robin2_Text: I'm putting on a little promotion, just for fun. If anyone can collect 1000 pieces of {Resource:Text} in a week, they'll earn a reward. And you can keep the {Resource:Text}!             -Robin
Entries.Gunther_Text: Calling all amateur paleontologists! I need 100 pieces of bone for my studies. Please drop them off at the museum counter!          -Gunther
Entries.Gunther_Objective_0_Text: Place the bones in the drop box at the museum counter.
Entries.Caroline_Text: I want to experiment with tropical cooking, but it's hard to find any ingredients. If someone could ship 100 {Crop:TextPlural}, it might help!
Entries.Willy2_Text: There's nothin' like tropical fishing... To keep the art alive, I'm offering a reward for whoever can bring in a good island haul.
Entries.QiChallenge_Text: I will provide you with 600 Qi Beans. Plant these, grow them, and ship at least 500 of them in a week or less. But beware, Five plagues will descend upon you, threatening your crop...
Entries.QiChallenge2_Text: I've hidden Qi Beans throughout the world. Find them, grow them, propagate them, and ship 500 Qi Fruit within the time limit.
Entries.QiChallenge3_Text: Think you can score 50,000 points in Junimo Kart endless mode? Prove it.
Entries.QiChallenge3_Objective_0_Text: Score 50,000 points in Junimo Kart endless mode.
Entries.QiChallenge4_Text: Find 4 prismatic shards. Place them in my collection box.
Entries.QiChallenge4_Objective_0_Text: Place 4 Prismatic Shards into Qi's collection box.
Entries.QiChallenge5_Text: Your task is to make it to level 100 in the Skull Cavern. However, you can't eat or drink anything while there.
Entries.QiChallenge5_Objective_0_Text: Make it to level 100 in the Skull Cavern.
Entries.QiChallenge6_Text: Ship 100,000g worth of freshly cooked items.
Entries.QiChallenge6_Objective_0_Text: Ship 100,000g worth of freshly cooked items.
Entries.QiChallenge7_Text: Give 50 loved gifts in one week.
Entries.QiChallenge7_Objective_0_Text: Give 50 loved gifts in one week.
Entries.QiChallenge8_Text: Family members of the legendary fish have returned to the valley. You have three days to catch Ms. Angler, Glacierfish Jr., Son of Crimsonfish, Radioactive Carp, and The Legend II.
Entries.QiChallenge9_Text: The mine elevator system has been reset, and new dangers have emerged from deep underground. Make it to the bottom of the mines in one week.
Entries.QiChallenge9_Objective_0_Text: Reach the bottom of the mines, again.
Entries.QiChallenge10_Text: The Skull Cavern has been invaded by powerful monsters. Make it to level 100 in one piece.
Entries.QiChallenge10_Objective_0_Text: Make it to level 100 of the Skull Cavern.
Entries.QiChallenge11_Text: There's a second version of me, hiding somewhere in town. Can you catch him?
Entries.QiChallenge12_Text: Find 100 each of red, orange, yellow, green, blue, and purple items. Place them in my collection box.
Entries.QiChallenge12_Objective_0_Text: Place 100 red items into Qi's collection box.
Entries.QiChallenge12_Objective_1_Text: Place 100 orange items into Qi's collection box.
Entries.QiChallenge12_Objective_2_Text: Place 100 yellow items into Qi's collection box.
Entries.QiChallenge12_Objective_3_Text: Place 100 green items into Qi's collection box.
Entries.QiChallenge12_Objective_4_Text: Place 100 blue items into Qi's collection box.
Entries.QiChallenge12_Objective_5_Text: Place 100 purple items into Qi's collection box.

Willy_Text.0: Hei semua, aku butuh banyak daging serangga. Lebih segar lebih baik... pokoknya cocok buat pakan kepiting... 100 saja cukup.

Willy_Objective_1_Text.0: Taruh Bug Meat di tong sebelah rumah Willy.

Pam_Text.0: Kudengar ada minuman dari kentang yang rasanya sangat 'berat', kalau kalian paham maksudku. Adakah yang mau memproses beberapa kentang dalam Keg dan membawa hasilnya padaku?

Pam_Objective_0_Text.0: Fermentasi sejumlah Potato di Keg dan buat 12 botol

Pierre_Text.0: Halo semua. Untuk promo, aku berencana menjual sayuran kualitas tinggi sebagai produk premium... Ada yang bisa mengumpulkan 25 Sayuran kualitas emas untuk membantu pemilik toko ini?

Pierre_Objective_1_Text.0: Letakkan hasil panen di kotak kosong dalam toko Pierre.

Robin_Text.0: Hei! Aku punya ide untuk tempat tidur jenis baru, tapi aku butuh 80 Hardwood untuk membuatnya. Ada yang bisa bantu? -Robin

Robin_Objective_1_Text.0: Taruh Hardwood di tumpukan kayu di rumah Robin.

Emily_Text.0: Hei! Aku mengundang sejumlah temanku untuk melakukan "Meditasi Batu", tapi aku butuh beberapa permata untuk mengalirkan energi yang sesuai. Apa ada yang bersedia membantu?

Demetrius_Text.0: Untuk alasan yang tidak diketahui, jumlah populasi {FishType:Text} lokal telah meningkat hingga tak terkendali. Aku butuh bantuan nelayan lokal untuk mengurasi jumlah populasinya.

Demetrius2_Text.0: Untuk alasan yang tidak diketahui, jumlah populasi {FishType:Text} lokal telah meningkat hingga tak terkendali. Aku butuh bantuan nelayan lokal untuk mengurasi jumlah populasinya.

Gus_Text.0: {Greeting}... tapi aku butuh dua lusin telur. Ada yang mau membantu? -Gus

Gus_Objective_1_Text.0: Taruh Egg di lemari es milik Gus.

Gus_RE_Greeting_0.0: Aku sedang ingin membuat omelet raksasaku yang terkenal

Gus_RE_Greeting_1.0: Aku ingin membuat omelet raksasaku yang terkenal lagi

Lewis_Text.0: {Text} Siapa saja yang mengirim 100 {Crop:TextPlural} sebelum musim berakhir akan dapat hadiah besar yang diambil dari Dana Agrikultur Pelican Town.

Lewis_RE_Text_1.0: Tampaknya, {Crop:TextPlural} sedang jadi 'makanan super' terkenal di Zuzu City.

Lewis_RE_Text_2.0: Sedang ada tren kecantikan baru di Zuzu City... tampaknya, lotion yang terbuat dari {Crop:Text} berkhasiat untuk menghilangkan kerutan.

Lewis_RE_Text_3.0: Sang Queen of Sauce diketahui sedang makan malam dengan {Crop:Text} segar. Sekarang seluruh dunia juga mau ikut-ikutan!

Lewis_RE_Text_4.0: Pak Gubernur sedang mengadakan prasmanan, dan kokinya memesan banyak {Crop:TextPlural}.

Wizard_Text.0: Aku sedang mencari zat langka nan kuat, yang disebut 'Ectoplasm'. Zat itu bisa ditemukan setelah membunuh monster jenis Ghost. -M. Rasmodius

Wizard_Objective_0_Message.0: Ah, Zat ini dipenuhi dengan energi dari jiwa-jiwa yang tersesat... sempurna.$h#$b#Pergilah! Aku butuh konsentrasi tinggi untuk memahami asal-usul substansi ini.

Clint_Text.0: Jumlah monster {Monster:LocalizedName} di gua lokal telah membahayakan aktivitas bertambang... bagi orang lain, bukan aku! Ada upah yang sepadan bagi siapa saja yang bersedia membasmi 50 monster itu. -Clint

Linus_Text.0: Aku ada ide. Di perairan lembah ada banyak sampahnya. Mari kita pancing bersama agar lembah ini jadi lebih indah dan bersih -Linus

Linus_Objective_1_Text.0: Buang sampah di kotak daur ulang belakang peron kereta.

Evelyn_Text.0: George mengira kalau di kota ini tidak ada yang peduli padanya. Aku ingin membuktikan sebaliknya! Selusin Leek pasti cukup... karena itu adalah kesukaannya. -Evelyn

Wizard2_Text.0: Aku butuh bantuan untuk melacak Prismatic Slime yang langka dan berbahaya, di dalam gua lokal. Bawakan aku setoples Prismatic Jelly dan akan kuberi upah yang sepadan. -M. Rasmodius

Wizard2_Objective_1_Text.0: Antarkan setoples Prismatic Jelly pada Wizard

Wizard2_Objective_1_Message.0: Ah... kau sudah kembali dari berburu. Sepertinya kamu berhasil!$h#$b#Serahkan Jelly-nya dan pergilah! Ada hal penting yang harus kukerjakan.

Robin2_Text.0: Aku mau bikin promo kecil-kecilan. Siapapun yang bisa mengumpulkan 1000 {Resource:Text} dalam sepekan, akan dapat hadiah. Dan kalian bisa menyimpan {Resource:Text}-nya! -Robin

Gunther_Text.0: Untuk semua paleontologis pemula! Aku butuh 100 tulang untuk studiku. Tolong kirim semuanya di meja depan museum! -Gunther

Gunther_Objective_0_Text.0: Taruh tukang-tulangnya di boks dekat meja depan museum.

Caroline_Text.0: Aku mau bereskperimen dengan masakan tropis, tapi sulit mencari bahan-bahannya. Kalau ada yang mau mengirim 100 {Crop:TextPlural}, itu akan membantu!

Willy2_Text.0: Memancing ikan tropis sangatlah seru... Untuk melestarikan seni memancing, aku tawarkan hadiah bagi siapa saja yang bisa menangkap banyak ikan di pulau.

QiChallenge_Text.0: Aku akan memberimu 600 Qi Beans. Tanam semuanya, rawat semuanya, dan kirimkan setidaknya 500 dalam jangka waktu seminggu atau kurang. Tapi waspadalah, Lima Wabah akan menghalangimu, mengancam tanamanmu...

QiChallenge_Objective_0_Text.0: Kirim 500 Qi Fruit via Shipping Bin.

QiChallenge2_Text.0: Aku menyembunyikan Qi Beans di seluruh dunia. Temukan semuanya, tanam semuanya, kembang biakkan semuanya dan kirim 500 Qi Fruit sebelum jatuh tempo.

QiChallenge2_Objective_0_Text.0: Kirim 500 Qi Fruit via Shipping Bin

QiChallenge3_Text.0: Apa kau bisa dapat skor 50,000 poin pada 'Endless Mode' di Junimo Kart? Ayo buktikan.

QiChallenge3_Objective_0_Text.0: Cetak skor 50,000 poin pada 'Endless Mode' di Junimo Kart.

QiChallenge4_Text.0: Temukan 4 Prismatic Shards. Taruh semuanya di kotak koleksiku.

QiChallenge4_Objective_0_Text.0: Taruh 4 Prismatic Shards di kotak koleksi Qi.

QiChallenge5_Text.0: Tugasmu adalah mencapai level 100 di Skull Cavern. Tapi kamu tidak boleh makan atau minum apapun saat di sana.

QiChallenge6_Text.0: Kirim makanan hangat sampai setara dengan 100,000g.

QiChallenge6_Objective_0_Text.0: Kirim makanan hangat sampai setara 100,000g via Shipping Bin.

QiChallenge7_Text.0: Beri 50 hadiah yang dicintai dalam satu pekan.

QiChallenge7_Objective_0_Text.0: Beri 50 hadiah yang dicintai dalam satu pekan.

QiChallenge8_Text.0: Anggota keluarga dari ikan-ikan legendaris telah kembali ke lembah. Waktumu tiga hari untuk menangkap Ms. Angler, Glacierfish Jr., Son of Crimsonfish, Radioactive Carp, dan The Legend II.

QiChallenge9_Text.0: Sistem elevator tambang telah diatur ulang, dan bahaya baru muncul di kedalaman. Capailah dasar tambang dalam waktu satu minggu.

QiChallenge10_Text.0: Skull Cavern telah diserbu oleh monster-monster kuat. Capailah level 100 tanpa babak belur.

QiChallenge11_Text.0: Ada kembaranku yang bersembunyi di kota. Bisakah kau menangkapnya?

QiChallenge12_Text.0: Temukan 100 dari masing-masing item berwarna merah, oranye, kuning, hijau, biru, dan ungu. Taruh semuanya di kotak koleksiku.

QiChallenge12_Objective_0_Text.0: Taruh 100 item berwarna merah di kotak koleksi Qi.

QiChallenge12_Objective_1_Text.0: Taruh 100 item berwarna oranye di kotak koleksi Qi.

QiChallenge12_Objective_2_Text.0: Taruh 100 item berwarna kuning di kotak koleksi Qi.

QiChallenge12_Objective_3_Text.0: Taruh 100 item berwarna hijau di kotak koleksi Qi.

QiChallenge12_Objective_4_Text.0: Taruh 100 item berwarna biru di kotak koleksi Qi.

QiChallenge12_Objective_5_Text.0: Taruh 100 item berwarna ungu di kotak koleksi Qi.
